adventurer.name: Adventurer
adventurer.4pc: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

flower_of_life.name: Adventurer's Flower
flower_of_life.desc: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

plume_of_death.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
plume_of_death.desc: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

sands_of_eon.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
sands_of_eon.desc: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

circlet_of_logos.name: Adventurer's Bandana
circlet_of_logos.desc: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.

flower_of_life.name: Lucky Dog's Clover
flower_of_life.desc: A four-leaf clover that grows in the wild. It was picked because it is said to bring good luck.

plume_of_death.name: Lucky Dog's Eagle Feather
plume_of_death.desc: A monster once cornered an adventurer, but was then picked off by a hunting eagle... That eagle dropped this feather, which now carries some of the adventurer's good luck.

sands_of_eon.name: Lucky Dog's Hourglass
sands_of_eon.desc: A broken hourglass from which all the sand has escaped. But it's fine, because the passage of time means nothing to someone without a single worry in the whole world.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Lucky Dog's Goblet
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: An exquisite metallic vessel that was once used to knock out a thief.

circlet_of_logos.name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
circlet_of_logos.desc: Its former owner once fell into a cave and found the treasure trove of an exiled royal. This is a souvenir from that incident.

flower_of_life.name: Traveling Doctor's Silver Lotus
flower_of_life.desc: A precious medicinal ingredient that has lost all medicinal value after years in storage.

plume_of_death.name: Traveling Doctor's Owl Feather
plume_of_death.desc: The durable feather of an owl. Emblematic of nocturnal supremacy, it gave some encouragement to the Traveling Doctor when venturing out to visit patients late at night.

sands_of_eon.name: Traveling Doctor's Pocket Watch
sands_of_eon.desc: A precise instrument used for keeping time. For a doctor, every second counts.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.

circlet_of_logos.name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
circlet_of_logos.desc: Used to tie back the doctor's hair when treating patients. Can also be used as a sling for sprains and broken arms in emergencies.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.4pc: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

flower_of_life.name: Berserker's Rose
flower_of_life.desc: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

plume_of_death.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
plume_of_death.desc: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

sands_of_eon.name: Berserker's Timepiece
sands_of_eon.desc: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left — both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

circlet_of_logos.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
circlet_of_logos.desc: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.

brave_heart.name: Brave Heart
brave_heart.4pc: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

flower_of_life.name: Medal of the Brave
flower_of_life.desc: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

plume_of_death.name: Prospect of the Brave
plume_of_death.desc: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

sands_of_eon.name: Fortitude of the Brave
sands_of_eon.desc: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Outset of the Brave
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

circlet_of_logos.name: Crown of the Brave
circlet_of_logos.desc: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.

defenders_will.name: Defender's Will
defenders_will.4pc: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

flower_of_life.name: Guardian's Flower
flower_of_life.desc: An iris that was cherished by the Guardian. Unfortunately, the chance never came for it to be given to whom the Guardian loved.

plume_of_death.name: Guardian's Sigil
plume_of_death.desc: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someone's yearning to defend others like a shield.

sands_of_eon.name: Guardian's Clock
sands_of_eon.desc: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Guardian's Vessel
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

circlet_of_logos.name: Guardian's Band
circlet_of_logos.desc: A fabric band dyed indigo by the darkness of night. Can also double as a bandage in the event of an emergency.

gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.4pc: Defeating an opponent has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

flower_of_life.name: Gambler's Brooch
flower_of_life.desc: A big, luxurious flower that can hide a loaded dice.

plume_of_death.name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
plume_of_death.desc: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

sands_of_eon.name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
sands_of_eon.desc: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Gambler's Dice Cup
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

circlet_of_logos.name: Gambler's Earrings
circlet_of_logos.desc: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

instructor.name: Instructor
instructor.4pc: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

flower_of_life.name: Instructor's Brooch
flower_of_life.desc: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.

plume_of_death.name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
plume_of_death.desc: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

sands_of_eon.name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
sands_of_eon.desc: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Instructor's Tea Cup
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

circlet_of_logos.name: Instructor's Cap
circlet_of_logos.desc: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.

martial_artist.name: Martial Artist
martial_artist.2pc: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
martial_artist.4pc: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

flower_of_life.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
flower_of_life.desc: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

plume_of_death.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
plume_of_death.desc: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

sands_of_eon.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
sands_of_eon.desc: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

circlet_of_logos.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
circlet_of_logos.desc: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

prayers_for_destiny.name: Prayers for Destiny
prayers_for_destiny.1pc: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.

circlet_of_logos.name: Tiara of Torrents
circlet_of_logos.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it was submerged in water year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayers_for_illumination.name: Prayers for Illumination
prayers_for_illumination.1pc: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.

circlet_of_logos.name: Tiara of Flame
circlet_of_logos.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. After being subjected to the dancing sacrificial flames year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayers_for_wisdom.name: Prayers for Wisdom
prayers_for_wisdom.1pc: Affected by Electro for 40% less time.

circlet_of_logos.name: Tiara of Thunder
circlet_of_logos.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it harkened the call of thunder year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayers_to_springtime.name: Prayers to Springtime
prayers_to_springtime.1pc: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.

circlet_of_logos.name: Tiara of Frost
circlet_of_logos.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it once weathered years of icy cold, it possesses remarkable resistance.

resolution_of_sojourner.name: Resolution of Sojourner
resolution_of_sojourner.4pc: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

flower_of_life.name: Heart of Comradeship
flower_of_life.desc: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

plume_of_death.name: Feather of Homecoming
plume_of_death.desc: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

sands_of_eon.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
sands_of_eon.desc: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

circlet_of_logos.name: Crown of Parting
circlet_of_logos.desc: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

scholar.name: Scholar
scholar.4pc: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

flower_of_life.name: Scholar's Bookmark
flower_of_life.desc: A dried flower used as a bookmark, it had absorbed the scent from the pages.

plume_of_death.name: Scholar's Quill Pen
plume_of_death.desc: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen, the tip has long been stained black.

sands_of_eon.name: Scholar's Clock
sands_of_eon.desc: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Scholar's Ink Cup
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

circlet_of_logos.name: Scholar's Lens
circlet_of_logos.desc: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.

the_exile.name: The Exile
the_exile.4pc: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

flower_of_life.name: Exile's Flower
flower_of_life.desc: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.

plume_of_death.name: Exile's Feather
plume_of_death.desc: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.

sands_of_eon.name: Exile's Pocket Watch
sands_of_eon.desc: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Exile's Goblet
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.

circlet_of_logos.name: Exile's Circlet
circlet_of_logos.desc: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.

tiny_miracle.name: Tiny Miracle
tiny_miracle.4pc: Incoming Elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

flower_of_life.name: Tiny Miracle's Flower
flower_of_life.desc: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.

plume_of_death.name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
plume_of_death.desc: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

sands_of_eon.name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
sands_of_eon.desc: Just an ordinary everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A cup commonly used for fortunetelling. It can also hold water, of course.

circlet_of_logos.name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
circlet_of_logos.desc: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.

archaic_petra.name: Archaic Petra
archaic_petra.4pc: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

flower_of_life.name: Flower of Creviced Cliff
flower_of_life.desc: A flower born of the minerals and rocks of cliffside cracks. The way its petals blow in the wind makes it seem alive.

plume_of_death.name: Feather of Jagged Peaks
plume_of_death.desc: A hard feather from a large seacliff hawk. The basalt tip of the feather sometimes glistens with a cool dew.

sands_of_eon.name: Sundial of Enduring Jade
sands_of_eon.desc: A sundial carved from a single, large piece of jade. It's lined with a pattern that silently records the passage of time.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Goblet of Chiseled Crag
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A resplendent yet dignified wine goblet, once filled to the brim in an era long gone.

circlet_of_logos.name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
circlet_of_logos.desc: A solemn mask exquisitely carved from basalt. Its hollow eyes stare ahead expressionless and cold.

blizzard_strayer.name: Blizzard Strayer
blizzard_strayer.4pc: When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

flower_of_life.name: Snowswept Memory
flower_of_life.desc: A long-extinct flower, covered in beads of frost, that once grew on the glaciers. There was a time when even the proudest and most arrogant warriors bowed before it.

plume_of_death.name: Icebreaker's Resolve
plume_of_death.desc: A feather that exudes a chilly aura. One can almost feel the turbulent winds that brought it here, wailing over snow-covered plains and between frosty peaks.

sands_of_eon.name: Frozen Homeland's Demise
sands_of_eon.desc: A timepiece from a nation of old that waited for their warriors' return. What flows inside is not sand, but bits of ice that never melt.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Frost-Weaved Dignity
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A cup carved out of ice that is as chilly and biting as winter. Its former master would drink an unfreezable liquor from it.

circlet_of_logos.name: Broken Rime's Echo
circlet_of_logos.desc: The crown of an ancient hero who dreamt of conquering the cold. It is proof of its former master's bravery in facing the bone-chilling cold of winter.

bloodstained_chivalry.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
bloodstained_chivalry.4pc: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s. Also triggers with wild animals such as boars, squirrels and frogs.

flower_of_life.name: Bloodstained Flower of Iron
flower_of_life.desc: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for its former master.

plume_of_death.name: Bloodstained Black Plume
plume_of_death.desc: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.

sands_of_eon.name: Bloodstained Final Hour
sands_of_eon.desc: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Bloodstained Chevalier's Goblet
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.

circlet_of_logos.name: Bloodstained Iron Mask
circlet_of_logos.desc: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.

crimson_witch_of_flames.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
crimson_witch_of_flames.4pc: Increases Overloaded and Burning, and Burgeon DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

flower_of_life.name: Witch's Flower of Blaze
flower_of_life.desc: A flower touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The anonymous flames affectionately caress the hands of those who touch it.

plume_of_death.name: Witch's Ever-Burning Plume
plume_of_death.desc: A bird feather touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. Its eternal flame burns hot.

sands_of_eon.name: Witch's End Time
sands_of_eon.desc: A timepiece worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The years the witch dedicated to the flames flow within.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Witch's Heart Flames
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A flame-spitting urn left behind by the Crimson Witch of Flames, who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The fire in the urn burns eternally, as did its former master.

circlet_of_logos.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
circlet_of_logos.desc: A hat once worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The large brim blocked her sight.

deepwood_memories.name: Deepwood Memories
deepwood_memories.4pc: After Elemental Skills or Bursts hit opponents, the targets' Dendro RES will be decreased by 30% for 8s. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is not on the field.

flower_of_life.name: Labyrinth Wayfarer
flower_of_life.desc: This lovely gold-plated flower was plucked from the crown of the ruler of the forest.

plume_of_death.name: Scholar of Vines
plume_of_death.desc: An emerald leaf as fluffy as a feather. Plucked from the raiment of a forest scholar.

sands_of_eon.name: A Time of Insight
sands_of_eon.desc: Such timepieces are used by those who dedicate themselves to the way of the wise. These timepieces do not contain lifeless sand, but instead play host to tiny mustard seeds.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Lamp of the Lost
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: This was originally an oil lamp in the style of the desert realm, but has since sprouted fluorescent green leaves.

circlet_of_logos.name: Laurel Coronet
circlet_of_logos.desc: This crown was bestowed by the deity with dominion over plants and trees. It was an heirloom of the royal house of the labyrinth. It was, at last, made the inheritance of the king's attendant.

desert_pavilion_chronicle.name: Desert Pavilion Chronicle
desert_pavilion_chronicle.4pc: When Charged Attacks hit opponents, the equipping character's Normal Attack SPD will increase by 10% while Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG will increase by 40% for 15s.

flower_of_life.name: The First Days of the City of Kings
flower_of_life.desc: An artificial flower that shimmers with a strange light. If you incline your ear to it, you can vaguely hear charming laughter issuing from within.

plume_of_death.name: End of the Golden Realm
plume_of_death.desc: A crystal-clear artificial feather that is one of the legacies of an ancient human realm. The cries of soaring eagles are also sealed within.

sands_of_eon.name: Timepiece of the Lost Path
sands_of_eon.desc: An ancient mechanical clock. The Jinni fragments continue to emit light at its center and vibrate ever so slightly, as if to say something...

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Defender of the Enchanting Dream
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: An ancient golden cup that is both marvelously and luxuriously wrought. Murmurings can be heard within its empty innards.

circlet_of_logos.name: Legacy of the Desert High-Born
circlet_of_logos.desc: Earrings made from amber gold that shines with a strange light.

echoes_of_an_offering.name: Echoes of an Offering
echoes_of_an_offering.4pc:
When Normal Attacks hit opponents, there is a 36% chance that it will trigger Valley Rite, which will increase Normal Attack DMG by 70% of ATK.
This effect will be dispelled 0.05s after a Normal Attack deals DMG.
If a Normal Attack fails to trigger Valley Rite, the odds of it triggering the next time will increase by 20%.
This trigger can occur once every 0.2s.

flower_of_life.name: Soulscent Bloom
flower_of_life.desc: A jade carved into the shape of a flower. A phantom scent, here one instant and gone the next, swirls around it.

plume_of_death.name: Jade Leaf
plume_of_death.desc: A jade ornament shaped like a leaf. It seems to have once had deep meaning between specific friends.

sands_of_eon.name: Symbol of Felicitation
sands_of_eon.desc: A circular jade ornament. Legend has it that it was once used somewhere as a symbol for rituals to begin.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Chalice of the Font
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: This teacup forever overflows with fresh water. Perhaps it was a gift from an adeptus, one of their relics, or just something they left behind.

circlet_of_logos.name: Flowing Rings
circlet_of_logos.desc: A pair of earrings made from a single piece of jade. It has a most gentle texture.

emblem_of_severed_fate.name: Emblem of Severed Fate
emblem_of_severed_fate.4pc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

flower_of_life.name: Magnificent Tsuba
flower_of_life.desc: Legends has it that this ornate hand guard was once fitted upon a sword gifted to the oni who betrayed the Shogun.

plume_of_death.name: Sundered Feather
plume_of_death.desc: This was once the black feather of a certain tengu warrior, and was the treasured souvenir of an ancient swordsman.

sands_of_eon.name: Storm Cage
sands_of_eon.desc: An exquisite seal cage patterned with pansies painted upon a black backdrop, decorated with shining inlaid seashells and intricate gold-work.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Scarlet Vessel
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: An intricately-designed wine vessel that a world-famous martial artist once drank from.

circlet_of_logos.name: Ornate Kabuto
circlet_of_logos.desc: A sturdy and hard helmet worn as armor by a noble samurai.

flower_of_paradise_lost.name: Flower of Paradise Lost
flower_of_paradise_lost.4pc: The equipping character's Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon reaction DMG are increased by 40%. Additionally, after the equipping character triggers Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, they will gain another 25% bonus to the effect mentioned prior. Each stack of this lasts 10s. Max 4 stacks simultaneously. This effect can only be triggered once per second. The character who equips this can still trigger its effects when not on the field.

flower_of_life.name: Ay-Khanoum's Myriad
flower_of_life.desc: An amethyst bloom that has been beautifully sculpted in the image of an ancient, extinct flower.

plume_of_death.name: Wilting Feast
plume_of_death.desc: A feather left behind by a long-extinct bird species. It was inlaid with gold and gems by the ancient adherents of the Goddess of Flowers.

sands_of_eon.name: A Moment Congealed
sands_of_eon.desc: These sands no longer move no matter how you tilt the hourglass, now and forever defying the drift of time itself.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Secret-Keeper's Magic Bottle
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A small bottle made of purple crystal. An emerald cap keeps it tightly sealed.

circlet_of_logos.name: Amethyst Crown
circlet_of_logos.desc: A crown inlaid with amethyst and emerald. It seems to have been the headgear worn by ancient priests of the Goddess of Flowers.

gilded_dreams.name: Gilded Dreams
gilded_dreams.4pc: Within 8s of triggering an Elemental Reaction, the character equipping this will obtain buffs based on the Elemental Type of the other party members, ATK is increased by 14% for each party member whose Elemental Type is the same as the equipping character, and Elemental Mastery is increased by 50 for every party member with a different Elemental Type. Each of the aforementioned buffs will count up to 3 characters. This effect can be triggered once every 8s. The character who equips this can still trigger its effects when not on the field.

flower_of_life.name: Dreaming Steelbloom
flower_of_life.desc: A flower bud made of hammered dark gold. Its crimson core is wrapped by petals that shall never open.

plume_of_death.name: Feather of Judgment
plume_of_death.desc: This special feather was once used to weigh the hearts of the guilty, but it has since lost its original function.

sands_of_eon.name: The Sunken Years
sands_of_eon.desc: This dark-golden sundial seems to tell the ancient tale of the desert.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Honeyed Final Feast
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A wine cup that was once used at a grand and ancient feast. It has now lost much of that luster.

circlet_of_logos.name: Shadow of the Sand King
circlet_of_logos.desc: This gold-inlaid headband was once used by desert priests in the days of old. They were made in imitation of one worn by a legendary ruler of the desert peoples.

gladiators_finale.name: Gladiator's Finale
gladiators_finale.4pc: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

flower_of_life.name: Gladiator's Nostalgia
flower_of_life.desc: No one knows why the legendary gladiator wore this flower on his chest. It was the brutal warrior's only weakness.

plume_of_death.name: Gladiator's Destiny
plume_of_death.desc: A feather of dreams that soars free like an eagle. At the end of the gladiator's legendary life, this parting gift was left upon his chest by a bird that knew true freedom.

sands_of_eon.name: Gladiator's Longing
sands_of_eon.desc: A timepiece that recorded the gladiator's days in the bloodstained Colosseum. To him, it counted down the days on his long road to freedom.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Gladiator's Intoxication
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: The golden cup a champion gladiator drank from in ancient times. It brimmed with his glory for years until the fateful day of his fall.

circlet_of_logos.name: Gladiator's Triumphus
circlet_of_logos.desc: The helmet of a legendary gladiator from ancient times, who would proudly stretch out his bloodied arms to welcome the thunderous applause of his audience.

heart_of_depth.name: Heart of Depth
heart_of_depth.4pc: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

flower_of_life.name: Gilded Corsage
flower_of_life.desc: A mantle brooch that has lost its luster. The gold plating that once adorned it was ground away by the wind and the waves long ago.

plume_of_death.name: Gust of Nostalgia
plume_of_death.desc: A feather carried over by whimpering sea winds and crimson waves. The passage of time has changed its shape and color.

sands_of_eon.name: Copper Compass
sands_of_eon.desc: An ancient bronze compass. Its needle points towards some ever-distant shore, to a non-existent harbor.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Goblet of Thundering Deep
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A faded wine cup that was unintentionally dredged up from the sea. Its dull exterior tells of the days it has spent beneath the waves.

circlet_of_logos.name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
circlet_of_logos.desc: An ancient, wine-stained sea hat that still reeks of alcohol even now.

husk_of_opulent_dreams.name: Husk of Opulent Dreams
husk_of_opulent_dreams.4pc:
A character equipped with this Artifact set will obtain the Curiosity effect in the following conditions:
When on the field, the character gains 1 stack after hitting an opponent with a Geo attack, triggering a maximum of once every 0.3s.
When off the field, the character gains 1 stack every 3s.
Curiosity can stack up to 4 times, each providing 6% DEF and a 6% Geo DMG Bonus.
When 6 seconds pass without gaining a Curiosity stack, 1 stack is lost.

flower_of_life.name: Bloom Times
flower_of_life.desc: A small golden ornament with six petals that shall never wilt. It symbolizes the transience of mortal glories.

plume_of_death.name: Plume of Luxury
plume_of_death.desc: A feather-shaped token that was brought forth from a secluded hall. The compassion of its creator led to it being left within that mansion along with a certain slumbering form.

sands_of_eon.name: Song of Life
sands_of_eon.desc: As far as Inazuma is concerned, this is some small object from overseas. The heart of this mechanism has been removed, and its hands no longer turn.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Calabash of Awakening
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A gourd that has been adorned with powdered gold and black paint. Its original color can no longer be discerned, but its main use seems to be as a performance prop.

circlet_of_logos.name: Skeletal Hat
circlet_of_logos.desc: A hat that once shielded a wanderer from sun and rain. It eventually became a convenient tool with which faces might be hidden and expressions obscured.

lavawalker.name: Lavawalker
lavawalker.4pc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.

flower_of_life.name: Lavawalker's Resolution
flower_of_life.desc: A flower that blooms amidst burning flames. It is said that long ago, a sage once wore it as he walked into a sea of fire.

plume_of_death.name: Lavawalker's Salvation
plume_of_death.desc: The feather of a proud phoenix. You can almost hear the sound of its wings flapping in the scorching flames.

sands_of_eon.name: Lavawalker's Torment
sands_of_eon.desc: Burning sand flows within this hourglass. Despite the intense heat, the sand leave no mark upon the vessel that houses it.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Lavawalker's Epiphany
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A legendary goblet that can withstand extremely high temperatures. It still retains a degree of warmth even though it is now empty.

circlet_of_logos.name: Lavawalker's Wisdom
circlet_of_logos.desc: The circlet of a sage who traversed a sea of fire. It once shone brightly from their ancient silhouette as they stood strong amidst the flames.

maiden_beloved.name: Maiden Beloved
maiden_beloved.4pc: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

flower_of_life.name: Maiden's Distant Love
flower_of_life.desc: A fragrant flower that will bloom for all eternity and never wither.

plume_of_death.name: Maiden's Heart-Stricken Infatuation
plume_of_death.desc: A feathered accessory that carries the longing for a certain someone, like a migratory bird on the wind.

sands_of_eon.name: Maiden's Passing Youth
sands_of_eon.desc: The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A vessel made with sweet black tea in mind rather than bitter liquor.

circlet_of_logos.name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
circlet_of_logos.desc: A meticulously well-maintained woman's hat that keeps wrinkles safely out of sight.

noblesse_oblige.name: Noblesse Oblige
noblesse_oblige.4pc: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

flower_of_life.name: Royal Flora
flower_of_life.desc: A satin flower with a glossy finish, fit for an elegant gathering. It still looks as distinguished as it did on the day it was cast aside.

plume_of_death.name: Royal Plume
plume_of_death.desc: A feathered hat accessory worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt on hunts. It still stands proudly as if no time has passed.

sands_of_eon.name: Royal Pocket Watch
sands_of_eon.desc: A pocket watch that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Passed down from generation to generation, it has witnessed many years of history.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Royal Silver Urn
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: An ornamental urn that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Mournful winds seem to echo within its empty interior.

circlet_of_logos.name: Royal Masque
circlet_of_logos.desc: A masquerade mask worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Its hollow eyes are fixated on the golden days of the past.

ocean_hued_clam.name: Ocean-Hued Clam
ocean_hued_clam.4pc:
When the character equipping this artifact set heals a character in the party, a Sea-Dyed Foam will appear for 3 seconds, accumulating the amount of HP recovered from healing (including overflow healing).
At the end of the duration, the Sea-Dyed Foam will explode, dealing DMG to nearby opponents based on 90% of the accumulated healing.
(This DMG is calculated similarly to Reactions such as Electro-Charged, and Superconduct, but it is not affected by Elemental Mastery, Character Levels, or Reaction DMG Bonuses).
Only one Sea-Dyed Foam can be produced every 3.5 seconds.
Each Sea-Dyed Foam can accumulate up to 30,000 HP (including overflow healing).
There can be no more than one Sea-Dyed Foam active at any given time.
This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

flower_of_life.name: Sea-Dyed Blossom
flower_of_life.desc: A soft flower that has taken on the many shades of the capricious ocean. It shines with wondrous colors under the moon's silver light.

plume_of_death.name: Deep Palace's Plume
plume_of_death.desc: A down feather with the same hue as coral, said to come from a shrine maiden's ceremonial garment.

sands_of_eon.name: Cowry of Parting
sands_of_eon.desc: A clean, flawless shell that comes from the bottomless ocean.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Pearl Cage
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: The shining pearls that the shrine maidens of Watatsumi Island offer up shine eternally and never dim.

circlet_of_logos.name: Crown of Watatsumi
circlet_of_logos.desc: An ancient, intricate crown that was once used by a forgotten clergy member. Today, this relic has been enshrined with great ceremony by the people of Watatsumi.

pale_flame.name: Pale Flame
pale_flame.4pc: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.

flower_of_life.name: Stainless Bloom
flower_of_life.desc: A hard, blue artificial flower. Its petals shall never wither, nor shall its colors fade.

plume_of_death.name: Wise Doctor's Pinion
plume_of_death.desc: An ominous pinion with edges of unsurpassed keenness. Perhaps it represents an unnaturally uninhibited nature.

sands_of_eon.name: Moment of Cessation
sands_of_eon.desc: A pocket watch with a cover that cannot be opened. Yet it ticks and tocks away, following the inexorable flow of time.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Surpassing Cup
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: An intricately-made cup. Its appearance betrays nothing of its age to an observer.

circlet_of_logos.name: Mocking Mask
circlet_of_logos.desc: A mask that covers the face, hiding one's expression from others.

retracing_bolide.name: Retracing Bolide
retracing_bolide.4pc: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

flower_of_life.name: Summer Night's Bloom
flower_of_life.desc: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

plume_of_death.name: Summer Night's Finale
plume_of_death.desc: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

sands_of_eon.name: Summer Night's Moment
sands_of_eon.desc: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

circlet_of_logos.name: Summer Night's Mask
circlet_of_logos.desc: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.

shimenawas_reminiscence.name: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
shimenawas_reminiscence.4pc: When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s. This effect will not trigger again during that duration.

flower_of_life.name: Entangling Bloom
flower_of_life.desc: A lovely amulet made from twisted paper cord. It is said to hold the power to make wishes come true.

plume_of_death.name: Shaft of Remembrance
plume_of_death.desc: A demon-slaying arrow of a rather ancient make. It seems to have been preserved with great care by someone, even until the present day.

sands_of_eon.name: Morning Dew's Moment
sands_of_eon.desc: A bronze pocket watch adorned with twisted paper cord and a bell. Its hands are forever frozen at the dawn of a certain autumn day.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Hopeful Heart
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A special fortune-telling cylindrical object. The mechanism at the bottom allows one to easily remove all unwanted wish sticks.

circlet_of_logos.name: Capricious Visage
circlet_of_logos.desc: A well-preserved ceremonial fox mask. A small, enigmatic smile ever graces its lips.

tenacity_of_the_millelith.name: Tenacity of the Millelith
tenacity_of_the_millelith.4pc: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

flower_of_life.name: Flower of Accolades
flower_of_life.desc: A flower made from gold leaf. It represents the glories and honors attained by its wearer

plume_of_death.name: Ceremonial War-Plume
plume_of_death.desc: A falcon feather worn on ceremonial occasions. It displays the dignity and resolve of Liyue Harbor to the outside world.

sands_of_eon.name: Orichalceous Time-Dial
sands_of_eon.desc: A simple device for telling time. This was once standard-issue for the Millelith during times of war.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Noble's Pledging Vessel
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A golden cup used by the Millelith to take their oaths. Still bears the lovely scent of wine.

circlet_of_logos.name: General's Ancient Helm
circlet_of_logos.desc: A splendorous helmet from ages past. Clean the dust away and it will look brand-new once more.

thundering_fury.name: Thundering Fury
thundering_fury.4pc: Increases DMG caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, Superconduct, and Hyperbloom by 40%, and the DMG Bonus conferred by Aggravate is increased by 20%. When Quicken or the aforementioned Elemental Reactions are triggered, Elemental Skill CD is decreased by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

flower_of_life.name: Thunderbird's Mercy
flower_of_life.desc: A lightning-infused flower, somehow spared the fate of being trodden underfoot or reduced to ash by the furious purple fire, making it the sole survivor on the day of disaster.

plume_of_death.name: Survivor of Catastrophe
plume_of_death.desc: A lightning-charged feather that still flickers with the wrath of the Thunderbird's cruel retribution.

sands_of_eon.name: Hourglass of Thunder
sands_of_eon.desc: The hourglass used to foretell the coming of the Thunderbird by the tribe that worshiped it. It has fallen into eternal silence now that the tribe is no more.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Omen of Thunderstorm
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A ceremonial cup that holds the blood of the innocent. It is brimming with the thundering fury of the prayers that echo within.

circlet_of_logos.name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
circlet_of_logos.desc: A crown once worn by an ancient shaman who worshiped the Thunderbird. The capricious beast remained unmoved by the shaman's devotion.

thundersoother.name: Thundersoother
thundersoother.4pc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.

flower_of_life.name: Thundersoother's Heart
flower_of_life.desc: A flower that blooms even amidst ferocious thunder and lightning. To this day, it still grants courage to travelers in thunderstorms.

plume_of_death.name: Thundersoother's Plume
plume_of_death.desc: The feather of a predatory bird that soars through lightning storms. It was said to have been adopted as an insignia by the legendary hero who pacified thunder and lightning.

sands_of_eon.name: Hour of Soothing Thunder
sands_of_eon.desc: A timepiece kept by hero who conquered thunder and lightning. The tiny shard of Electro crystal within flow back and forth with the passing of time.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Thundersoother's Goblet
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: The wine goblet from which the Thundersoother, who defeated the Beast of Thunder, once drank violet lightning.

circlet_of_logos.name: Thundersoother's Diadem
circlet_of_logos.desc: The crown given to the Thundersoother for defeating the Beast of Thunder that had been wreaking havoc upon the land.

vermillion_hereafter.name: Vermillion Hereafter
vermillion_hereafter.4pc: After using an Elemental Burst. this character will gain the Nascent Light effect, increasing their ATK by 8% for 16s. When the character's HP decreases, their ATK will further increase by 10%. This increase can occur this way maximum of 4 times. This effect can be triggered once every 0.8s. Nascent Light will be dispelled when the character leaves the field. If an Elemental Burst is used again during the duration of Nascent Light, the original Nascent Light will be dispelled.

flower_of_life.name: Flowering Life
flower_of_life.desc: An ancient memento. It still looks as alive as the being that preserved it several centuries ago.

plume_of_death.name: Feather of Nascent Light
plume_of_death.desc: A dimly lustrous pinion steeped in strong memories.

sands_of_eon.name: Solar Relic
sands_of_eon.desc: An ancient timepiece with a mighty solid look. Its luster is produced by sand crystal.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Moment of the Pact
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: An old cup made of sand crystal. Its luster is somehow undimmed by age.

circlet_of_logos.name: Thundering Poise
circlet_of_logos.desc: This mask is said to have been made by the mountain people for a Yaksha. It is of simple make, but its surface still shines brightly nonetheless.

viridescent_venerer.name: Viridescent Venerer
viridescent_venerer.4pc: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

flower_of_life.name: In Remembrance of Viridescent Fields
flower_of_life.desc: A wild flower that was once a ubiquitous sight in its homeland. It was picked by a hunter who wore it on their chest.

plume_of_death.name: Viridescent Arrow Feather
plume_of_death.desc: The fletching of an arrow that once pierced right through its prey, but somehow still remains spotless.

sands_of_eon.name: Viridescent Venerer's Determination
sands_of_eon.desc: A wondrous instrument that a hunter once wore. It forever points towards their prey.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Viridescent Venerer's Vessel
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: A water pouch used by the Viridescent Venerer. Its capacity is much greater than one would expect.

circlet_of_logos.name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
circlet_of_logos.desc: A proud crown that once belonged to the Viridescent Venerer. It is as lush and green as the breezes of the wild.

wanderers_troupe.name: Wanderer's Troupe
wanderers_troupe.4pc: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.

flower_of_life.name: Troupe's Dawnlight
flower_of_life.desc: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

plume_of_death.name: Bard's Arrow Feather
plume_of_death.desc: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

sands_of_eon.name: Concert's Final Hour
sands_of_eon.desc: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.

goblet_of_eonothem.name: Wanderer's String-Kettle
goblet_of_eonothem.desc: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which plays a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

circlet_of_logos.name: Conductor's Top Hat
circlet_of_logos.desc: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.

amber.name: Amber
amber.title: Gliding Champion
amber.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

barbara.name: Barbara
barbara.title: Shining Idol
barbara.description: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

beidou.name: Beidou
beidou.title: Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean
beidou.description: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

bennett.name: Bennett
bennett.title: Trial by Fire
bennett.description: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

candace.name: Candace
candace.title: Golden Vow
candace.description: A descendant of King Deshret with an amber left eye. The defender of Aaru Village.

chongyun.name: Chongyun
chongyun.title: Frozen Ardor
chongyun.description: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

collei.name: Collei
collei.title: Sprout of Rebirth
collei.description: A trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest. Behind her enthusiastic words and actions hides a slightly introverted personality.

diona.name: Diona
diona.title: Kätzlein Cocktail
diona.description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

dori.name: Dori
dori.title: Treasure of Dream Garden
dori.description: An elusive merchant who has a fondness for glittering Mora.

faruzan.name: Faruzan
faruzan.title: Enigmatic Machinist
faruzan.description: "Much of the content found within this book originates from Madam Faruzan's theories and manuscripts. It is our hope that future generations of scholars will remember her name when she returns to the Akademiya." — Quote from the book "Introduction to Ancient Machines." This text was released almost a century ago and is still on the Kshahrewar's essential reading list today.

fischl.name: Fischl
fischl.title: Prinzessin der Verurteilung!
fischl.description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

gorou.name: Gorou
gorou.title: Canine Warrior
gorou.description: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

kaeya.name: Kaeya
kaeya.title: Frostwind Swordsman
kaeya.description: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

kujou_sara.name: Kujou Sara
kujou_sara.title: Crowfeather Kaburaya
kujou_sara.description: A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.

kuki_shinobu.name: Kuki Shinobu
kuki_shinobu.title: Mender of Tribulations
kuki_shinobu.description: The capable and reliable deputy leader of the "Arataki Gang." Please note: capable and reliable are not appellations for the "Arataki Gang," but for their deputy leader in specific.

layla.name: Layla
layla.title: Fantastical Evening Star
layla.description: A Rtawahist student who specializes in Theoretical Astrology. Heavily prone to somnambulism and locked in a grinding war with sleep deprivation, the problem of restful slumber is a most troubling one to her.

lisa.name: Lisa
lisa.title: Witch of Purple Rose
lisa.description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

ningguang.name: Ningguang
ningguang.title: Eclipsing Star
ningguang.description: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

noelle.name: Noelle
noelle.title: Chivalric Blossom
noelle.description: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

razor.name: Razor
razor.title: Wolf Boy
razor.description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

rosaria.name: Rosaria
rosaria.title: Thorny Benevolence
rosaria.description: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

sayu.name: Sayu
sayu.title: Mujina Ninja
sayu.description: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

shikanoin_heizou.name: Shikanoin Heizou
shikanoin_heizou.title: Analytical Harmony
shikanoin_heizou.description: A young prodigy detective from the Tenryou Commission. His senses are sharp and his thoughts are clear.

sucrose.name: Sucrose
sucrose.title: Harmless Sweetie
sucrose.description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

thoma.name: Thoma
thoma.title: Protector From Afar
thoma.description: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

xiangling.name: Xiangling
xiangling.title: Exquisite Delicacy
xiangling.description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

xingqiu.name: Xingqiu
xingqiu.title: Juvenile Galant
xingqiu.description: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

xinyan.name: Xinyan
xinyan.title: Blazing Riff
xinyan.description: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

yanfei.name: Yanfei
yanfei.title: Wise Innocence
yanfei.description: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

yaoyao.name: Yaoyao
yaoyao.title: Burgeoning Grace
yaoyao.description: Streetward Rambler's youngest disciple. A gentle and caring "little adult."

yun_jin.name: Yun Jin
yun_jin.title: Stage Lucida
yun_jin.description: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.

albedo.name: Albedo
albedo.title: Kreideprinz
albedo.description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

alhaitham.name: Alhaitham
alhaitham.title: Admonishing Instruction
alhaitham.description: The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya, a man endowed with extraordinary intelligence and talent. He lives free — free from the searching eyes of ordinary people, anyway.

aloy.name: Aloy
aloy.title: Savior From Another World
aloy.description: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

arataki_itto.name: Arataki Itto
arataki_itto.title: Hanamizaka Heroics
arataki_itto.description: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

cyno.name: Cyno
cyno.title: Judicator of Secrets
cyno.description: The General Mahamatra in charge of supervising the researchers of the Akademiya. It is said that when he gets down to work, the General Mahamatra is even more efficient than the "Great Vayuvyastra" made by the Kshahrewar.

diluc.name: Diluc
diluc.title: The Dark Side of Dawn
diluc.description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

eula.name: Eula
eula.title: Dance of the Shimmering Wave
eula.description: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

ganyu.name: Ganyu
ganyu.title: Plenilune Gaze
ganyu.description: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

hu_tao.name: Hu Tao
hu_tao.title: Fragrance in Thaw
hu_tao.description: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

jean.name: Jean
jean.title: Dandelion Knight
jean.description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

kaedehara_kazuha.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
kaedehara_kazuha.title: Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves
kaedehara_kazuha.description: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

kamisato_ayaka.name: Kamisato Ayaka
kamisato_ayaka.title: Frostflake Heron
kamisato_ayaka.description: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

kamisato_ayato.name: Kamisato Ayato
kamisato_ayato.title: Pillar of Fortitude
kamisato_ayato.description: The young but highly accomplished head of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Cultured and polite, he is a man of many ways and means.

keqing.name: Keqing
keqing.title: Driving Thunder
keqing.description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

klee.name: Klee
klee.title: Fleeing Sunlight
klee.description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

mona.name: Mona
mona.title: Astral Reflection
mona.description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

nahida.name: Nahida
nahida.title: Physic of Purity
nahida.description: A caged bird secluded within the confines of the Sanctuary of Surasthana who can only see the world in her dreams.

nilou.name: Nilou
nilou.title: Dance of Lotuslight
nilou.description: "What's so great about that little theater? If she went with me on tour all around Teyvat, she could earn so much Mora, more than what she could ever dream of... Alas, she's too innocent. So innocent that she knows nothing of her own worth." — Dori

qiqi.name: Qiqi
qiqi.title: Icy Resurrection
qiqi.description: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

raiden_shogun.name: Raiden Shogun
raiden_shogun.title: Plane of Euthymia
raiden_shogun.description: Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.

sangonomiya_kokomi.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
sangonomiya_kokomi.title: Pearl of Wisdom
sangonomiya_kokomi.description: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

shenhe.name: Shenhe
shenhe.title: Lonesome Transcendence
shenhe.description: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.

tartaglia.name: Tartaglia
tartaglia.title: Childe
tartaglia.description: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

tighnari.name: Tighnari
tighnari.title: Verdant Strider
tighnari.description: A young researcher well-versed in botany who currently serves as a Forest Watcher in Avidya Forest. He is a straight shooter with a warm heart - and a dab hand at guiding even the dullest of pupils.

venti.name: Venti
venti.title: Windborne Bard
venti.description: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

wanderer.name: Wanderer
wanderer.title: Eons Adrift
wanderer.description: "Those who believe cast the gods in glory, while unbelievers witness how gods transcend. But as for him, I will not characterize him as either. All uncertainties are but foundations for his future path."  — Blessed One of Wisdom, Mahakusaladhamma – Buer

xiao.name: Xiao
xiao.title: Vigilant Yaksha
xiao.description: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

yae_miko.name: Yae Miko
yae_miko.title: Astute Amusement
yae_miko.description: Lady Guuji of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Also serves as the editor-in-chief of Yae Publishing House. Unimaginable intelligence and cunning are hidden under her beautiful appearance.

yelan.name: Yelan
yelan.title: Valley Orchid
yelan.description: A mysterious person who claims to work for the Ministry of Civil Affairs, but is a "non-entity" on the Ministry of Civil Affairs' list.

yoimiya.name: Yoimiya
yoimiya.title: Frolicking Flames
yoimiya.description: Owner of Naganohara Fireworks. Known as "Queen of the Summer Festival," she excels in her craft of creating fireworks that symbolize people's hopes and dreams.

zhongli.name: Zhongli
zhongli.title: Vago Mundo
zhongli.description: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

talents.name: Sharpshooter
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Explosive Puppet
talents.desc: The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage. Baron Bunny Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire. Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP. When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Hold Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny. The longer the button is held, the further the throw.

talents.name: Fiery Rain
talents.desc: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
talents.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of <color=skill>Fiery Rain</color> by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

talents.name: Precise Shot
talents.desc: <color=skill>Aimed Shot</color> hits on weak spots increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

talents.name: Gliding Champion
talents.desc:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.desc: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Bunny Triggered
constellations.desc: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting <color=skill>Baron Bunny</color>'s foot with a fully-charged <color=skill>Aimed Shot</color> manually detonates it.Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

constellations.name: It Burns!
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Fiery Rain</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
constellations.desc: Decreases <color=skill>Explosive Puppet</color>'s CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: It's Baron Bunny!
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Explosive Puppet</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Fiery Rain</color> increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

talents.name: Whisper of Water
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Let the Show Begin♪
talents.desc: Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and applying the Wet status to them. Melody Loop ● On hit, Barbara's Normal Attacks heal your own party members and nearby teammates for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP. ● On hit, Barbara's Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing. ● Periodically regenerates your own active character's HP. ● Applies the Wet status to the character and to opponents who come in contact with them.

talents.name: Shining Miracle♪
talents.desc: Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.

talents.name: Glorious Season
talents.desc: The Stamina Consumption of characters within <color=skill>Let the Show Begin♪</color>'s Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

talents.name: Encore
talents.desc:
When your active character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of the Melody Loop of <color=skill>Let the Show Begin♪</color> is extended by 1s.
The maximum extension is 5s.

talents.name: With My Whole Heart♪
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Barbara has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Gleeful Songs
constellations.desc: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

constellations.name: Vitality Burst
constellations.desc:
Decreases the CD of <color=skill>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>.

constellations.name: Star of Tomorrow
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Shining Miracle♪</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attentiveness be My Power
constellations.desc:
Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

constellations.name: The Purest Companionship
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dedicating Everything to You
constellations.desc:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
● Automatically revives the fallen character.
● Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

talents.name: Oceanborne
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Tidecaller
talents.desc: Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder. Press Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG. Hold Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP. Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice. The shield possesses the following properties: ● Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency. ● Applies the Electro element to Beidou upon activation.

talents.name: Stormbreaker
talents.desc: Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents. Thunderbeast's Targe ● When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between opponents, dealing Electro DMG. ● Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken. A maximum of 1 lightning discharge can be triggered per second.

talents.name: Retribution
talents.desc: Counterattacking with <color=skill>Tidecaller</color> at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

talents.name: Lightning Storm
talents.desc:
Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing <ccolor=skill>Tidecaller</color> with its maximum DMG Bonus:
● DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
● Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

talents.name: Conqueror of Tides
talents.desc:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption of your characters in the party by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Stormbreaker</color> is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Stormbreaker</color>'s arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

constellations.name: Summoner of Storm
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Tidecaller</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Stunning Revenge
constellations.desc: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> for 10s.

constellations.name: Crimson Tidewalker
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Stormbreaker</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bane of Evil
constellations.desc: During the duration of <color=skill>Stormbreaker</color>, the <color=electro>Electro RES</color> of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

talents.name: Strike of Fortune
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Passion Overload
talents.desc: Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is... Press A single, swift flame strike that deals Pyro DMG. Hold (Short) Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level. ● Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing Pyro DMG and launching opponents. ● Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive Pyro DMG, but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennett and the enemy. Bennett takes no damage from being launched.

talents.name: Fantastic Voyage
talents.desc: Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field. Inspiration Field ● If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP. ● If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK. ● Imbues characters within the AoE with Pyro.

talents.name: Rekindle
talents.desc: Decreases <color=skill>Passion Overload</color>'s CD by 20%.

talents.name: Fearnaught
talents.desc: When inside <color=skill>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s circle, <color=skill>Passion Overload</color>'s CD is decreased by 50% and Bennett cannot be launched by this skill's explosion.

talents.name: It Should Be Safe...
talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Grand Expectation
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

constellations.name: Impasse Conqueror
constellations.desc: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Unstoppable Fervor
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Passion Overload</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unexpected Odyssey
constellations.desc:
Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

constellations.name: True Explorer
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Fantastic Voyage</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fire Ventures With Me
constellations.desc: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside <color=skill>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s radius gain a 15% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> and their weapons are infused with <color=pyro>Pyro</color>.

talents.name: Gleaming Spear: Guardian Stance
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to four consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum
talents.desc: Tap Rushes forward with her shield, dealing Hydro DMG to opponents in front of her. Hold Raises her shield to block incoming attacks from nearby opponents, forming a barrier that absorbs DMG based on her Max HP and absorbs Hydro DMG 250% more effectively. This barrier lasts until the Elemental Skill is unleashed. After holding for a certain period of time, Candace will finish charging, and when the skill button is released, the skill duration expires, or when the barrier is broken, she will perform a leaping strike that deals Hydro DMG to opponents in front of her.

talents.name: Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide
talents.desc: Raising her weapon high, Candace calls upon a divine blessing that deals AoE Hydro DMG based on her Max HP and continuously confers the Prayer of the Crimson Crown on your active character. Prayer of the Crimson Crown This effect has the following properties: ● Characters deal increased Elemental DMG with their Normal Attacks. ● Whenever a character takes the field, they will unleash a rippling wave of water that deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents. There is a limited number of waves that can be triggered in the duration of this skill. ● Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters under this effect will obtain a Hydro Infusion.

talents.name: Aegis of Crossed Arrows
talents.desc: If Candace is hit by an attack in the Hold duration of <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color>, that skill will finish charging instantly.

talents.name: Celestial Dome of Sand
talents.desc: Characters affected by the Prayer of the Crimson Crown caused by <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide</color> will deal 0.5% increased DMG to opponents for every 1,000 points of Candace's Max HP when they deal Elemental DMG with their Normal Attacks.

talents.name: To Dawn's First Light
talents.desc:
Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Returning Heiress of the Scarlet Sands
constellations.desc: The duration of Prayer of the Crimson Crown effect triggered by <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide</color> is increased by 3s.

constellations.name: Moon-Piercing Brilliance
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color> hits opponents, Candace's Max HP will be increased by 20% for 15s.

constellations.name: Hunter's Supplication
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sentinel Oath
constellations.desc: Shortens the Hold CD of <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color> to be the same as that of the Tapping CD.

constellations.name: Heterochromatic Gaze
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Overflow
constellations.desc:
When characters (excluding Candace herself) affected by the Prayer of the Crimson Crown caused by Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide deal Elemental DMG to opponents using Normal Attacks, an attack wave will be unleashed that deals <color=hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</color> equal to 15% of Candace's Max HP.
This effect can trigger once every 2.3s and is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

talents.name: Demonbane
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost
talents.desc:
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a <color=cryo>Cryo</color> explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>.
After a short delay, the cold air created by the <color=cryo>Cryo</color> explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with <color=cryo>Cryo</color>.

talents.name: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star
talents.desc:
Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.
When the spirit blades explode, they will deal <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color> and launch opponents.

talents.name: Steady Breathing
talents.desc: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by <color=skill>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

talents.name: Rimechaser Blade
talents.desc:
When the field created by <color=skill>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.
Opponents hit by this blade will have their <color=cryo>Cryo RES</color> decreased by 10% for 8s.

talents.name: Gallant Journey
talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.desc: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.desc: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by <color=skill>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.desc:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by <color=cryo>Cryo</color>.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star</color> deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

talents.name: Supplicant's Bowmanship
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, Dendro energy will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged arrow will deal Dendro DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Floral Brush
talents.desc:
Throws out a Floral Ring that deals 1 instance of <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> to targets it comes into contact with.
The Floral Ring will return after a set time, dealing <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> once again.

talents.name: Trump-Card Kitty
talents.desc:
Trusty Cuilein-Anbar comes to save the day!
Throws the doll named Cuilein-Anbar, causing an explosion that deals <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color>, creating a Cuilein-Anbar Zone. Cuilein-Anbar will bounce around within this zone, dealing <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Floral Sidewinder
talents.desc:
If one of your party members has triggered Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions before the Floral Ring returns, it will grant the character the Sprout effect upon return, which will continuously deal <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> equivalent to 40% of Collei's ATK to nearby opponents for 3s.
If another Sprout effect is triggered during its initial duration, the initial effect will be removed. DMG dealt by Sprout is considered Elemental Skill DMG.

talents.name: The Languid Wood
talents.desc:
When a character within the Cuilein-Anbar Zone triggers Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions, the Zone's duration will be increased by 1s.
A single <color=skill>Trump-Card Kitty</color> can be extended by up to 3s.

talents.name: Gliding Champion of Sumeru
talents.desc:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Deepwood Patrol
constellations.desc: When in the party and not on the field, Collei's Energy Recharge is increased by 20%.

constellations.name: Through Hill and Copse
constellations.desc:
