The Passive Talent <color=skill>Floral Sidewinder</color> is changed to this:
The Floral Ring will grant the character the Sprout effect from <color=skill>Floral Sidewinder</color> upon return, dealing 40% of Collei's ATK as <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> to nearby opponents for 3s.
From the moment of using <color=skill>Floral Brush</color> to the moment when this instance of Sprout effect ends, if any of your party members triggers Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions, the Sprout effect will be extended by 3s.
The Sprout effect can only be extended this way once. If another Sprout effect is triggered during its initial duration, the initial effect will be removed.
Requires you to have unlocked the <color=skill>Floral Sidewinder</color> Passive Talent.

constellations.name: Scent of Summer
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Floral Brush</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Gift of the Woods
constellations.desc: Using <color=skill>Trump-Card Kitty</color> will increase all nearby characters' Elemental Mastery by 60 for 12s (not including Collei herself).

constellations.name: All Embers
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Trump-Card Kitty</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Forest of Falling Arrows
constellations.desc:
When the Floral Ring hits, it will create a miniature Cuilein-Anbar that will deal 200% of Collei's ATK as <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color>.
Each <color=skill>Floral Brush</color> can only create one such miniature Cuilein-Anbar.

talents.name: Kätzlein Style
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Icy Paws
talents.desc: Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target. Press Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws. Hold Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws. The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus. The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration.

talents.name: Signature Mix
talents.desc: Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE. Drunken Mist ● Deals continuous Cryo DMG to opponents within the AoE. ● Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE.

talents.name: Cat's Tail Secret Menu
talents.desc: Characters shielded by <color=skill>Icy Paws</color> have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

talents.name: Drunkards' Farce
talents.desc: Opponents who enter the AoE of <color=skill>Signature Mix</color> have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.

talents.name: Complimentary Bar Food
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Diona has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: A Lingering Flavor
constellations.desc: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of <color=skill>Signature Mix</color> end.

constellations.name: Shaken, Not Purred
constellations.desc:
Increases <color=skill>Icy Paws</color>' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.
Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the <color=skill>Icy Paws</color> shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

constellations.name: A—Another Round?
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Signature Mix</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wine Industry Slayer
constellations.desc: Within the radius of <color=skill>Signature Mix</color>, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

constellations.name: Double Shot, on the Rocks
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Icy Paws</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
constellations.desc:
Characters within <color=skill>Signature Mix</color>'s radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
● Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
● Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

talents.name: Marvelous Sword-Dance (Modified)
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 3 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon
talents.desc:
Directs a Spirit-Warding Lamp to fire off Troubleshooter Shots at opponents, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.
When Troubleshooter Shots hit opponents, they will create 2 After-Sales Service Rounds that will automatically track opponents and deal <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Alcazarzaray's Exactitude
talents.desc: Summons forth the Jinni within the lamp to give the client various kinds of aid. Jinni Connects to a nearby character. The connected character will: ● Continuously restore HP based on Dori's Max HP. ● Continuously regenerate Energy. ● Be affected by Electro. When the connector between the Jinni and the character touches opponents, it will deal one instance of Electro DMG to them every 0.4s. Only one Jinni can exist at one time.

talents.name: An Eye for Gold
talents.desc:
After a character connected to the Jinni triggers an Electro-Charged, Superconduct, Overloaded, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or an <color=electro>Electro</color> Swirl or Crystallize reaction, the CD of <color=skill>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color> is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

talents.name: Compound Interest
talents.desc:
When the Troubleshooter Shots or After-Sales Service Rounds from <color=skill>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color> hit opponents, Dori will restore 5 Elemental Energy for every 100% Energy Recharge possessed.
Per <color=skill>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color>, only one instance of Energy restoration can be triggered and a maximum of 15 Energy can be restored this way.

talents.name: Unexpected Order
talents.desc: When Dori crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Additional Investment
constellations.desc: The number of After-Sales Service Rounds created by Troubleshooter Shots is increased by 1.

constellations.name: Special Franchise
constellations.desc: When you are in combat and the Jinni heals the character it is connected to, it will fire a Jinni Toop from that character's position that deals 50% of Dori's ATK DMG.

constellations.name: Wonders Never Cease
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Alcazarzaray's Exactitude</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Discretionary Supplement
constellations.desc:
The character connected to the Jinni will obtain the following buffs based on their current HP and Energy:
● When their HP is lower than 50%, they gain 50% Incoming Healing Bonus.
● When their Energy is less than 50%, they gain 30% Energy Recharge.

constellations.name: Value for Mora
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sprinkling Weight
constellations.desc:
Dori gains the following effects for 3s after using <color=skill>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color>:
● <color=electro>Electro Infusion</color>.
● When Normal Attacks hit opponents, all nearby party members will heal HP equivalent to 4% of Dori's Max HP. This type of healing can occur once every 0.1s.

talents.name: Parthian Shot
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, mighty winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, hitting opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Wind Realm of Nasamjnin
talents.desc: Faruzan deploys a polyhedron that deals AoE Anemo DMG to nearby opponents. She will also enter the Manifest Gale state. While in the Manifest Gale state, Faruzan's next fully charged shot will consume this state and will become a Hurricane Arrow that contains high-pressure currents. This arrow deals Anemo DMG based on the DMG of a fully charged Aimed Shot from "Normal Attack: Parthian Shot." Pressurized Collapse The Hurricane Arrow will apply a Pressurized Collapse effect to the opponent or character hit. This effect will be removed after a short delay, creating a vortex that deals AoE Anemo DMG and pulls nearby objects and opponents in. If the Hurricane Arrow does not hit any opponent or character, it will create a Pressurized Collapse effect at its point of impact. The vortex DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.

talents.name: The Wind's Secret Ways
talents.desc: Faruzan deploys a Dazzling Polyhedron that unleashes a Whirlwind Pulse and deals AoE Anemo DMG. While the Dazzling Polyhedron persists, it will continuously move along a triangular path. Once it reaches each corner of that triangular path, it will unleash 1 more Whirlwind Pulse. Whirlwind Pulse ● When the Whirlwind Pulse is unleashed, it will apply Perfidious Wind's Bale to nearby opponents, decreasing their Anemo RES. ● The Whirlwind Pulse will also apply Prayerful Wind's Benefit to all nearby party members when it is unleashed, granting them an Anemo DMG Bonus.

talents.name: Impetuous Flow
talents.desc: When Faruzan is in the Manifest Gale state created by <color=skill>Wind Realm of Nasamjnin</color>, the amount of time taken to charge a shot is decreased by 60%, and she can apply <color=skill>The Wind's Secret Ways</color>' Perfidious Wind's Bale to opponents who are hit by the vortex created by Pressurized Collapse.

talents.name: Lost Wisdom of the Seven Caverns
talents.desc: When characters affected by <color=skill>The Wind's Secret Ways</color>' Prayerful Wind's Gift deal <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color> using Normal, Charged, Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, or Elemental Bursts to opponents, they will gain the Hurricane Guard effect: This DMG will be increased based on 32% of Faruzan's Base ATK. 1 instance of Hurricane Guard can occur once every 0.8s. This DMG Bonus will be cleared after Prayerful Wind's Benefit expires or after the effect is triggered once.

talents.name: Tomes Light the Path
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Sumeru Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Truth by Any Means
constellations.desc: Faruzan can fire off a maximum of 2 Hurricane Arrows using fully charged Aimed Shots while under a single <color=skill>Wind Realm of Nasamjnin</color> effect.

constellations.name: Overzealous Intellect
constellations.desc: The duration of the Dazzling Polyhedron created by <color=skill>The Wind's Secret Ways</color> is increased by 6s.

constellations.name: Spirit-Orchard Stroll
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Wind Realm of Nasamjnin</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Comprehension
constellations.desc:
The vortex created by Pressurized Collapses will restore Energy to Faruzan based on the number of opponents hit: If it hits 1 opponent, it will restore 2 Energy for Faruzan. Each additional opponent hit will restore 0.5 more Energy for Faruzan.
A maximum of 4 Energy can be restored to her per vortex.

constellations.name: Wonderland of Rumination
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>The Wind's Secret Ways</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
constellations.desc: Characters affected by <color=skill>The Wind's Secret Ways</color>' Prayerful Wind's Benefit have 40% increased CRIT DMG when they deal <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color>. When the active character deals DMG while affected by Prayerful Wind's Benefit, they will apply Pressurized Collapse to the opponent damaged. This effect can be triggered once every 3s. This CD is shared between all party members.

talents.name: Bolts of Downfall
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsüchtig Blitz shall deal immense Electro DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Nightrider
talents.desc:
Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> in a small AoE.
For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby opponents with Freikugel.

Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to.
Press again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side.

talents.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
talents.desc:
Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl.
Has the following properties during the ability's duration:
● Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed.
● Strikes nearby opponents with lightning, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> to opponents she comes in contact with. Each opponent can only be struck once.
● Once this ability's effects end, Oz will remain on the battlefield and attack his Prinzessin's foes. If Oz is already on the field, then this will reset the duration of his presence.

talents.name: Stellar Predator
talents.desc: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color> equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

talents.name: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex
talents.desc: If your active character triggers an <color=electro>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</color> when Oz is on the field, the opponent shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.

talents.name: Mein Hausgarten
talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.desc: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

constellations.name: Devourer of All Sins
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Nightrider</color> is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Nightrider</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> is used, it deals 222% of ATK as <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.
When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellations.name: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evernight Raven
constellations.desc: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Ripping Fang Fletching
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, stone crystals will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged crystalline arrow will deal Geo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Inuzaka All-Round Defense
talents.desc: Deals AoE Geo DMG and sets up a General's War Banner. General's War Banner Provides up to 3 buffs to active characters within the skill's AoE based on the number of Geo characters in the party at the time of casting: ● 1 Geo character: Adds "Standing Firm" - DEF Bonus. ● 2 Geo characters: Adds "Impregnable" - Increased resistance to interruption. ● 3 Geo characters: Adds "Crunch" - Geo DMG Bonus. Gorou can deploy only 1 General's War Banner on the field at any one time. Characters can only benefit from 1 General's War Banner at a time. When a party member leaves the field, the active buff will last for 2s. Hold Adjust the location of the skill.

talents.name: Juuga: Forward Unto Victory
talents.desc: Displaying his valor as a general, Gorou deals Aoe Geo DMG and creates a field known as General's Glory to embolden his comrades. General's Glory This field has the following properties: ● Like the General's War Banner created by Inuzaka All-Round Defense, provides buffs to active characters within the skill's AoE based on the number of Geo characters in the party. Also moves together with your active character. ● Generates 1 Crystal Collapse every 1.5s that deals AoE Geo DMG to 1 opponent within the skill's AoE. ● Pulls 1 elemental shard in the skill's AoE to your active character's position every 1.5s (elemental shards are created by Crystallize reactions). If a General's War banner created by Gorou currently exists on the field when his ability is used, it will be destroyed. In addition, for the duration of General's Glory, Gorou's Elemental Skill "Inazuka All-Round Defense" will not create the General's War Banner. If Gorou falls, the effects of General's Glory will be cleared.

talents.name: Heedless of the Wind and Weather
talents.desc: After using <color=skill>Juuga: Forward Unto Victory</color>, all nearby party members' DEF is increased by 25% for 12s.

talents.name: A Favor Repaid
talents.desc:
Gorou receives the following DMG Bonuses to his attacks based on his DEF:
● <color=skill>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color>: Skill DMG increased by 156% of DEF
● <color=skill>Juuga: Forward Unto Victory</color>: Skill DMG and Crystal Collapse DMG increased by 15.6% of DEF

talents.name: Seeker of Shinies
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Inazuma on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
constellations.desc: When characters (other than Gorou) within the AoE of Gorou's General's War Banner or General's Glory deal <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> to opponents, the CD of Gorou's <color=skill>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color> is decreased by 2s. This effect can occur once every 10s.

constellations.name: Sitting Hound: Steady as a Clock
constellations.desc: While General's Glory is in effect, its duration is extended by 1s when a nearby active character obtains an Elemental Shard from a Crystallize reaction. This effect can occur once every 0.1s. Max extension is 3s.

constellations.name: Mauling Hound: Fierce as Fire
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lapping Hound: Warm as Water
constellations.desc: When General's Glory is in the "Impregnable" or "Crunch" states, it will also heal active characters within its AoE by 50% of Gorou's own DEF every 1.5s.

constellations.name: Striking Hound: Thunderous Force
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Juuga: Forward Unto Victory</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Valiant Hound: Mountainous Fealty
constellations.desc:
For 12s after using <color=skill>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color> or <color=skill>Juuga: Forward Unto Victory</color>, increases the CRIT DMG of all nearby party members' <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> based on the buff level of the skill's field at the time of use:
● "Standing Firm": +10%
● "Impregnable": +20%
● "Crunch": +40%

This effect cannot stack and will take reference from the last instance of the effect that is triggered.

talents.name: Ceremonial Bladework
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Frostgnaw
talents.desc: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents in front of Kaeya.

talents.name: Glacial Waltz
talents.desc:
Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him.
These icicles will follow the character around and deal <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents in their path for the ability's duration.

talents.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
talents.desc: Every hit with <color=skill>Frostgnaw</color> regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

talents.name: Glacial Heart
talents.desc:
Opponents Frozen by <color=skill>Frostgnaw</color> will drop additional Elemental Particles.
<color=skill>Frostgnaw</color> may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

talents.name: Hidden Strength
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Excellent Blood
constellations.desc: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by <color=cryo>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.desc: Every time <color=skill>Glacial Waltz</color> defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

constellations.name: Dance of Frost
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Frostgnaw</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Kiss
constellations.desc:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.name: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Glacial Waltz</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Glacial Waltz</color> will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

talents.name: Tengu Bowmanship
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, crackling lightning will accumulate on the arrowhead. An arrow fully charged with the storm's might will deal Electro DMG. When in the Crowfeather Cover state, a fully-charged arrow will leave a Crowfeather behind after it hits. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Tengu Stormcall
talents.desc:
Retreats rapidly with the speed of a tengu, summoning the protection of the Crowfeather.
Gains Crowfeather Cover for 18s, and when Kujou Sara fires a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Crowfeather Cover will be consumed, and will leave a Crowfeather at the target location.
Crowfeathers will trigger Tengu Juurai: Ambush after a short time, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> and granting the active character within its AoE an ATK Bonus based on Kujou Sara's Base ATK.

The ATK Bonuses from different Tengu Juurai will not stack, and their effects and duration will be determined by the last Tengu Juurai to take effect.

talents.name: Subjugation: Koukou Sendou
talents.desc:
Casts down Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>. Afterwards, Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker spreads out into 4 consecutive bouts of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>.
Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker and Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster can provide the active character within their AoE with the same ATK Bonus as given by the Elemental Skill, <color=skill>Tengu Stormcall</color>.

The ATK Bonus provided by various kinds of Tengu Juurai will not stack, and their effects and duration will be determined by the last Tengu Juurai to take effect.

talents.name: Immovable Will
talents.desc: While in the Crowfeather Cover state provided by <color=skill>Tengu Stormcall</color>, Aimed Shot charge times are decreased by 60%.

talents.name: Decorum
talents.desc: When Tengu Juurai: Ambush hits opponents, Kujou Sara will restore 1.2 Energy to all party members for every 100% Energy Recharge she has. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

talents.name: Land Survey
talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Inazuma, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Crow's Eye
constellations.desc:
When Tengu Juurai grant characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of <color=skill>Tengu Stormcall</color> is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

constellations.name: Dark Wings
constellations.desc: Unleashing <color=skill>Tengu Stormcall</color> will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.

constellations.name: The War Within
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Subjugation: Koukou Sendou</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Conclusive Proof
constellations.desc: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by <color=skill>Subjugation: Koukou Sendou</color> is increased to 6.

constellations.name: Spellsinger
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Tengu Stormcall</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sin of Pride
constellations.desc: The <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its Crit DMG increased by 60%.

talents.name: Shinobu's Shadowsword
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Sanctifying Ring
talents.desc: Creates a Grass Ring of Sanctification at the cost of part of her HP, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents. Grass Ring of Sanctification Follows your current active character around. Deals Electro DMG to nearby opponents every 1.5s and restores HP for the active character(s) within the ring's AoE based on Kuki Shinobu's Max HP. The HP consumption from using this skill can only bring her to 20% HP.

talents.name: Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite
talents.desc:
Stabs an evil-excoriating blade into the ground, creating a field that cleanses the area of all that is foul, dealing continuous <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> to opponents within its AoE based on Shinobu's Max HP.

If Shinobu's HP is less than or equal to 50% when this skill is used, the field will last longer.

talents.name: Breaking Free
talents.desc: When Shinobu's HP is not higher than 50%, her Healing Bonus is increased by 15%.

talents.name: Heart's Repose
talents.desc:
<color=skill>Sanctifying Ring</color>'s abilities will be boosted based on Shinobu's Elemental Mastery:
● Healing amount will be increased by 75% of Elemental Mastery.
● DMG dealt is increased by 25% of Elemental Mastery.

talents.name: Protracted Prayers
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on an Inazuma Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: To Cloister Compassion
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite</color>'s AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: To Forsake Fortune
constellations.desc: Grass Ring of Sanctification's duration is increased by 3s.

constellations.name: To Sequester Sorrow
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sanctifying Ring</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Sever Sealing
constellations.desc:
When the Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks of the character affected by Shinobu's Grass Ring of Sanctification hit opponents, a Thundergrass Mark will land on the opponent's position and deal <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color> based on 9.7% of Shinobu's Max HP.
This effect can occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: To Cease Courtesies
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Ward Weakness
constellations.desc:
When Kuki Shinobu takes lethal DMG, this instance of DMG will not take her down. This effect will automatically trigger when her HP reaches 1 and will trigger once every 60s.
When Shinobu's HP drops below 25%, she will gain 150 Elemental Mastery for 15s. This effect will trigger once every 60s.

talents.name: Sword of the Radiant Path
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 3 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Nights of Formal Focus
talents.desc: Puts forth a shield known as the Curtain of Slumber, dealing AoE Cryo DMG. The Curtain of Slumber's DMG Absorption is based on Layla's Max HP and absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% effectiveness. When the shield is deployed, Layla will have Cryo applied to her briefly. Night Stars and Shooting Stars While the Curtain of Slumber is active, it will create 1 Night Star that will be attached to it every 1.5s. When a character protected by this shield uses an Elemental Skill, 2 Night Stars will be created. Night Stars can be created once every 0.3s in this way. A maximum of 4 Night Stars can be accumulated at any one time. Once the Curtain of Slumber has accumulated 4 Night Stars and there are opponents nearby, these Night Stars will transform into homing Shooting Stars that will be fired off in sequence, dealing Cryo DMG to any opponents hit. If the Curtain of Slumber's duration ends or it is destroyed, the Night Stars will disappear. If they are already being fired off as Shooting Stars, these Shooting Stars will last until this wave of shots ends. New Night Stars cannot be created until the previous wave of Shooting Stars has been fired completely. "She and I are like two master artisans who have never met, yet who sit at the same cushioned seat, embroidering the same dream-flower."

talents.name: Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker
talents.desc: Unleashes a Celestial Dreamsphere that constantly fires Starlight Slugs at opponents within its AoE, dealing Cryo DMG. When a Starlight Slug hits, it will generate 1 Night Star for nearby Curtains of Slumber. Each Curtain of Slumber can gain 1 Night Star this way every 0.5s. "Sleep now, sleep now; and may many destinies be revealed before your slumbering eyes, within your star-paved dreams."

talents.name: Like Nascent Light
talents.desc:
While the Curtain of Slumber is active, the Deep Sleep effect will activate each time the Curtain gains 1 Night Star:
● The Shield Strength of a character under the effect of the Curtain of Slumber increases by 6%.
● This effect can have a maximum of 4 stacks and persists until the Curtain of Slumber disappears.

talents.name: Sweet Slumber Undisturbed
talents.desc: The DMG dealt by the Shooting Stars fired by <color=skill>Nights of Formal Focus</color> is increased by 1.5% of Layla's Max HP.

talents.name: Shadowy Dream-Signs
talents.desc: When Layla crafts Character Talent Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Fortress of Fantasy
constellations.desc:
The Shield Absorption of the Curtain of Slumber generated by <color=skill>Nights of Formal Focus</color> is increased by 20%.
Additionally, when unleashing Nights of Formal Focus, she will generate a shield for any nearby party members who are not being protected by a Curtain of Slumber. This shield will have 35% of the absorption of a Curtain of Slumber, will last for 12s, and will absorb <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% effectiveness.

constellations.name: Light's Remit
constellations.desc: When Shooting Stars from Nights of Formal Focus strike opponents, they will each restore 1 Energy to Layla. Each Shooting Star can restore Energy to her in this manner once.

constellations.name: Secrets of the Night
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Nights of Formal Focus</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Starry Illumination
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Nights of Formal Focus</color> starts to fire off Shooting Stars, it will grant all nearby party members the Dawn Star effect, causing their Normal and Charged Attack DMG to increase based on 5% of Layla's Max HP.
Dawn Star can last up to 3s and will be removed 0.05s after dealing Normal or Charged Attack DMG.

constellations.name: Stream of Consciousness
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Radiant Soulfire
constellations.desc:
Shooting Stars from <color=skill>Nights of Formal Focus</color> deal 40% increased DMG, and Starlight Slugs from <color=skill>Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker</color> deal 40% increased DMG.
Additionally, the interval between the creation of Night Stars via Nights of Formal Focus is decreased by 20%.

talents.name: Lightning Touch
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal Electro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Violet Arc
talents.desc: Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away. Press Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE. Hold After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.

talents.name: Lightning Rose
talents.desc:
Summons a <color=skill>Lightning Rose</color> that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.
The <color=skill>Lightning Rose</color> will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> throughout the ability's duration.

talents.name: Induced Aftershock
talents.desc: Hits by Charged Attacks apply <color=skill>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status to opponents.

talents.name: Static Electricity Field
talents.desc: Opponents hit by <color=skill>Lightning Rose</color> have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

talents.name: General Pharmaceutics
talents.desc: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund one count of one material out of all the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Infinite Circuit
constellations.desc:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding <color=skill>Violet Arc</color>.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.desc:
Holding <color=skill>Violet Arc</color> has the following effects:
● Increases DEF by 25%.
● Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.name: Resonant Thunder
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Lightning Rose</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Plasma Eruption
constellations.desc: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by <color=skill>Lightning Rose</color> by 1-3.

constellations.name: Electrocute
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Violet Arc</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pulsating Witch
constellations.desc:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of <color=skill>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

talents.name: Sparkling Scatter
talents.desc: Normal Attack Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG. Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG. If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Geo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Jade Screen
talents.desc: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG. Jade Screen ● Blocks opponents' projectiles. ● Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP. Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time.

talents.name: Starshatter
talents.desc:
Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her opponents that deal massive <color=geo>Geo DMG</color>.
If <color=skill>Starshatter</color> is cast when a <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> is nearby, the <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.

talents.name: Backup Plan
talents.desc: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

talents.name: Strategic Reserve
talents.desc: A character that passes through the <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> will gain a 12% <color=geo>Geo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

talents.name: Trove of Marvelous Treasures
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby ore veins used in forging on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Piercing Fragments
constellations.desc: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

constellations.name: Shock Effect
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> is shattered, its CD will reset.
Can occur once every 6s.

constellations.name: Majesty Be the Array of Stars
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Starshatter</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

constellations.name: Invincible Be the Jade Screen
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Grandeur Be the Seven Stars
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Starshatter</color> is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

talents.name: Favonius Bladework - Maid
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Breastplate
talents.desc:
Summons protective stone armor, dealing <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Noelle's DEF.
The shield has the following properties:
● When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters.
● Possesses 150% DMG Absorption efficiency against all Elemental and Physical DMG.

The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on Noelle's DEF.

talents.name: Sweeping Time
talents.desc:
Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the opponents surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing <color=geo>Geo DMG</color>.
Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects:
● Larger attack AoE.
● Converts attack DMG to <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
● Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF.

talents.name: Devotion
talents.desc:
When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when your active character's HP falls below 30%:
Creates a shield for your active character that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF.
The shield has a 150% DMG Absorption effectiveness against all Elemental and Physical DMG.
This effect can only occur once every 60s.

talents.name: Nice and Clean
talents.desc:
Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of <color=skill>Breastplate</color> by 1s.
Hitting multiple opponents with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.

talents.name: Maid's Knighthood
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: I Got Your Back
constellations.desc: While <color=skill>Sweeping Time</color> and <color=skill>Breastplate</color> are both in effect, the chance of <color=skill>Breastplate</color>'s healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

constellations.name: Combat Maid
constellations.desc: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

constellations.name: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Breastplate</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Be Cleaned
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Breastplate</color>'s duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.

constellations.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sweeping Time</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Must Be Spotless
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Sweeping Time</color> increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
Additionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

talents.name: Steel Fang
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Claw and Thunder
talents.desc: Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his lupical. Press Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Electro DMG to opponents in front of Razor. Upon striking an opponent, Razor will gain an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate. Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration. Hold Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Electro DMG, and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils. Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.

talents.name: Lightning Fang
talents.desc: Summons the Wolf Within, which deals Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils, which will be converted into Elemental Energy for him. The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill's duration. The Wolf Within ● Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing Electro DMG. ● Raises Razor's ATK SPD and Electro RES. ● Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Electro-Charged status. ● Disables Razor's Charged Attacks. ● Increases Razor's resistance to interruption. These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield. When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill.

talents.name: Awakening
talents.desc: Decreases <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color>'s CD by 18%. Using <color=skill>Lightning Fang</color> resets the CD of <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color>.

talents.name: Hunger
talents.desc: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

talents.name: Wolvensprint
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption of your characters in the party by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.desc: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Suppression
constellations.desc: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.name: Soul Companion
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Lightning Fang</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bite
constellations.desc: When casting <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color> (Press), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.name: Sharpened Claws
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.desc:
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.
When Razor is not using <color=skill>Lightning Fang</color>, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an <color=electro>Electro</color> Sigil for <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color>.

talents.name: Spear of the Church
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Ravaging Confession
talents.desc:
Rosaria swiftly shifts her position to appear behind her opponent, then stabs and slashes them with her polearm, dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>.
This ability cannot be used to travel behind opponents of a larger build.

talents.name: Rites of Termination
talents.desc:
Rosaria's unique take on this prayer ritual: First, she swings her weapon to slash surrounding opponents; then, she summons a frigid Ice Lance that strikes the ground. Both actions deal <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>.
While active, the Ice Lance periodically releases a blast of cold air, dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.

talents.name: Regina Probationum
talents.desc: When Rosaria strikes an opponent from behind using <color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color>, Rosaria's CRIT Rate increases by 12% for 5s.

talents.name: Shadow Samaritan
talents.desc:
Casting <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color> increases CRIT Rate of all nearby party members (except Rosaria herself) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s.
CRIT Rate Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 15%.

talents.name: Night Walk
talents.desc:
At night (18:00 – 6:00), increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10%.
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the same effects.

constellations.name: Unholy Revelation
constellations.desc: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

constellations.name: Land Without Promise
constellations.desc: The duration of the Ice Lance created by <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color> is increased by 4s.

constellations.name: The Wages of Sin
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Painful Grace
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color>'s CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time <color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color> is cast.

constellations.name: Last Rites
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Retribution
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color>'s attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

talents.name: Shuumatsuban Ninja Blade
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash
talents.desc: The special technique of the Yoohoo Ninja Arts! Sayu curls up into a rolling Fuufuu Windwheel and smashes into opponents at high speed, dealing Anemo DMG. When the duration ends, she unleashes a Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick, dealing AoE Anemo DMG. Press Enters the Fuufuu Windwheel state, rolling forward a short distance before using the Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick. Hold Rolls about continuously in the Fuufuu Windwheel state, increasing Sayu's resistance to interruption while within that state. During this time, Sayu can control the direction of her roll, and can use the skill again to end her Windwheel state early and unleash a stronger version of the Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick. The Hold version of this skill can trigger Elemental Absorption. This skill has a maximum duration of 10s and enters CD once its effects end. The longer Sayu remains in her Windwheel state, the longer the CD. Elemental Absorption If Sayu comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro while in her Windwheel state, she will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use of this skill.

talents.name: Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry
talents.desc: The other super special technique of the Yoohoo Ninja Arts! It summons a pair of helping hands for Sayu. Deals Anemo DMG to nearby opponents and heals all nearby party members. The amount of HP restored is based on Sayu's ATK. This skill then summons a Muji-Muji Daruma. Muji-Muji Daruma At specific intervals, the Daruma will take one of several actions based on the situation around it: ● If the HP of nearby characters is above 70%, it will attack a nearby opponent, dealing Anemo DMG. ● If there are active characters with 70% or less HP nearby, it will heal the active character with the lowest percentage HP left. If there are no opponents nearby, it will heal active characters nearby even if they have 70% HP or more.

talents.name: Someone More Capable
talents.desc:
When Sayu triggers a Swirl reaction while active, she heals all your characters and nearby allies for 300 HP. She will also heal an additional 1.2 HP for every point of Elemental Mastery she has.
This effect can be triggered once every 2s.

talents.name: No Work Today!
talents.desc:
The Muji-Muji Daruma created by <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> gains the following effects:
● When healing a character, it will also heal characters near that healed character for 20% the amount of HP.
● Increases the AoE of its attack against opponents.

talents.name: Yoohoo Art: Silencer's Secret
talents.desc:
When Sayu is in the party, your characters will not startle Crystalflies and certain other animals when getting near them.
Check the "Other" sub-category of the "Living Beings / Wildlife" section in the Archive for creatures this skill works on.

constellations.name: Multi-Task no Jutsu
constellations.desc: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> will ignore HP limits and can simultaneously attack nearby opponents and heal characters.

constellations.name: Egress Prep
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash</color> gains the following effects:
● DMG of Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick in Tapping (mobile)/Press (PC & PlayStation) Mode increased by 3.3%.
● Every 0.5s in the Fuufuu Windwheel state will increase the DMG of this Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick by 3.3%. The maximum DMG increase possible through this method is 66%.

constellations.name: Eh, the Bunshin Can Handle It
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Skiving: New and Improved
constellations.desc:
Sayu recovers 1.2 Energy when she triggers a Swirl reaction.
This effect occurs once every 2s.

constellations.name: Speed Comes First
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sleep O'Clock
constellations.desc:
The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Sayu's <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> will now also benefit from her Elemental Mastery. Each point of Sayu's Elemental Mastery will produce the following effects:
● Increases the damage dealt by the Muji-Muji Daruma's attacks by 0.2% ATK. A maximum of 400% ATK can be gained via this method.
● Increases the HP restored by the Muji-Muji Daruma by 3. A maximum of 6,000 additional HP can be restored in this manner.

talents.name: Fudou Style Martial Arts
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 fisticuffs empowered by a mighty wind, dealing Anemo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a set amount of Stamina to perform a sweeping kick, dealing Anemo DMG. Plunging Attack Calling upon the surging wind, Heizou plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Heartstopper Strike
talents.desc: Press Wields the swift winds to launch a Heartstopper Strike that deals Anemo DMG. Hold Charges energy to unleash an even stronger blow. He will obtain the Declension effect while charging, which will increase the power of the Heartstopper Strike. When the skill button is released or the skill duration ends, he will strike forward, dealing Anemo DMG. Declension Increases the power of the next Heartstopper Strike. Max 4 stacks. When you possess 4 Declension stacks, the Conviction effect will be produced, which will cause the next Heartstopper Strike to be even stronger and have a larger AoE.

talents.name: Windmuster Kick
talents.desc:
Leaps into the air and uses the Fudou Style Vacuum Slugger and kicks his opponent. The Vacuum Slugger will explode upon hit and create an Arresting Windtunnel that pulls in nearby objects and opponents, dealing <color=anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</color>.

When Fudou Style Vacuum Slugger hits enemies affected by <color=hydro>Hydro</color>, <color=pyro>Pyro</color>, <color=cryo>Cryo</color> or <color=electro>Electro</color>, it afflicts them with Windmuster Iris. Moments later, Windmuster Iris explodes and dissipates, dealing AoE DMG of the corresponding elemental type.

Fudou Style Vacuum Slugger can afflict a maximum of four enemies with the Windmuster Iris. A single enemy cannot be afflicted by Irises of different elemental types at the same time.

talents.name: Paradoxical Practice
talents.desc: When Shikanoin Heizou activates a Swirl reaction while on the field, he will gain 1 Declension stack for <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color>. This effect can be triggered every 0.1s.

talents.name: Penetrative Reasoning
talents.desc: After Shikanoin Heizou's <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color> hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Shikanoin Heizou) Elemental Mastery by 80 for 10s.

talents.name: Pre-Existing Guilt
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Named Juvenile Casebook
constellations.desc: For 5s after Shikanoin Heizou takes the field, his Normal Attack SPD is increased by 15%. He also gains 1 Declension stack for <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color>. This effect can be triggered once every 10s.

constellations.name: Investigative Collection
constellations.desc: The pull effect of the Arresting Windtunnel created by <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> is enhanced, and its duration is increased to 1s.

constellations.name: Esoteric Puzzle Book
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tome of Lies
constellations.desc:
The first Windmuster Iris explosion in each <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> will regenerate 9 Elemental Energy for Shikanoin Heizou. Every subsequent explosion in that <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> will each regenerate an additional 1.5 Energy for Heizou.
One <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> can regenerate a total of 13.5 Energy for Heizou in this manner.

constellations.name: Secret Archive
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Curious Casefiles
constellations.desc: Each Declension stack will increase the CRIT Rate of the <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color> unleashed by 4%. When Heizou possesses Conviction, this <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color>'s CRIT DMG is increased by 32%.

talents.name: Wind Spirit Creation
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
talents.desc: Creates a small Wind Spirit that pulls opponents and objects towards its location, launches opponents within its AoE, and deals <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color>.

talents.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
talents.desc: Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit. While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull in surrounding opponents and objects, launch nearby opponents, and deal Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro energy, it will deal additional Elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

talents.name: Catalyst Conversion
talents.desc: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl effect, all characters in the party with the matching element (excluding Sucrose) have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

talents.name: Mollis Favonius
talents.desc: When <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> or <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Sucrose) Elemental Mastery based on 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

talents.name: Astable Invention
talents.desc: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Beth: Unbound Form
constellations.desc: The duration of <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> is increased by 2s.

constellations.name: Flawless Alchemistress
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Alchemania
constellations.desc: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 1-7s.

constellations.name: Caution: Standard Flask
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chaotic Entropy
constellations.desc: If <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

talents.name: Swiftshatter Spear
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to four consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Blazing Blessing
talents.desc:
Thoma vaults forward with his polearm and delivers a flame-filled flying kick that deals <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>, while also summoning a defensive Blazing Barrier.
At the moment of casting, Thoma's Elemental Skill applies <color=pyro>Pyro</color> to himself.
The DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier scales off Thoma's Max HP.
The Blazing Barrier has the following traits:
● Absorbs <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.
● When a new Blazing Barrier is obtained, the remaining DMG Absorption of an existing Blazing Barrier will stack and its duration will be refreshed.

The maximum DMG Absoprtion of the Blazing Barrier will not exceed a certain percentage of Thoma's Max HP.

talents.name: Crimson Ooyoroi
talents.desc: Thoma spins his polearm, slicing at his foes with roaring flames that deal AoE Pyro DMG and weave themselves into a Scorching Ooyoroi. Scorching Ooyoroi While Scorching Ooyoroi is in effect, the active character's Normal Attacks will trigger Fiery Collapse, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and summoning a Blazing Barrier. Fiery Collapse can be triggered once every 1s. Except for the amount of DMG they can absorb, the Blazing Barriers created in this way are identical to those created by Thoma's Elemental Skill, Blazing Blessing: ● Absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively. ● When a new Blazing Barrier is obtained, the remaining DMG Absorption of an existing Blazing Barrier will stack and its duration will be refreshed. The maximum DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier will not exceed a certain percentage of Thoma's Max HP. If Thoma falls, the effects of Scorching Ooyoroi will be cleared.

talents.name: Imbricated Armor
talents.desc:
When your current active character obtains or refreshes a Blazing Barrier, this character's Shield Strength will increase by 5% for 6s.
This effect can be triggered once every 0.3 seconds. Max 5 stacks.

talents.name: Flaming Assault
talents.desc: DMG dealt by <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s Fiery Collapse is increased by 2.2% of Thoma's Max HP.

talents.name: Snap and Swing
talents.desc: When you fish successfully in Inazuma, Thoma's help grants a 20% chance of scoring a double catch.

constellations.name: A Comrade's Duty
constellations.desc:
When a character protected by Thoma's own Blazing Barrier (Thoma excluded) is attacked, Thoma's own <color=skill>Blazing Blessing</color> CD is decreased by 3s, while his own <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s CD is decreased by 3s.
This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

constellations.name: A Subordinate's Skills
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s duration is increased by 3s.

constellations.name: Fortified Resolve
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Blazing Blessing</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Long-Term Planning
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>, 15 Energy will be restored to Thoma.

constellations.name: Raging Wildfire
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Burning Heart
constellations.desc: When a Blazing Barrier is obtained or refreshed, the DMG dealt by all party members' Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks is increased by 15% for 6s.

talents.name: Dough-Fu
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Guoba Attack
talents.desc: Summons Guoba, who will continuously breathe fire at opponents, dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Pyronado
talents.desc: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color> whirling around her. The <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color> will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.

talents.name: Crossfire
talents.desc: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

talents.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!
talents.desc: When <color=skill>Guoba Attack</color>'s effects end, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

talents.name: Chef de Cuisine
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on an ATK-boosting dish, Xiangling has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.desc: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their <color=pyro>Pyro RES</color> reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.name: Oil Meets Fire
constellations.desc: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Deepfry
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Slowbake
constellations.desc: <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color>'s duration is increased by 40%.

constellations.name: Guoba Mad
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guoba Attack</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Condensed Pyronado
constellations.desc: For the duration of <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color>, all party members receive a 15% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: Guhua Style
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen
talents.desc:
Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character.
The Rain Swords have the following properties:
● When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
● Increases the character's resistance to interruption.

20% of Xingqiu's <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords.

The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.
The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3.
Using this ability applies the <color=hydro>Wet</color> status onto the character.

talents.name: Guhua Sword: Raincutter
talents.desc: Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords. Rainbow Bladework ● Your active character's Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG. ● Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration.

talents.name: Hydropathic
talents.desc: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

talents.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops
talents.desc: Xingqiu gains a 20% <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: Flash of Genius
talents.desc: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: The Scent Remained
constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

constellations.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
constellations.desc:
Extends the duration of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3s.
Decreases the <color=hydro>Hydro RES</color> of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

constellations.name: Weaver of Verses
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evilsoother
constellations.desc: Throughout the duration of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>, the DMG dealt by <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Embrace of Rain
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.desc: Activating 2 of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>'s sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.

talents.name: Dance on Fire
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Sweeping Fervor
talents.desc:
Xinyan brandishes her instrument, dealing <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> on nearby opponents, forming a shield made out of her audience's passion.
The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Xinyan's DEF and on the number of opponents hit.
● Hitting 0 – 1 opponents grants Shield Level 1: Ad Lib.
● Hitting 2 opponents grants Shield Level 2: Lead-In.
● Hitting 3 or more opponents grants Shield Level 3: Rave, which will also deal intermittent <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to nearby opponents.

The shield has the following special properties:
● When unleashed, it infuses Xinyan with <color=pyro>Pyro</color>.
● It has 250% DMG Absorption effectiveness against <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Riff Revolution
talents.desc:
Strumming rapidly, Xinyan launches nearby opponents and deals Physical DMG to them, hyping up the crowd.
The sheer intensity of the atmosphere will cause explosions that deal <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to nearby opponents.

talents.name: "The Show Goes On, Even Without An Audience..."
talents.desc:
Decreases the number of opponents <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color> must hit to trigger each level of shielding.
● Shield Level 2: Lead-In requirement reduced to 1 opponent hit.
● Shield Level 3: Rave requirement reduced to 2 opponents hit or more.

talents.name: "...Now That's Rock 'N' Roll!"
talents.desc: Characters shielded by <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color> deal 15% increased Physical DMG.

talents.name: A Rad Recipe
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Xinyan has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Fatal Acceleration
constellations.desc:
Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.
Can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Impromptu Opening
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Riff Revolution</color>'s Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

constellations.name: Double-Stop
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire Rhythm
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color>'s swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

constellations.name: Screamin' for an Encore
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Riff Revolution</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
constellations.desc: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

talents.name: Seal of Approval
talents.desc: Normal Attack Shoots fireballs that deal up to three counts of Pyro DMG. When Yanfei's Normal Attacks hit enemies, they will grant her a single Scarlet Seal. Yanfei may possess a maximum of 3 Scarlet Seals, and each time this effect is triggered, the duration of currently possessed Scarlet Seals will refresh. Each Scarlet Seal will decrease Yanfei's Stamina consumption and will disappear when she leaves the field. Charged Attack Consumes Stamina and all Scarlet Seals before dealing AoE Pyro DMG to the opponents after a short casting time. This Charged Attack's AoE and DMG will increase according to the amount of Scarlet Seals consumed. Plunging Attack Gathering the power of Pyro, Yanfei plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Signed Edict
talents.desc:
Summons blistering flames that deal <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.
Opponents hit by the flames will grant Yanfei the maximum number of Scarlet Seals.

talents.name: Done Deal
talents.desc: Triggers a spray of intense flames that rush at nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG, granting Yanfei the maximum number of Scarlet Seals, and applying Brilliance to her. Brilliance Has the following effects: ● Grants Yanfei a Scarlet Seal at fixed intervals. ● Increases the DMG dealt by her Charged Attacks. The effects of Brilliance will end if Yanfei leaves the field or falls in battle.

talents.name: Proviso
talents.desc: When Yanfei consumes Scarlet Seals by using a Charged Attack, each Scarlet Seal will increase Yanfei's <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> by 5%. This effects [sic] lasts for 6s. When a Charged Attack is used again during the effect's duration, it will dispel the previous effect.

talents.name: Blazing Eye
talents.desc: When Yanfei's Charged Attack deals a CRIT Hit to opponents, she will deal an additional instance of <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color> equal to 80% of her ATK. This DMG counts as Charged Attack DMG.

talents.name: Encyclopedic Expertise
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

constellations.name: The Law Knows No Kindness
constellations.desc: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

constellations.name: Right of Final Interpretation
constellations.desc: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

constellations.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Signed Edict</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Supreme Amnesty
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Done Deal</color> is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Abiding Affidavit
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Done Deal</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Extra Clause
constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.

talents.name: Toss 'N' Turn Spear
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Raphanus Sky Cluster
talents.desc: Calls upon "Yuegui: Throwing Mode," a special device created by a certain adeptus to help Yaoyao solve her problems. This skill will be used differently in Holding Mode. Hold Enters Aiming Mode to adjust the throw direction. Yuegui: Throwing Mode Throws out White Jade Radishes that will explode upon hitting characters or opponents, dealing Dendro DMG to opponents within a certain AoE, and healing characters within that same AoE based on Yaoyao's Max HP. If a radish does not hit either an opponent or a character, the radish will remain where it is and explode on contact with a character or opponent, or will explode after its duration expires. Yuegui: Throwing Mode will choose its radish-throw targets. ● If all nearby characters have more than 70% HP remaining, then it will throw the radish at a nearby opponent. ● If nearby characters have 70% or less HP remaining, it will throw a radish at the character with the lowest HP percentage remaining. If no opponents exist nearby, Yuegui will throw White Jade Radishes at characters even if they all have more than 70% HP remaining. A maximum of 2 instances Yuegui: Throwing Mode can exist at any one time.

talents.name: Moonjade Descent
talents.desc: At the enjoinment of a certain adeptus, Yuegui's full potential can be unleashed in an emergency, dealing Dendro DMG to nearby opponents and entering an (in some sense) unsurpassed Adeptal Legacy state. Adeptal Legacy ● White Jade Radishes generated will be changed to heal and deal DMG according to this skill. Explosions will heal all nearby party members, and the Dendro DMG that they deal will be viewed as Elemental Burst DMG instead. ● Summons "Yuegui: Jumping Mode" at intervals until their limit has been reached. The behavior of this version of Yuegui is the same as that of "Yuegui: Throwing Mode" in the Elemental Skill, Raphanus Sky Cluster. A maximum of 3 Yuegui: Jumping Mode can exist at any one time. ● Yaoyao's Movement SPD is increased by 15%. ● Yaoyao's Dendro RES will be increased. The Adeptal Legacy state will end once Yaoyao is off-field, and all remaining Yuegui: Jumping Mode will be cleared once this state ends.

talents.name: Starscatter
