Energy can be restored this way once every 1s, and this effect can be triggered 5 times throughout this skill's duration. While in this state, the Raiden Shogun's resistance to interruption is increased, and she is immune to Electro-Charged reaction DMG. While Musou Isshin is active, the Raiden Shogun's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG will be considered Elemental Burst DMG. The effects of Musou Isshin will be cleared when the Raiden Shogun leaves the field. Chakra Desiderata When nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun herself) use their Elemental Bursts, the Raiden Shogun will build up Resolve stacks based on the Energy Cost of these Elemental Bursts. The maximum number of Resolve stacks is 60. The Resolve gained by Chakra Desiderata will be cleared 300s after the Raiden Shogun leaves the field.

talents.name: Wishes Unnumbered
talents.desc:
When nearby party members gain Elemental Orbs or Particles, Chakra Desiderata gains 2 Resolve stacks.
This effect can occur once every 3s.

talents.name: Enlightened One
talents.desc:
Each 1% above 100% Energy Recharge that the Raiden Shogun possesses grants her:
● 0.6% greater Energy restoration from Musou Isshin
● 0.4% <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: All-Preserver
talents.desc: Mora expended when ascending Swords and Polearms is decreased by 50%.

constellations.name: Ominous Inscription
constellations.desc: Chakra Desiderata will gather Resolve even faster. When <color=electro>Electro</color> characters use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 80%. When characters of other Elemental Types use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 20%.

constellations.name: Steelbreaker
constellations.desc: While using Musou no Hitotachi and in the Musou Isshin state applied by <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color>, the Raiden Shogun's attacks ignore 60% of opponents's DEF.

constellations.name: Shinkage Bygones
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pledge of Propriety
constellations.desc: When the Musou Isshin state applied by <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color> expires, all nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun) gain 30% bonus ATK for 10s.

constellations.name: Shogun's Descent
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Transcendence: Baleful Omen</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wishbearer
constellations.desc:
While in the Musou Isshin state applied by <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color>, attacks by the Raiden Shogun that are considered part of her Elemental Burst will decrease all nearby party members' (but not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.
This effect can trigger once every 1s, and can trigger a total of 5 times during the state's duration.

talents.name: The Shape of Water
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 3 consecutive attacks that take the form of swimming fish, dealing Hydro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Hydro, Kokomi plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Kurage's Oath
talents.desc: Summons a "Bake-Kurage" created from water that can heal her allies. Using this skill will apply the Wet status to Sangonomiya Kokomi. Bake-Kurage Deals Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and heal nearby active characters at fixed intervals. This healing is based on Kokomi's Max HP.

talents.name: Nereid's Ascension
talents.desc: Summons the might of Watatsumi, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents, before robing Kokomi in a Ceremonial Garment made from the flowing waters of Sangonomiya. Ceremonial Garment ● Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack, Charged Attack and Bake-Kurage DMG are increased based on her Max HP. ● When her Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents, Kokomi will restore HP for all nearby party members, and the amount restored is based on her Max HP. ● Increases Sangonomiya Kokomi's resistance to interruption and allows her to walk on the water's surface. These effects will be cleared once Sangonomiya Kokomi leaves the field.

talents.name: Tamanooya's Casket
talents.desc: If Sangonomiya Kokomi's own Bake-Kurage are on the field when she uses <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, the Bake-Kurage's duration will be refreshed.

talents.name: Song of Pearls
talents.desc: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, the Normal and Charged Attack DMG Bonus Sangonomiya Kokomi gains based on her Max HP will receive a further increase based on 15% of her Healing Bonus.

talents.name: Princess of Watatsumi
talents.desc:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: At Water's Edge
constellations.desc:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>.
This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.

constellations.name: The Clouds Like Waves Rippling
constellations.desc:
Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
● <color=skill>Kurage's Oath</color> Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
● <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color> Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.

constellations.name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Moon Overlooks the Waters
constellations.desc:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.
This effect can occur once every 0.2s.

constellations.name: All Streams Flow to the Sea
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kurage's Oath</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sango Isshin
constellations.desc: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> for 4s when her Normal and Charged Attacks heal, or would heal, any party member with 80% or more HP.

talents.name: Dawnstar Piercer
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Spring Spirit Summoning
talents.desc: The frosted dew, silvery and dense, shall exorcise all demons. Grants all nearby party members the Icy Quill effect and deals Cryo DMG in different ways based on whether it is pressed or held. Press Rushes forward together with a Talisman Spirit, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents along the path. Hold Commands the Talisman Spirit to deal AoE Cryo DMG. Icy Quill When Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts deal Cryo DMG to opponents, the DMG dealt is increased based on Shenhe's current ATK. The Icy Quill's effects will be cleared once its duration ends or after being triggered a certain number of times. When held rather than pressed, the Icy Quill's effect lasts longer and can be triggered more times. When one Cryo DMG instance strikes multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times based on the number of opponents hit. The number of times the effect is triggered is calculated independently for each party member with the Icy Quill.

talents.name: Divine Maiden's Deliverance
talents.desc:
Unleashes the power of the Talisman Spirit, allowing it to roam free in this plane, dealing <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.

The Talisman Spirit then creates a field that decreases the <color=cryo>Cryo RES</color> and Physical RES of opponents within it. It also deals periodic <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents within the field.

talents.name: Deific Embrace
talents.desc: An active character within the field created by <color=skill>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> gains 15% <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: Spirit Communion Seal
talents.desc:
After Shenhe uses <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color>, she will grant all nearby party members the following effects:
● Press: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 15% for 10s.
● Hold: Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG increased by 15% for 15s.

talents.name: Precise Comings and Goings
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Liyue Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Clarity of Heart
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> can be used 1 more time.

constellations.name: Centered Spirit
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> lasts for 6 seconds longer.
Active characters within the skill's field deal 15% increased <color=cryo>Cryo</color> CRIT DMG.

constellations.name: Seclusion
constellations.desc:
Increases Level of <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Insight
constellations.desc:
When characters under the effect of Icy Quill applied by Shenhe triggers its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:
● When Shenhe uses <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color>, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> by 5% for each stack consumed.
● Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.

constellations.name: Divine Attainment
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Mystical Abandon
constellations.desc: When characters trigger Icy Quill's effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.

talents.name: Cutting Torrent
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the power of Hydro will accumulate on the arrowhead. An arrow fully charged with the torrent will deal Hydro DMG and apply the Riptide status. Riptide Opponents affected by Riptide will suffer from AoE Hydro DMG effects when attacked by Tartaglia in various ways. DMG dealt in this way is considered Normal Attack DMG. ● Riptide Flash: A fully-charged Aimed Shot that hits an opponent affected by Riptide deals consecutive bouts of AoE DMG. Can occur once every 0.7s. ● Riptide Burst: Defeating an opponent affected by Riptide creates a Hydro burst that inflicts the Riptide status on nearby opponents hit. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact. When Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, he cannot perform a plunging attack.

talents.name: Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
talents.desc: Unleashes a set of weaponry made of pure water, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and entering Melee Stance. In this Stance, Tartaglia's Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Hydro DMG that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion and change as follows: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive Hydro strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a cross slash, dealing Hydro DMG. Riptide Slash Hitting an opponent affected by Riptide with a melee attack unleashes a Riptide Slash that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG, and can only occur once every 1.5s. After 30s, or when the ability is unleashed again, this skill will end. Tartaglia will return to his Ranged Stance and this ability will enter CD. The longer Tartaglia stays in his Melee Stance, the longer the CD. If the return to a ranged stance occurs automatically after 30s, the CD is even longer.

talents.name: Havoc: Obliteration
talents.desc: Performs different attacks based on what stance Tartaglia is in when casting. Ranged Stance: Flash of Havoc Swiftly fires a Hydro-imbued magic arrow, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and applying the Riptide status. Returns a portion of its Energy Cost after use. Melee Stance: Light of Obliteration Performs a slash with a large AoE, dealing massive Hydro DMG to all surrounding opponents, which triggers Riptide Blast. Riptide Blast When the obliterating waters hit an opponent affected by Riptide, it clears their Riptide status and triggers a Hydro Explosion that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

talents.name: Never Ending
talents.desc: Extends Riptide duration by 8s.

talents.name: Sword of Torrents
talents.desc: When Tartaglia is in <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color>'s Melee stance, on dealing a CRIT hit, Normal and Charged Attacks apply the Riptide status effects to opponents.

talents.name: Master of Weaponry
talents.desc: Increases your own party members' Normal Attack Level by 1.

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
constellations.desc: Decreases the CD of <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> by 20%

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Understream
constellations.desc: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
constellations.desc:
If Tartaglia is in <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color>'s Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.
Riptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

constellations.name: Havoc: Formless Blade
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Havoc: Obliteration</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Havoc: Annihilation
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Havoc: Obliteration</color> is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> is reset.
This effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

talents.name: Khanda Barrier-Buster
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the power of Dendro will accumulate on the arrowhead before the arrow is fired. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged: ● Charge Level 1: Tighnari fires a Dendro-infused arrow that deals Dendro DMG. ● Charge Level 2: Tighnari fires a Wreath Arrow that deals Dendro DMG. Upon hit, the Wreath Arrow will create 4 Clusterbloom Arrows that will track nearby opponents automatically and deal Dendro DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG on impact.

talents.name: Vijnana-Phala Mine
talents.desc:
Tighnari throws a Vijnana Stormheart ahead of him that deals <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color> and creates a Vijnana-Khanda Field, which summons strange illusions to taunt enemies and draw their fire.
Additionally, Tighnari gains the Vijnana Suffusion effect, which will decrease the Wreath Arrow's charging time by 2.4s. This effect will dissipate once the skill duration ends or after Tighnari has fired 3 Wreath Arrows.

talents.name: Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft
talents.desc:
Combines the power of all seeds to fire 6 Tanglevine Shafts that can track opponents and deal <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color>.

After they hit, the Tanglevine Shafts will create a secondary wave of Tanglevine Shafts that can also track opponents and deal <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> on hit.

talents.name: Keen Sight
talents.desc: After Tighnari fires a Wreath Arrow, his Elemental Mastery is increased by 50 for 4s.

talents.name: Scholarly Blade
talents.desc:
For every point of Elemental Mastery Tighnari possesses, his Charged Attack and <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> DMG are increased by 0.06%.
The maximum DMG Bonus obtainable this way is 60%.

talents.name: Encyclopedic Knowledge
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Sumeru on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Beginnings Determined at the Roots
constellations.desc: Tighnari's Charged Attack CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Origins Known From the Stem
constellations.desc:
When there are opponents within the Vijnana-Khanda Field created by <color=skill>Vijnana-Phala Mine</color>, Tighnari gains 20% <color=dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</color>.
The effect will last up to 6s if the field's duration ends or if it no longer has opponents within it.

constellations.name: Fortunes Read Amongst the Branches
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Withering Glimpsed in the Leaves
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> is unleashed, all nearby party members gain 60 Elemental Mastery for 8s. If the <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> triggers a Burning, Bloom, Quicken, or Spread reaction, their Elemental Mastery will be further increased by 60. This latter case will also refresh the buff state's duration.

constellations.name: Comprehension Amidst the Flowers
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Vijnana-Phala Mine</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Karma Adjudged From the Leaden Fruit
constellations.desc: Wreath Arrow's charging time is decreased by 0.9s, and will produce 1 additional Clusterbloom Arrow upon hit. This arrow deals 150% of Tighnari's ATK as DMG.

talents.name: Divine Marksmanship
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Skyward Sonnet
talents.desc: O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky! Press Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching opponents into the air. Hold Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected opponents into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air. Opponents hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.

talents.name: Wind's Grand Ode
talents.desc:
Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge <color=skill>Stormeye</color> that sucks in opponents and deals continuous <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color>.

Elemental Absorption
If the <color=skill>Stormeye</color> comes into contact with <color=hydro>Hydro</color>/<color=pyro>Pyro</color>/<color=cryo>Cryo</color>/<color=electro>Electro</color>, it will deal additional Elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

talents.name: Embrace of Winds
talents.desc: Holding <color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

talents.name: Stormeye
talents.desc: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of <color=skill>Wind's Grand Ode</color> end. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element.

talents.name: Windrider
talents.desc:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Splitting Gales
constellations.desc: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.
Opponents launched by <color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> suffer an additional 12% <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

constellations.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Wind's Grand Ode</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.desc: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <color=anemo>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

constellations.name: Concerto dal Cielo
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Storm of Defiance
constellations.desc:
Targets who take DMG from <color=skill>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

talents.name: Yuuban Meigen
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 3 attacks using wind blades, dealing Anemo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina, gathers a build up of high wind pressure, and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Calling upon the power of Anemo, the Wanderer plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Hanega: Song of the Wind
talents.desc: Concentrates the power of the winds to break free from the shackles of the earth, dealing AoE Anemo DMG before leaping into the air and entering the Windfavored state. Windfavored The Wanderer cannot perform Plunging Attacks in this state. When he uses Normal and Charged Attacks, they will be converted into Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai respectively; the DMG they deal and their AoE will be increased, and their DMG will be considered Normal and Charged Attack DMG respectively. Kuugo: Toufukai will not consume Stamina. The Wanderer will hover persistently during this time. While this state is active, the Wanderer's movements gain the following properties:Persistently consumes Kuugoryoku Points to maintain this hovering state.When sprinting, additional Kuugoryoku Points will be consumed for the Wanderer to accelerate mid-air. Holding sprint will cause persistent Kuugoryoku Point consumption to maintain speed. This effect will replace his default sprint.Jumping expends extra Kuugoryoku Points to increase hovering height. Holding jump will cause persistent Kuugoryoku Point consumption to keep increasing hovering height. Running out of Kuugoryoku Points will end the Windfavored state. A second cast during the duration of Windfavored will also end it.

talents.name: Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays
talents.desc: Compresses the atmosphere into a singlular vacuum that grinds all troubles away, dealing multiple instances of <color=anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</color>. If the character is in the Windfavored state due to the skill "Hanega: Song of the Wind," Windfavored state will end after casting.

talents.name: Jade-Claimed Flower
talents.desc:
If Hanega: Song of the Wind comes into contact with **Hydro**/**Pyro**/**Cryo**/**Electro** when it is unleashed, this instance of the Windfavored state will obtain buffs according to the contacted element(s):**Hydro**: Kuugoryoku Point cap increases by 20.**Pyro**: ATK increases by 30%.**Cryo**: CRIT Rate increases by 20%.**Electro**: When Normal and Charged Attacks hit an opponent, 0.8 Energy will be restored. Energy can be restored this way every 0.2s.
You can have up to 2 different kinds of these buffs simultaneously.

talents.name: Gales of Reverie
talents.desc:
When the Wanderer hits opponents with Kuugo: Fushoudan or Kuugo: Toufukai in his Windfavored state, he has a 16% chance to obtain the Descent effect: The next time the Wanderer accelerates in mid-air while in this instance of the Windfavored state, this effect will be removed, this acceleration instance will not consume any Kuugoryoku Points, and he will fire off 4 wind arrows that deal 35% of his ATK as <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color> each.
For each Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai that does not produce this effect, the next attack of those types will have a 12% increased chance of producing it. The calculation of the effect production is done once every 0.1s.

talents.name: Strum the Swirling Winds
talents.desc: Mora expended when ascending Bows and Catalysts is decreased by 50%.

constellations.name: Shoban: Ostentatious Plumage
constellations.desc:
When in the Windfavored state, the Attack SPD of the Wanderer's Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai is increased by 10%.
Additionally, the wind arrows fired by the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" will deal an additional 25% of his ATK as DMG. You must unlock the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" first.

constellations.name: Niban: Moonlit Isle Amidst White Waves
constellations.desc:
When in the Windfavored state, Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays will see its DMG increased by 4% per point of difference between the max amount of Kuugoryoku Points contrasted with Kuugoryoku's present capacity when using this skill.
Through this method, you can increase Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays's DMG by a maximum of 200%.

constellations.name: Sanban: Moonflower Kusemai
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Yonban: Set Adrift into Spring
constellations.desc:
When casting Hanega: Song of the Wind, should the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" be triggered, the character will gain buffs in correspondence to the contacted Elemental Type(s), and also obtain a random untriggered buff. A maximum of 3 such corresponding elemental buffs can exist simultaneously.
You must unlock the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" first.

constellations.name: Matsuban: Ancient Illuminator From Abroad
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Hanega: Song of the Wind by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Shugen: The Curtains' Melancholic Sway
constellations.desc:
When the Wanderer actively hits an opponent with Kuugo: Fushoudan while in the Windfavored state, the following effects will occur:
Deals an additional instance of Kuugo: Fushoudan at the position hit, dealing 40% of the attack's original DMG. This DMG will be considered Normal Attack DMG.
When the Wanderer falls below 40 Kuugoryoku Points, restores 4 Points to him. Kuugoryoku Points can be restored in this manner once every 0.2s. This restoration can occur up to 5 times within one Windfavored duration.

talents.name: Whirlwind Thrust
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact. Xiao does not take DMG from performing Plunging Attacks.

talents.name: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
talents.desc:
Xiao lunges forward, dealing <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color> to opponents in his path.
Can be used in mid-air.
Starts with 2 charges.

talents.name: Bane of All Evil
talents.desc: Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago. Yaksha's Mask ● Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability. ● Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG. ● Converts attack DMG into Anemo DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP. The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field.

talents.name: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons
talents.desc: While under the effects of <color=skill>Bane of All Evil</color>, all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists. The maximum DMG Bonus is 25%.

talents.name: Dissolution Eon: Heaven Fall
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> increases the DMG of subsequent uses of <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 15%. This effect lasts for 7s, and has a maximum of 3 stacks. Gaining a new stack refreshes the effect's duration.

talents.name: Transcension: Gravity Defier
talents.desc:
Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
constellations.desc: Increases <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>'s charges by 1.

constellations.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
constellations.desc: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
constellations.desc: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

constellations.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Bane of All Evil</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
constellations.desc: While under the effects of <color=skill>Bane of All Evil</color>, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>, and for the next 1s, he may use <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> while ignoring its CD.

talents.name: Spiritfox Sin-Eater
talents.desc: Normal Attack Summons forth kitsune spirits, initiating a maximum of 3 attacks that deal Electro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal Electro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path with thunderous might. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura
talents.desc: To Yae, such dull tasks as can be accomplished by driving spirits out need not be done personally. Moves swiftly, leaving a Sesshou Sakura behind. Sesshou Sakura Has the following properties: ● Periodically strikes one nearby opponent with lightning, dealing Electro DMG ● When there are other Sesshou Sakura nearby, their level will increase, boosting the DMG dealt by these lightning strikes. This skill has three charges. A maximum of 3 Sesshou Sakura can exist simultaneously. The initial level of each Sesshou Sakura is 1, and the initial highest level each sakura can reach is 3. If a new Sesshou Sakura is created too close to an existing one, the existing one will be destroyed.

talents.name: Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin
talents.desc:
Legends of "kitsunetsuki," or the manifestations of a kitsune's might, are common in Inazuma's folktales. One that particularly captures the imagination is that of the Sky Kitsune, said to cause lightning to fall down upon the foes of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Summons a lightning strike, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>.
When she uses this skill, Yae Miko will unseal nearby Sesshou Sakura, destroying their outer forms and transforming them into Tenko Thunderbolts that descend from the skies, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>. Each Sesshou Sakura destroyed in this way will create one Tenko Thunderbolt.

talents.name: The Shrine's Sacred Shade
talents.desc: When casting <color=skill>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color>, each Sesshou Sakura destroyed resets the cooldown for 1 charge of <color=skill>Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura</color>.

talents.name: Enlightened Blessing
talents.desc: Every point of Elemental Mastery Yae Miko possesses will increase Sesshou Sakura DMG by 0.15%.

talents.name: Meditations of a Yako
talents.desc: Has a 25% chance to get 1 regional Character Talent Material (base material excluded) when crafting. The rarity is that of the base material.

constellations.name: Yakan Offering
constellations.desc: Each time <color=skill>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color> activates a Tenko Thunderbolt, Yae Miko will restore 8 Elemental Energy for herself.

constellations.name: Fox's Mooncall
constellations.desc: Sesshou Sakura start at Level 2 when created, their max level is increased to 4, and their attack range is increased by 60%.

constellations.name: The Seven Glamours
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura</color> by 3.
Maximum ugprade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sakura Channeling
constellations.desc: When Sesshou Sakura lightning hits opponents, the <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color> of all nearby party members is increased by 20% for 5s.

constellations.name: Mischievous Teasing
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Forbidden Art: Daisesshou
constellations.desc: The Sesshou Sakura's attacks will ignore 60% of the opponent's DEF.

talents.name: Stealthy Bowshot
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flowing water will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged torrential arrow will deal Hydro DMG. Breakthrough Yelan will enter a "Breakthrough" state after spending 5s out of combat, which will cause her next Charged Aimed Shot to have 80% decreased charge time, and once charged, she can fire a "Breakthrough Barb" that will deal AoE Hydro DMG based on Yelan's Max HP. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Lingering Lifeline
talents.desc: Fires off a Lifeline that allows her to move rapidly, entangling and marking opponents along its path. When this rapid movement ends, the Lifeline will explode, dealing Hydro DMG to the marked opponents based on Yelan's Max HP. Tap Moves a certain distance forward swiftly. Hold Engages in continuous, swift movement, during which Yelan's resistance to interruption is increased. During this time, Yelan can control this rapid movement and end it by using this Skill again. Additionally, each opponent marked by the Lifeline when it explodes grants Yelan a 34% chance to reset her Breakthrough state.

talents.name: Depth-Clarion Dice
talents.desc: Deals AoE Hydro DMG and creates an "Exquisite Throw," which aids her in battle. Exquisite Throw Follows the character around and will initiate a coordinated attack under the following circumstances, dealing Hydro DMG based on Yelan's Max HP: ● Can occur once every second when your active character uses a Normal Attack. ● Will occur each time Yelan's Lifeline explodes and hits opponents.

talents.name: Turn Control
talents.desc: When the party has 1/2/3/4 Elemental Types, Yelan's Max HP is increased by 6%/12%/18%/30%.

talents.name: Adapt With Ease
talents.desc:
So long as an Exquisite Throw is in play, your own active character deals 1% more DMG. This increases by a further 3.5% DMG every second. The maximum increase to DMG dealt is 50%.
The pre-existing effect will be dispelled if <color=skill>Depth-Clarion Dice</color> is recast during its duration.

talents.name: Necessary Calculation
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Liyue Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Enter the Plotters
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Lingering Lifeline</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Taking All Comers
constellations.desc:
When Exquisite Throw conducts a coordinated attack, it will fire an additional water arrow that will deal 14% of Yelan's Max HP as <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>.
This effect can trigger once every 1.8s.

constellations.name: Beware the Trickster's Dice
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Depth-Clarion Dice</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bait-and-Switch
constellations.desc: Increases all party members' Max HP by 10% for 25s for every opponent marked by Lifeline when the Lifeline explodes. A maximum increase of 40% Max HP can be attained in this manner.

constellations.name: Dealer's Sleight
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Lingering Lifeline</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Winner Takes All
constellations.desc:
After using <color=skill>Depth-Clarion Dice</color>, Yelan will enter the Mastermind state.
In this state, all of Yelan's Normal Attacks will be special Breakthrough Barbs. These Breakthrough Barbs will have similar abilities to normal ones and the DMG dealt will be considered Charged Attack DMG, dealing 156% of a normal Breakthrough Barb's DMG.

The Mastermind state lasts 20s and will be cleared after Yelan fires 5 arrows.

talents.name: Firework Flare-Up
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead before being fired off as an attack. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged: ● Charge Level 1: Fires off a flaming arrow that deals Pyro DMG. ● Charge Level 2: Generates a maximum of 3 Kindling Arrows based on time spent charging, releasing them as part of this Aimed Shot. Kindling Arrows will home in on nearby opponents, dealing Pyro DMG on hit. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Niwabi Fire-Dance
talents.desc: Yoimiya waves a sparkler and causes a ring of saltpeter to surround her. Niwabi Enshou During this time, arrows fired by Yoimiya's Normal Attack will be Blazing Arrows, and their DMG will be increased and converted to Pyro DMG. During this time, Normal Attack: Firework Flare-Up will not generate Kindling Arrows at Charge Level 2. This effect will deactivate when Yoimiya leaves the field.

talents.name: Ryuukin Saxifrage
talents.desc: Yoimiya leaps into the air along with her original creation, the "Ryuukin Saxifrage," and fires forth blazing rockets bursting with surprises that deal AoE Pyro DMG and mark one of the hit opponents with Aurous Blaze. Aurous Blaze All Normal/Charged/Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts by any party member other than Yoimiya that hit an opponent marked by Aurous Blaze will trigger an explosion, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. When an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated before its duration expires, the effect will pass on to another nearby opponent, who will inherit the remaining duration. One Aurous Blaze explosion can be triggered every 2s. When Yoimiya is down, Aurous Blaze effects created through her skills will be deactivated.

talents.name: Tricks of the Trouble-Maker
talents.desc: During <color=skill>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color>, shots from Yoimiya's Normal Attack will increase her <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> by 2% on hit. This effect lasts for 3s and can have a maximum of 10 stacks.

talents.name: Summer Night's Dawn
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Ryuukin Saxifrage</color> causes nearby party members (not including Yoimiya) to gain a 10% ATK increase for 15s. Additionally, a further ATK Bonus will be added on based on the number of "<color=skill>Tricks of the Trouble-Maker</color>" stacks Yoimiya possesses when using <color=skill>Ryuukin Saxifrage</color>. Each stack increases this ATK Bonus by 1%.

talents.name: Blazing Match
talents.desc: When Yoimiya crafts Decoration, Ornament, and Landscape-type Furnishings, she has a 100% chance to refund a portion of the materials used.

constellations.name: Agate Ryuukin
constellations.desc:
The Aurous Blaze created by <color=skill>Ryuukin Saxifrage</color> lasts for an extra 4s.
Additionally, when an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated within its duration, Yoimiya's ATK is increased by 20% for 20s.

constellations.name: A Procession of Bonfires
constellations.desc:
When Yoimiya's <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> scores a CRIT Hit, Yoimiya will gain a 25% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> for 6s.
This effect can be triggered even when Yoimiya is not the active character.

constellations.name: Trickster's Flare
constellations.desc:
Increase the Level of <color=skill>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pyrotechnic Professional
constellations.desc: When Yoimiya's own Aurous Blaze triggers an explosion, <color=skill>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color>'s CD is decreased by 1.2.

constellations.name: A Summer Festival's Eve
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Ryuukin Saxifrage</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
constellations.desc: During <color=skill>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color>, Yoimiya's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance of firing an extra Blazing Arrow that deals 60% of its original DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.

talents.name: Rain of Stone
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, causing stone spears to fall along his path. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Dominus Lapidis
talents.desc: Every mountain, rock and inch of land is filled with the power of Geo, but those who can wield such powers freely are few and far between. Press Commands the power of earth to create a Stone Stele. Hold Causes nearby Geo energy to explode, causing the following effects: ● If their maximum number hasn't been reached, creates a Stone Stele. ● Creates a shield of jade. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Zhongli's Max HP. ● Deals AoE Geo DMG. ● If there are nearby targets with the Geo element, it will drain a large amount of Geo element from a maximum of 2 such targets. This effect does not cause DMG. Stone Stele When created, deals AoE Geo DMG. Additionally, it will intermittently resonate with other nearby Geo constructs, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding opponents. The Stone Stele is considered a Geo construct that can both be climbed and used to block attacks. Only one Stele created by Zhongli himself may initially exist at any one time. Jade Shield Possesses 150% DMG Absorption against all Elemental and Physical DMG. Characters protected by the Jade Shield will decrease the Elemental RES and Physical RES of opponents in a small AoE by 20%. This effect cannot be stacked.

talents.name: Planet Befall
talents.desc: Brings a falling meteor down to earth, dealing massive Geo DMG to opponents caught in its AoE and applying the Petrification status to them. Petrification Opponents affected by the Petrification status cannot move.

talents.name: Resonant Waves
talents.desc:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, it will Fortify:
● Fortified characters have 5% increased Shield Strength.
Can stack up to 5 times, and lasts until the Jade Shield disappears.

talents.name: Dominance of Earth
talents.desc:
Zhongli deals bonus DMG based on his Max HP:
● Normal Attack, Charged Attack, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 1.39% of Max HP.
● <color=skill>Dominus Lapidis</color>' Stone Stele, resonance, and hold DMG is increased by 1.9% of Max HP.
● <color=skill>Planet Befall</color>'s DMG is increased by 33% of Max HP.

talents.name: Arcanum of Crystal
talents.desc: Refunds 15% of the ores used when Forging Polearm-type weapons.

constellations.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by <color=skill>Dominus Lapidis</color> that may exist simultaneously to 2.

constellations.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Planet Befall</color> grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

constellations.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dominus Lapidis</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
constellations.desc: Increases <color=skill>Planet Befall</color>'s AoE by 20% and increases the duration of <color=skill>Planet Befall</color>'s Petrification effect by 2s.

constellations.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Planet Befall</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
constellations.desc:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.
A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.

ajilenakh_nut.name: Ajilenakh Nut
ajilenakh_nut.desc: A fruit that grows on evergreen trees within desert oases. The flesh under the tough skin is thick, sweet, and delicious, making it an important food source amongst the desert peoples.

almond.name: Almond
almond.desc: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

apple.name: Apple
apple.desc: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

bamboo_shoot.name: Bamboo Shoot
bamboo_shoot.desc: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

berry.name: Berry
berry.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

bird_egg.name: Bird Egg
bird_egg.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

cabbage.name: Cabbage
cabbage.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

calla_lily.name: Calla Lily
calla_lily.desc: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

carrot.name: Carrot
carrot.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

chilled_meat.name: Chilled Meat
chilled_meat.desc:
Rare, fresh meat.
This species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

crab.name: Crab
crab.desc: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

fish.name: Fish
fish.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

flour.name: Flour
flour.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

fowl.name: Fowl
fowl.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

glabrous_beans.name: Glabrous Beans
glabrous_beans.desc: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

horsetail.name: Horsetail
horsetail.desc: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper — like an aristocrat among the paupers.

jueyun_chili.name: Jueyun Chili
jueyun_chili.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

lavender_melon.name: Lavender Melon
lavender_melon.desc: A brightly-colored fruit. The flesh within transforms into food with a unique mouthfeel when cooked.

lotus_head.name: Lotus Head
lotus_head.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

matsutake.name: Matsutake
matsutake.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

milk.name: Milk
milk.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

mint.name: Mint
mint.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

mushroom.name: Mushroom
mushroom.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

mysterious_meat.name: Mysterious Meat
mysterious_meat.desc: A fresh chunk of meat that seems to be radiating an enigmatic aura. Wonder what it'll taste like?

onion.name: Onion
onion.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

padisarah.name: Padisarah
padisarah.desc: A holy and noble plant. The conditions for growth in its environment are very demanding. The flower buds can be processed to make valuable spices.

pepper.name: Pepper
pepper.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

pinecone.name: Pinecone
pinecone.desc: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

potato.name: Potato
potato.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

qingxin.name: Qingxin
qingxin.desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

radish.name: Radish
radish.desc: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

raw_meat.name: Raw Meat
raw_meat.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

rice.name: Rice
rice.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

rukkhashava_mushrooms.name: Rukkhashava Mushrooms
rukkhashava_mushrooms.desc: A fungus that grows in layers upon layers, like a sea of clouds, and which mostly grows on trees deep in the rainforest. Therefore, they are considered by the people of Sumeru to be the holy crystallization of Rukkhadevata's legacy.

sakura_bloom.name: Sakura Bloom
sakura_bloom.desc: Blossoms from the Sacred Sakura at the Grand Narukami Shrine, filled with a fondness for Inazuma.

salt.name: Salt
salt.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

seagrass.name: Seagrass
seagrass.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

shrimp_meat.name: Shrimp Meat
shrimp_meat.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

small_lamp_grass.name: Small Lamp Grass
small_lamp_grass.desc: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

snapdragon.name: Snapdragon
snapdragon.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

starshroom.name: Starshroom
starshroom.desc: A fungus with a cap that resembles a five-pointed star. It is quite hardy indeed. Once it matures, the center of the cap will split open.

sumeru_rose.name: Sumeru Rose
sumeru_rose.desc: Bright and beautiful, these pure purple flowers give off a pleasant fragrance that will give any passerby pause. While some like to call this a type of "rambler rose," its relative lack of multiple flowers means that it falls under a different floral classification.

sunsettia.name: Sunsettia
sunsettia.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

sweet_flower.name: Sweet Flower
sweet_flower.desc: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

tofu.name: Tofu
tofu.desc: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

tomato.name: Tomato
tomato.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

unagi_meat.name: Unagi Meat
unagi_meat.desc: The fresh meat of an Unagi. If handled properly, it can be used to make fresh, lovely food.

violetgrass.name: Violetgrass
violetgrass.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

wheat.name: Wheat
wheat.desc: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

wolfhook.name: Wolfhook
wolfhook.desc: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

zaytun_peach.name: Zaytun Peach
zaytun_peach.desc: The fruit of a forest shrub. Its flesh is firm and sweet. It is said to have a calming effect on the mind.

butter.name: Butter
butter.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

cream.name: Cream
cream.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

ham.name: Ham
ham.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

smoked_fowl.name: Smoked Fowl
smoked_fowl.desc: Fowl that has been smoked. The firmness of the meat gives new texture to dishes.

spice.name: Spice
spice.desc: A seasoning with varied flavors. It is made from dried Harra Fruits and can enrich the taste of a dish. Therefore, Sumeru locals say, "Spice goes well with anything."

sugar.name: Sugar
sugar.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

bacon.name: Bacon
bacon.desc: Smoked strips of pork. Crispy with a bit of fat, but not too greasy. Mmmmm... bacon.

cheese.name: Cheese
cheese.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

crab_roe.name: Crab Roe
crab_roe.desc: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

jam.name: Jam
jam.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

sausage.name: Sausage
sausage.desc: Finely minced meat wrapped in a skin. A staple of every meat lover's daily diet.

coral_branch_of_a_distant_sea.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

jeweled_branch_of_a_distant_sea.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

jade_branch_of_a_distant_sea.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

golden_branch_of_a_distant_sea.name: Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

copper_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew

iron_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.name: Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew

silver_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.name: Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew

golden_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.name: Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew

achievement_bowmaster.name: Achievement: Bowmaster
achievement_bowmaster.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Marksmanship"

achievement_challenger.name: Achievement: Challenger
achievement_challenger.desc: Even if you're just going out to get a single dandelion, there will be obstacles in your path. But you love a challenge, don't you?
achievement_challenger.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series I"

achievement_challenger_ii.name: Achievement: Challenger II
achievement_challenger_ii.desc: That which awaits at the end of the challenges is...
achievement_challenger_ii.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series II"

achievement_challenger_iii.name: Achievement: Challenger III
achievement_challenger_iii.desc: Finally, a worthy opponent! Our battle will be legendary!
achievement_challenger_iii.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series III"

achievement_chasm.name: Achievement: Chasm
achievement_chasm.desc: Where once miners industriously delved and tunneled, now all is silent. Only the Glazed Sand Crystal and marrows of stone, both millennia-old, still give off any brilliance.
achievement_chasm.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Chasmlighter"

achievement_cliffhanger.name: Achievement: Cliffhanger
achievement_cliffhanger.desc: They say that storytellers love their cliffhangers — but you? You've heard it all before.
achievement_cliffhanger.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Stone Harbor's Nostalgia: Series I"

achievement_colors_of_the_rainbow.name: Achievement: Colors of the Rainbow
achievement_colors_of_the_rainbow.desc: Light can refract into countless colors, but people stop at seven because they're lazy to count. Perhaps the elements are like that, too.
achievement_colors_of_the_rainbow.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Elemental Specialist: Series I"

achievement_deep_dark.name: Achievement: Deep & Dark
achievement_deep_dark.desc: The deeper you delve, the more secrets you shall uncover.
achievement_deep_dark.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Domains and Spiral Abyss: Series I"

achievement_explorer.name: Achievement: Explorer
achievement_explorer.desc: After all your wanderings throughout the world, do not forget the reason why you first set out.
achievement_explorer.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Mortal Travails: Series I"

achievement_fated_encounter.name: Achievement: Fated Encounter
achievement_fated_encounter.desc: One day, our encounter at this moment shall shine like a star of reminiscence in our hearts.
achievement_fated_encounter.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Meetings in Outrealm: Series III"

achievement_full_bloom.name: Achievement: Full Bloom
achievement_full_bloom.desc: Gather ye then soil from all corners of the universe, and from it may countless flowers grow.
achievement_full_bloom.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "A Realm Beyond: Series III"

achievement_gate.name: Achievement: Gate
achievement_gate.desc: What encounters lie on the other side of this door?
achievement_gate.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Meetings in Outrealm: Series II"

achievement_hero.name: Achievement: Hero
achievement_hero.desc: Your hero's journey began before you knew it, but it's the experiences that really made it special.
achievement_hero.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "The Hero's Journey"

achievement_hill_dwellers.name: Achievement: Hill Dwellers
achievement_hill_dwellers.desc: The hilichurls were dubbed the "hill devils." But a certain young girl named Musk insists on calling them the "hill dwellers."
achievement_hill_dwellers.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Olah!: Series I"

achievement_invoker.name: Achievement: Invoker
achievement_invoker.desc: "In this village, no one can defeat me!"
achievement_invoker.obtain: Reward for completing all achievements under "Genius Invokation TCG"

achievement_mirrored_dreams.name: Achievement: Mirrored Dreams
achievement_mirrored_dreams.desc: "A millennium of obsession and tragic yearning has long been lost in the sandstorms of those blazing nights. But the eternal verdant oasis of her dreams is, in all likelihood, as tender as it was at the first..."
achievement_mirrored_dreams.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series VI"

achievement_nails.name: Achievement: Nails
achievement_nails.desc: Wait, if these fish can't be eaten, then why are we hammering these nails into fishhooks?" "Oh, you wouldn't understand."
achievement_nails.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Teyvat Fishing Guide: Series I"

achievement_reunion.name: Achievement: Reunion
achievement_reunion.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Meetings in Outrealm: Series I"

achievement_roaming.name: Achievement: Roaming
achievement_roaming.desc: Every journey and memory is a unique miracle that only belongs to the traveler.
achievement_roaming.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Mortal Travails: Series III"

achievement_sandstorm.name: Achievement: Sandstorm
achievement_sandstorm.desc: The endless sandstorm conceals ancient dreams...
achievement_sandstorm.obtain: Reward for completing all achievements under "Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series II"

achievement_seven_lights.name: Achievement: Seven Lights
achievement_seven_lights.desc: Anyone can play a tune that belongs just to them, and like the dew under grass, can reflect the seven lights of heaven.
achievement_seven_lights.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Elemental Specialist: Series II"

achievement_snowy_land.name: Achievement: Snowy Land
achievement_snowy_land.desc: You've heard many stories about Snezhnaya. What does it look like in your mind's eye?
achievement_snowy_land.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Snezhnaya Does Not Believe in Tears: Series I"

achievement_snowy_summit.name: Achievement: Snowy Summit
achievement_snowy_summit.desc: A draconian peak must be scaled.
achievement_snowy_summit.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Visitors on the Icy Mountain"

achievement_stone_dragon.name: Achievement: Stone Dragon
achievement_stone_dragon.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series IV"

achievement_tea_time.name: Achievement: Tea Time
achievement_tea_time.desc: The days and months pass within the teapot.
achievement_tea_time.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "A Realm Beyond: Series I"

achievement_thunderclap.name: Achievement: Thunderclap
achievement_thunderclap.desc: Listen to the sound that comes from the clouds. That is its resentful rage, and its tiny wish.
achievement_thunderclap.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series V"

achievement_traversal.name: Achievement: Traversal
achievement_traversal.desc: A traveler shall experience ten thousand tales, and each shall form a part of the traveler's soul.
achievement_traversal.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Mortal Travails: Series II"

achievement_vacation_home.name: Achievement: Vacation Home
achievement_vacation_home.desc: The world is wide under the eaves.
achievement_vacation_home.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "A Realm Beyond: Series II"

achievement_virtuoso.name: Achievement: Virtuoso
achievement_virtuoso.desc: After mastering these skills, you may just find that you can get by just fine without engaging in battle. If you are without any commission to complete, that is.
achievement_virtuoso.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "The Art of Adventure"

inazuma_eagleplume.name: Inazuma: Eagleplume
inazuma_eagleplume.obtain: Reward for completing all achievements under "The Chronicles of the Sea of Fog " [sic]

inazuma_kujou_insignia.name: Inazuma: Kujou Insignia
inazuma_kujou_insignia.desc: This Tri-Commission house-crest represents the Tenryou Commission's Kujou Clan.
inazuma_kujou_insignia.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I"

inazuma_sangonomiya_crest.name: Inazuma: Sangonomiya Crest
inazuma_sangonomiya_crest.desc: This is the emblem of the Sangonomiya Clan, the leaders of Watatsumi's people.
inazuma_sangonomiya_crest.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II"

inazuma_tokoyo.name: Inazuma: Tokoyo
inazuma_tokoyo.desc: "O Mighty Sun! What use are your heat and light if you cannot own all that they survey?"
inazuma_tokoyo.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "The Light of Day"

liyue_stillness_of_stone.name: Liyue: Stillness of Stone
liyue_stillness_of_stone.desc: Witness the lonely, cloud-covered peaks of Liyue.
liyue_stillness_of_stone.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Liyue: The Harbor of Stone and Contracts"

mondstadt_whistling_wind.name: Mondstadt: Whistling Wind
mondstadt_whistling_wind.desc: Listen to the singing of Mondstadt's birds and winds.
mondstadt_whistling_wind.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Mondstadt: The City of Wind and Song"

sumeru_sandtreader.name: Sumeru: Sandtreader
sumeru_sandtreader.desc: The sands subsume the tracks of travelers, and they await the day when a gust of wind will reveal gilded memories once more.
sumeru_sandtreader.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I"

sumeru_shimmering_woods.name: Sumeru: Shimmering Woods
sumeru_shimmering_woods.desc: What dreams lie within the rich slumber of the stories deep in the woods?
sumeru_shimmering_woods.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Sumeru: The Rainforest of Lore"

travel_notes_awakening.name: Travel Notes: Awakening
travel_notes_awakening.desc: The three realms quake, heaven and earth awaken. The Sangacorexes, too, rise again from their eternal slumber.
travel_notes_awakening.obtain: Into the Shadows BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_azure_main.name: Travel Notes: Azure Main
travel_notes_azure_main.desc: Years have gone by, and you wake from an old dream. Inside the keepsake shell, lingers the blue ocean of those summer days.
travel_notes_azure_main.obtain: Azure Main BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_catch_the_wind.name: Travel Notes: Catch the Wind
travel_notes_catch_the_wind.desc: The most difficult part of writing a travel journal is coming up with the beginning.
travel_notes_catch_the_wind.obtain: Catch the Wind BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_chalk.name: Travel Notes: Chalk
travel_notes_chalk.desc: Remember to keep warm when setting foot on the mountain.
travel_notes_chalk.obtain: Mountaineer's Endurance BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_divine_will.name: Travel Notes: Divine Will
travel_notes_divine_will.desc: "Once upon a time, loyal souls did scatter east and west like swan geese." "Today I light my lantern, that they may not lose their way."
travel_notes_divine_will.obtain: Gorge Sunset BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_fading_star.name: Travel Notes: Fading Star
travel_notes_fading_star.desc: So long as there is still desire left in your heart, when you hold your head high you will see that which glitters but is not light.
travel_notes_fading_star.obtain: Fading Star BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_flowing_hues.name: Travel Notes: Flowing Hues
travel_notes_flowing_hues.desc: The luxurious colors flow past — all things are renewed.
travel_notes_flowing_hues.obtain: Oceansong BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_fungus_land.name: Travel Notes: Fungus Land
travel_notes_fungus_land.desc: "Traveler, there is no need to grieve, for the wind at dawn will blow the fungal spores carrying beautiful dreams to the fields that contain your hopes..."
travel_notes_fungus_land.obtain: A Previous Life BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_grand_narukami_shrine.name: Travel Notes: Grand Narukami Shrine
travel_notes_grand_narukami_shrine.desc: The sakura of Mt. Yougou symbolizes the Grand Narukami Shrine.
travel_notes_grand_narukami_shrine.obtain: Divine Thunder BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_heavenly_general.name: Travel Notes: Heavenly General
travel_notes_heavenly_general.desc: "You were not created to punish evil. But as to what your purpose is... I fear that I, too, do not know."
travel_notes_heavenly_general.obtain: Mystic Repose BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_irodori.name: Travel Notes: Irodori
travel_notes_irodori.desc: Those who share a hobby are known as a group as "fans." Best come up with those stories, everyone, before the kitsune editor-in-chief dreams up copyright law... Or perhaps she has already dreamed it up, but does not altogether mind?
travel_notes_irodori.obtain: Luxuriant Vibrance BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_lyratum.name: Travel Notes: Lyratum
travel_notes_lyratum.desc: Only this flower remains on the heights where all trees have withered.
travel_notes_lyratum.obtain: Shadowed Snowfall BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_midsummer.name: Travel Notes: Midsummer
travel_notes_midsummer.obtain: Marine Hues BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_mingxiao.name: Travel Notes: Mingxiao
travel_notes_mingxiao.desc: When everyone's wishes are gathered together, they can light up the long night.
travel_notes_mingxiao.obtain: Lantern-Lit Sky BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_moonchaser.name: Travel Notes: Moonchaser
travel_notes_moonchaser.desc: May the moonlight wash over you, O pursuer!
travel_notes_moonchaser.obtain: Moonchaser BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_returning_winds.name: Travel Notes: Returning Winds
travel_notes_returning_winds.desc: The years come and go. Only remembrance and the winds that return do not change.
travel_notes_returning_winds.obtain: Returning Winds BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_rhythm_and_rhyme.name: Travel Notes: Rhythm and Rhyme
travel_notes_rhythm_and_rhyme.desc: With magnificent sunglow sheds light on the night sky, chimes are orchestrated to celebrate the bygone year. The gilded palaces are adorned with beaded curtains, the railings painted silver by bright moonlight, and the feasts brimmed with jolly singing and dances. Is that flowers or fireworks? A wealth of instruments plays in unison, harmonious and pleasant.

travel_notes_stellar_rivers.name: Travel Notes: Stellar Rivers
travel_notes_stellar_rivers.desc: Forgotten is the name of the ancient feast, scattered are the three rivers amongst a plumage of clouds, and across the curve of twilight does autumn yet linger.
travel_notes_stellar_rivers.obtain: Stellar Rivers BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_sub_space_recreation.name: Travel Notes: Sub-Space Recreation
travel_notes_sub_space_recreation.desc: How many nights have you spent with "a stone for your pillow?"
travel_notes_sub_space_recreation.obtain: Realm of Diversion BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

travel_notes_windblume.name: Travel Notes: Windblume
travel_notes_windblume.desc: Who has seen the wind? Neither you nor I. Nor has anyone ever seen love, till a bouquet comes flying by.
travel_notes_windblume.obtain: Windborne Blossoms BP Reward (Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass)

travel_notes_woodlands.name: Travel Notes: Woodlands
travel_notes_woodlands.desc: Beneath the tranquil moon and inside the deep valley grows blooming roses. 'Tis a paradise with your presence.
travel_notes_woodlands.obtain: Luxuriant Woodlands BP Reward - Buy the Gnostic Chorus Battle Pass

albedo_sun_blossom.name: Albedo: Sun Blossom
albedo_sun_blossom.desc: Allow me to bear witness to this miracle.
albedo_sun_blossom.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Albedo

alhaitham_enlightenment.name: Alhaitham: Enlightenment
alhaitham_enlightenment.desc: "The only things researchers should abide by are debates and dialectics. Only by questioning everything at all times can one avoid falling into prejudice."
alhaitham_enlightenment.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Alhaitham

aloy_dawn.name: Aloy: Dawn
aloy_dawn.desc: "Everything I do is in the service of life, not death."
aloy_dawn.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Aloy

amber_bunny.name: Amber: Bunny
amber_bunny.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Amber

barbara_flow.name: Barbara: Flow
barbara_flow.desc: When Barbara sings, her melodic voice flows like the tender healing of a clear spring.
barbara_flow.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Barbara

beidou_weighing_anchor.name: Beidou: Weighing Anchor
beidou_weighing_anchor.desc: "Weighing anchor out to sea, one is wont to waver. But look to the skies, and the stars shall light the way."
beidou_weighing_anchor.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Beidou

bennett_recognition.name: Bennett: Recognition
bennett_recognition.desc: A sign of recognition from Benny's Adventure Team.
bennett_recognition.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Bennett

candace_grey_heron.name: Candace: Grey Heron
candace_grey_heron.desc: The burning winds of the past ruffle the heron's feathers, but the bird has eyes only for the morning star at first light.
candace_grey_heron.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Candace

childe_foul_legacy.name: Childe: Foul Legacy
childe_foul_legacy.desc: This bears all the marks of that fellow who gallivants as he pleases across the continent with his ever-changing combat styles. Yet, his "Foul Legacy" was not originally his. Rather, it was taught to him by that solitary girl who dwelt in the darkest corners of the universe.
childe_foul_legacy.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Tartaglia

chongyun_spirit_blade.name: Chongyun: Spirit Blade
chongyun_spirit_blade.desc: This was originally a peachwood sword made of ice. But a big enough ice block makes a better exorcist's tool than peachwood.
chongyun_spirit_blade.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Chongyun

collei_good_virtue.name: Collei: Good Virtue
collei_good_virtue.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Collei

cyno_silence.name: Cyno: Silence
cyno_silence.desc: Whenever Cyno falls into a profound silence, he must be considering some weighty judgment... Or perhaps he is simply considering something amusing.
cyno_silence.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Cyno

diluc_flames.name: Diluc: Flames
diluc_flames.desc: Master Crepus painted many eagles during his lifetime, but he never could've foreseen creating an eagle with such fire.
diluc_flames.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Diluc

diona_meow.name: Diona: Meow!
diona_meow.desc: All who have Kätzlein blood will have such feline features. An ancient prank played by a certain someone, perhaps?
diona_meow.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Diona

dori_jinni.name: Dori: Jinni
dori_jinni.desc: If you wipe the lamp she gave you and then scrub the Mora you gave her, no wish is unattainable... right?
dori_jinni.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Dori

eula_ice_sealed.name: Eula: Ice-Sealed
eula_ice_sealed.desc: A cold heart is but a shell to protect oneself.
eula_ice_sealed.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Eula

faruzan_sealed_secret.name: Faruzan: Sealed Secret
faruzan_sealed_secret.desc: "A—Anyway! Next time, remember to refer to me as Madam Faruzan before you ask a question! Seriously..."
faruzan_sealed_secret.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Faruzan

fischl_night_raven.name: Fischl: Night Raven
fischl_night_raven.desc: A raven dark as midnight with wings that can block out the sun. "I permit thee to conceive his likeness upon such decoration!"
fischl_night_raven.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Fischl

ganyu_qilin.name: Ganyu: Qilin
ganyu_qilin.desc: Do no harm to plant nor insect.
ganyu_qilin.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Ganyu

gorou_leisurely_hound.name: Gorou: Leisurely Hound
gorou_leisurely_hound.desc: As long as you believe in the path you are walking, then everything you encounter on your journey will be a source of happiness.
gorou_leisurely_hound.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Gorou

hu_tao_spirit_soother.name: Hu Tao: Spirit Soother
hu_tao_spirit_soother.desc: Director Hu Tao isn't scary at all. Probably.
hu_tao_spirit_soother.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Hu Tao

itto_oni_face.name: Itto: Oni Face
itto_oni_face.desc: A real man puts sorrow and anger behind him and smiles brightly for the world to see!
itto_oni_face.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Arataki Itto

jean_the_winds_course.name: Jean: The Winds' Course
jean_the_winds_course.desc: The dandelion, also called "lion's fang" by some, is the flower most sensitive to the direction of the wind.
jean_the_winds_course.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Jean

kaedehara_kazuha_autumn_maple_viewing.name: Kaedehara Kazuha: Autumn Maple-Viewing
kaedehara_kazuha_autumn_maple_viewing.desc: "The pine-song ripples as red leaves billow."
kaedehara_kazuha_autumn_maple_viewing.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kaedehara Kazuha

kaeya_pavo_ocellus.name: Kaeya: Pavo Ocellus
kaeya_pavo_ocellus.desc: The pattern of peacock feathers resembles eyes that never shut. Can we really say that this Pavo Ocellus is missing an eye...?
kaeya_pavo_ocellus.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kaeya

kamisato_ayaka_folding_fan.name: Kamisato Ayaka: Folding Fan
kamisato_ayaka_folding_fan.desc: Ayaka does constantly change out the fans she carries with her, of course. If you're buying her some as gifts, remember not to send summer fans or throwing fans. Dancing fans or tea fans are good choices, though.
kamisato_ayaka_folding_fan.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kamisato Ayaka

kamisato_ayato_ripple.name: Kamisato Ayato: Ripple
kamisato_ayato_ripple.desc: The camellia alights upon the mirrored pond, sending ripples throughout the water.
kamisato_ayato_ripple.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kamisato Ayato

keqing_lightning_stiletto.name: Keqing: Lightning Stiletto
keqing_lightning_stiletto.desc: It was originally invented to just test out one's surroundings and climb to high places, really...
keqing_lightning_stiletto.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Keqing

klee_explosive.name: Klee: Explosive
klee_explosive.desc: Klee's lucky explosive — can you tell if it's Jumpy Dumpty or Dodoco? (Hint: Look carefully at the tail...)
klee_explosive.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Klee

kujou_sara_tengu.name: Kujou Sara: Tengu
kujou_sara_tengu.desc: Kujou Sara may have forsaken the arrogant life of the tengu race, but she has never neglected their brilliance with the sword or their supernatural might.
kujou_sara_tengu.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kujou Sara

kuki_shinobu_net.name: Kuki Shinobu: Net
kuki_shinobu_net.desc: "You know those Naku Weed rings they have in Inazuma? You know, the kind that can drive out evil? Shinobu got the idea that since wicked things won't cross their boundaries willingly, we could make them into items that could be actively used. Ah, her talent for being a shrine maiden is truly frightening..."
kuki_shinobu_net.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kuki Shinobu

layla_daydream.name: Layla: Daydream
