layla_daydream.desc: "The starry sky in your dreams will illuminate your way forward, on the premise that the crystal in your heart reflects clear lights."
layla_daydream.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Layla

lisa_tempus_fugit.name: Lisa: Tempus Fugit
lisa_tempus_fugit.desc: An hourglass marks the end of the work day for Lisa. Its sand moves fast.
lisa_tempus_fugit.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Lisa

mona_starry_sky.name: Mona: Starry Sky
mona_starry_sky.desc: A girl gazes down at the stars' reflection on the water, pondering the joys and sorrows of life.
mona_starry_sky.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Mona

nahida_crescent.name: Nahida: Crescent
nahida_crescent.desc: The rising moon admires the sun, because her light can shine all over the earth. On the other hand, the setting sun is envious of the moon, for she can be accompanied by the sweetest of dreams.
nahida_crescent.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Nahida

nilou_lotus_dance.name: Nilou: Lotus Dance
nilou_lotus_dance.desc: The lotus that blooms amidst the pure water is naught but a flash of light beneath her toes.
nilou_lotus_dance.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Nilou

ningguang_phoenix.name: Ningguang: Phoenix
ningguang_phoenix.desc: They say that "more's the pity that phoenixes are few." But seriously, one Ningguang is more than enough...
ningguang_phoenix.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Ningguang

noelle_protector.name: Noelle: Protector
noelle_protector.desc: Noelle is quite special. Noelle won't let any harm come to you.
noelle_protector.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Noelle

qiqi_cold_storage.name: Qiqi: Cold Storage
qiqi_cold_storage.desc: What should be kept in the fridge? Dr. Baizhu's herbs, coconut milk... and Hu Tao.
qiqi_cold_storage.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Qiqi

raiden_shogun_enlightenment.name: Raiden Shogun: Enlightenment
raiden_shogun_enlightenment.desc: Not simply Ei, and not merely the Raiden Shogun. Observe yourself also with one stormy eye, and you will someday reach a breakthrough.
raiden_shogun_enlightenment.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with the Raiden Shogun

razor_wolvensprint.name: Razor: Wolvensprint
razor_wolvensprint.desc: It's quite a sight to behold Razor and the wolves prepare their dinner, but they won't let Klee or the Traveler see the slightly gruesome affair.
razor_wolvensprint.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Razor

rosaria_indenture.name: Rosaria: Indenture
rosaria_indenture.desc: The unselfish warmth and goodwill of the people is, to her, a kindness that she must repay, and so it is an indenture that follows her forever.
rosaria_indenture.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Rosaria

sangonomiya_kokomi_the_deep.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi: The Deep
sangonomiya_kokomi_the_deep.desc: All Watatsumi islanders know this tale: that deep beneath the waves lies their former home.
sangonomiya_kokomi_the_deep.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sangonomiya Kokomi

sayu_muji_muji_daruma.name: Sayu: Muji-Muji Daruma
sayu_muji_muji_daruma.desc: It is even smaller than Sayu, sure, but it can help her do the things she doesn't want to do.
sayu_muji_muji_daruma.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sayu

shenhe_comb.name: Shenhe: Comb
shenhe_comb.desc: The early onset of white hair is often correlated to one's sorrows. Since "comb" and "scatter" are similarly read in Liyue's language, they believe that combing one's hair is the same as scattering one's misfortunes.
shenhe_comb.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Shenhe

shikanoin_heizou_temari.name: Shikanoin Heizou: Temari
shikanoin_heizou_temari.desc: A Temari of entwining strings in various colors. It must have taken someone's great effort to make such an item, yet Heizou only sees it as a simple game to untangle each string.
shikanoin_heizou_temari.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Shikanoin Heizou

sucrose_bio_alchemy.name: Sucrose: Bio-Alchemy
sucrose_bio_alchemy.desc: If you closely examine an Anemo Hypostasis before it disappears, you will discover that they are actually quite square.
sucrose_bio_alchemy.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sucrose

thoma_blazing_guard.name: Thoma: Blazing Guard
thoma_blazing_guard.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Thoma

tighnari_dew_kissed.name: Tighnari: Dew-Kissed
tighnari_dew_kissed.desc: Tighnari takes good care of his big, fluffy tail. The essential oil he uses was extracted from flowers and mixed together meticulously. It gives off a faint, calming scent.
tighnari_dew_kissed.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Tighnari

venti_azure_sky.name: Venti: Azure Sky
venti_azure_sky.desc: The bright blue of a cloudless sky and the melodious tone of Der Frühling complement each other perfectly.
venti_azure_sky.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Venti

wanderer_drifters_ballad.name: Wanderer: Drifter's Ballad
wanderer_drifters_ballad.desc: In a world most transient does the past hide, and in the whims of flowing flowers does thin snow abide.
wanderer_drifters_ballad.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with the Wanderer

xiangling_fresh_from_the_pan.name: Xiangling: Fresh from the Pan
xiangling_fresh_from_the_pan.desc: Try saying this three times fast: "Guoba sears sea snails by Liyue's sea shore."
xiangling_fresh_from_the_pan.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xiangling

xiao_mask.name: Xiao: Mask
xiao_mask.desc: He longs for a day to come when he will wear the mask and dance — not to conquer demons, but to the tune of that flute amid a sea of flowers.
xiao_mask.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xiao

xingqiu_rainbow.name: Xingqiu: Rainbow
xingqiu_rainbow.desc: Come watch the night rain that brings no rainbow.
xingqiu_rainbow.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xingqiu

xinyan_songs_end.name: Xinyan: Song's End
xinyan_songs_end.desc: Xinyan only has time to examine her instrument carefully after the performance is over. Even in silence, it is a beauty.
xinyan_songs_end.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xinyan

yae_miko_kitsune_dreaming.name: Yae Miko: Kitsune Dreaming
yae_miko_kitsune_dreaming.desc: Where can Yae Miko's fox form be found? In your dreams, that's where.
yae_miko_kitsune_dreaming.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yae Miko

yanfei_impartial.name: Yanfei: Impartial
yanfei_impartial.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yanfei

yaoyao_yuegui.name: Yaoyao: Yuegui
yaoyao_yuegui.desc: "Can you guess which one here is Yuegui? That's right, all of them are!"
yaoyao_yuegui.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Yaoyao

yelan_throw.name: Yelan: Throw
yelan_throw.desc: "Dice are always quite hard to make 'fair.' That goes double for dice with shoddier workmanship. The weighting on each numbered side will almost certainly be unbalanced."
yelan_throw.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yelan

yoimiya_auratus_spark.name: Yoimiya: Auratus Spark
yoimiya_auratus_spark.desc: Even momentarily sparks can leave beautiful, unquenchable flames in the hearts of those who watch the night sky.
yoimiya_auratus_spark.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yoimiya

yun_jin_rhyme.name: Yun Jin: Rhyme
yun_jin_rhyme.desc: Ms. Yun has two sorts of teachers. The critics of her onstage performances are one, and the books on rhyme she references while writing are the other.
yun_jin_rhyme.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yun Jin

zhongli_planet_befall.name: Zhongli: Planet Befall
zhongli_planet_befall.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Zhongli

celebration_battlesong.name: Celebration: Battlesong
celebration_battlesong.desc: Good omens must appear thrice for good fortune to come. One bows thrice at curtain call. The opponents to defeat number three.
celebration_battlesong.obtain: Obtained from the Legend of the Vagabond Sword event

celebration_binge_vessel.name: Celebration: Binge Vessel
celebration_binge_vessel.desc: There's a great many stories here, but no alcohol, so it's safe for Paimon to drink.
celebration_binge_vessel.obtain: Obtained from the Of Drink A-Dreaming event

celebration_feast.name: Celebration: Feast
celebration_feast.obtain: Obtained from the "Gifts of an Outworld Encounter" event (CN only)

celebration_fruit_of_wisdom.name: Celebration: Fruit of Wisdom
celebration_fruit_of_wisdom.desc: What knowledge might the fruit of wisdom bring, were it to descend upon the land? Either way, it'll taste good as a drink if left in Diona's hands.
celebration_fruit_of_wisdom.obtain: Obtained from the Energy Amplifier Initiation event

celebration_hypostasis.name: Celebration: Hypostasis
celebration_hypostasis.desc: My opponent for today seems to have an artistic temperament.
celebration_hypostasis.obtain: Obtained from the Hypostatic Symphony event

celebration_ikki.name: Celebration: Ikki
celebration_ikki.desc: "I will ask you a question, and you shall answer me with your sword."
celebration_ikki.obtain: Obtained from the Hyakunin Ikki event

celebration_kaboomball.name: Celebration: Kaboomball
celebration_kaboomball.desc: "In a land far, far away, there was a kingdom known as the Grand Alliance, and the people living there could throw ever-changing, quick, and powerful Kaboomballs."
celebration_kaboomball.obtain: Obtained from the Kaboomball Kombat event

celebration_lantern_light.name: Celebration: Lantern-Light
celebration_lantern_light.desc: Every year on this day, the lanterns light up the night. May the fire never die, and may humanity endure.
celebration_lantern_light.obtain: Obtained from the Lantern Rite event

celebration_lenticular_clouds.name: Celebration: Lenticular Clouds
celebration_lenticular_clouds.desc: The floating clouds dispersed to the thousand peaks at dawn.

celebration_mechanicus.name: Celebration: Mechanicus
celebration_mechanicus.desc: You claim to have seen all mechanisms, but have you ever considered playing yourself as a pawn?
celebration_mechanicus.obtain: Obtained from the Lantern Rite event

celebration_peekaboo.name: Celebration: Peekaboo!
celebration_peekaboo.desc: You can't see me. You can't see me.

celebration_shining_scale.name: Celebration: Shining Scale
celebration_shining_scale.desc: The universe does play host to just such a snake, whose scales glitter with precisely these colors.
celebration_shining_scale.obtain: Obtained from the Genshin Impact X Razer Collaboration event

celebration_vastness.name: Celebration: Vastness
celebration_vastness.desc: Imagine the vast expanse of a sea of stars. Imagine a one followed by a hundred zeros.
celebration_vastness.obtain: Obtained from the Google Play Gift Card Collab-Event

celebration_wondrous_calculation.name: Celebration: Wondrous Calculation
celebration_wondrous_calculation.desc: A true grandmaster can see the board a thousand steps ahead.
celebration_wondrous_calculation.obtain: Obtained from the Theater Mechanicus: Stage of Wonders event

frostbearing_ancient_tree.name: Frostbearing: Ancient Tree
frostbearing_ancient_tree.desc: We shall rise again — the tree of old has sprouted anew.
frostbearing_ancient_tree.obtain: Reward for reaching Frostbearing Tree's Gratitude Lv. 9

inazuma_sacred_sakura.name: Inazuma: Sacred Sakura
inazuma_sacred_sakura.desc: Wherever the sakura petals fall, there the protection of the sacred tree rests.
inazuma_sacred_sakura.obtain: Reward for reaching Sacred Sakura's Favor Lv. 48

lumens_stone_of_light.name: Lumens: Stone of Light
lumens_stone_of_light.desc: What flows within this nameless, voiceless azure crystal? The secrets of the heavens? Or the whispers of the abyss?
lumens_stone_of_light.obtain: Reward for enhancing the Lumenstone Adjuvant to Lv. 10

inazuma_kamisato_crest.name: Inazuma: Kamisato Crest
inazuma_kamisato_crest.desc: This Tri-Commission house-crest represents the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan.

inazuma_raiden_emblem.name: Inazuma: Raiden Emblem
inazuma_raiden_emblem.desc: This is the emblem of the Ogosho Shogun, and is the banner of her troops, the Electro Mitsudomoe.

liyue_a_thousand_ships.name: Liyue: A Thousand Ships
liyue_a_thousand_ships.desc: Many boats have been numbered by day and night.

liyue_in_the_clouds.name: Liyue: In the Clouds
liyue_in_the_clouds.desc: The peaks adorn the clouded moon.

mondstadt_blessing.name: Mondstadt: Blessing
mondstadt_blessing.desc: They who have it in their hearts to bless others shall themselves be blessed.

mondstadt_heros_fame.name: Mondstadt: Hero's Fame
mondstadt_heros_fame.desc: The name of the Honorary Knight has spread far and wide among the citizenry.

sumeru_observance.name: Sumeru: Observance
sumeru_observance.desc: Behold everything the world has to offer: see through all that the sky's light surveys.

sumeru_unsullied.name: Sumeru: Unsullied
sumeru_unsullied.desc: The wise, graced with the thorough knowledge of the truth, will not be sullied by sin. They are like the Nilotpala Lotus, which remains clear and pure even after the rains and winds have passed.

a_stunning_stratagem.name: A Stunning Stratagem
a_stunning_stratagem.desc: Sangonomiya Kokomi's specialty. The egg is wrapped up almost like a package, and the fish tail at the end is both small and very cute. It really makes you wonder what's inside the package, but at the same time, you can't bear to eat such a beautiful-looking thing... You glance at the crystal-clear smile in Kokomi's eyes. Ah, darn it, you've fallen for her trick, haven't you?
a_stunning_stratagem.effect_desc: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

all_weather_beauty.name: All-Weather Beauty
all_weather_beauty.desc: Kaedehara Kazuha's specialty. Made from fish that have been dried on the ship. Kazuha claims that they were completely ordinary fish. But this flavor... this must surely be the definition of free, all-embracing nature, no?
all_weather_beauty.effect_desc: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

bird_egg_sushi.name: Bird Egg Sushi
bird_egg_sushi.desc: An everyday Inazuman dish. The sliced Egg Roll is placed over seasoned rice. Simply made, yet full of flavor.
bird_egg_sushi.effect_desc: Restores 8–10% of Max HP and an additional 800–1,200 HP to the selected character.

chicken_mushroom_skewer.name: Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
chicken_mushroom_skewer.desc: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!
chicken_mushroom_skewer.effect_desc: Restores 8–10% of Max HP and an additional 800–1,200 HP to the selected character.

definitely_not_bar_food.name: Definitely Not Bar Food!
definitely_not_bar_food.desc: Diona's specialty. The fish skin is crisp, and the meat is sumptuous. Only someone with a sufficiently great love for fish would be able to bring out such lovely flavors. Now, if only there were something to drink to go with it... Uh-oh, she's looking this way!
definitely_not_bar_food.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

dry_braised_salted_fish.name: Dry-Braised Salted Fish
dry_braised_salted_fish.desc: Dried fish that has been grilled slowly over a charcoal flame. Fish air-dried overnight have a tinge of the salty sea wind and give off a tantalizing flavor when grilled. Many Inazumans who dwell near the sea know this taste well indeed.
dry_braised_salted_fish.effect_desc: Restores 8–10% of Max HP and an additional 800–1,200 HP to the selected character.

egg_roll.name: Egg Roll
egg_roll.desc: A fried egg dish. Beat eggs well, season and fry them slowly in a wok, roll up into a fixed shape. Pour in egg liquid again and continue until it has all reached a certain thickness, then get ready to plate up. This is a ordinary yet welcoming Inazuman delicacy.
egg_roll.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 50–150 HP.

faith_eternal.name: Faith Eternal
faith_eternal.desc: Kujou Sara's specialty. Forget calling it a dish, this is really more like a snack. The sweet, fluffy flavor really doesn't seem to suit Sara's own preferences. Wait a moment. That symbol on the snack — does this have to do with a certain other person's tastes instead?
faith_eternal.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

flash_fried_filet.name: Flash-Fried Filet
flash_fried_filet.desc: Beidou's specialty. They say that Beidou once learned some tricks from Xiangling, making some refinements and adding more flavor to this dish. If you can clean it out in one go, perhaps you might impress her.
flash_fried_filet.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

fruity_skewers.name: Fruity Skewers
fruity_skewers.desc: Kaeya's specialty. A chewy skewer with a rich sweet aftertaste. Wait... Is this really the smell of fruit?
fruity_skewers.effect_desc: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

grilled_tiger_fish.name: Grilled Tiger Fish
grilled_tiger_fish.desc: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly seasoned and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.
grilled_tiger_fish.effect_desc: Restores 8–10% of Max HP and an additional 800–1,200 HP to the selected character.

lambad_fish_roll.name: Lambad Fish Roll
lambad_fish_roll.desc: A grilled fish dish with a faint floral scent. It is said that Lambad once adventured far and wide in his youth. Everywhere he went, he would taste the grilled fish at local taverns. Lambad found it regrettable that this dish was not widely available in Sumeru, so he invented his own fish roll. According to the people who often dine at his tavern, the tales of his adventures aren't necessarily true, but his fish roll is undoubtedly delicious.
lambad_fish_roll.effect_desc: Restores 8–10% of Max HP and an additional 800–1,200 HP to the selected character.

mint_jelly.name: Mint Jelly
mint_jelly.desc: A refreshing dessert. The steps to making this are quite simple indeed, and when it slides down your throat, the faint, fresh flavor of mint will leave you feeling reinvigorated for the rest of the day.
mint_jelly.effect_desc: Restores 8–10% of Max HP and an additional 800–1,200 HP to the selected character.

minty_bean_soup.name: Minty Bean Soup
minty_bean_soup.desc: A rich soup made with simple ingredients. Mints and beans were boiled and ground together to get a smooth texture. The soup was then left on low heat till it thickened. Finally, some beans and mints were sprinkled on the top. This refreshing delicacy tastes equally good whether served hot or cold.
minty_bean_soup.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 50–150 HP.

miso_soup.name: Miso Soup
miso_soup.desc: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The ingredients used here are very common and it is made simply, but this small bowl of soup has the power to ensure that you shall not grow weary on your journey, even if you travel on foot.
miso_soup.effect_desc:
Restores 8–10% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 210–300 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

mondstadt_grilled_fish.name: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
mondstadt_grilled_fish.desc: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.
mondstadt_grilled_fish.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 50–150 HP.

mora_meat.name: Mora Meat
mora_meat.desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.
mora_meat.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 50–150 HP.

outriders_champion_steak.name: Outrider's Champion Steak!
outriders_champion_steak.desc: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.
outriders_champion_steak.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

qiankun_mora_meat.name: Qiankun Mora Meat
qiankun_mora_meat.desc: Ningguang's specialty. The pastry is perfectly soft and waxy, as is the consistency of the meat, and the honey-like meat juices ooze out as you squeeze it. Wherever did the high and mighty Tianquan Lady Ningguang learn to make this dish?
qiankun_mora_meat.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

radish_veggie_soup.name: Radish Veggie Soup
radish_veggie_soup.desc: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.
radish_veggie_soup.effect_desc:
Restores 8–10% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 210–300 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

rice_buns.name: Rice Buns
rice_buns.desc: Soft and fluffy buns. The rice and horsetail have been ground into flour and kneaded into dough before being placed into a steaming basket. They can be eaten as-is or with a vegetable filling. Portable and satiating, it is a very popular dish in the Liyue region.
rice_buns.effect_desc: Restores 8–10% of Max HP and an additional 800–1,200 HP to the selected character.

satiety_gel.name: Satiety Gel
satiety_gel.desc: Aloy's specialty. The cross-section looks perfect, its shape is regular, and it gives off a cool air. At first, Aloy seemed a bit apprehensive as to whether you'd enjoy this rather unique dessert, but she was relieved when you wolfed it all down in one go...
satiety_gel.effect_desc: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

soba_noodles.name: Soba Noodles
soba_noodles.desc: A plain and simple noodle dish. The buckwheat noodles are boiled and then cooled. Their texture is smooth and they have just the right amount of toughness. The inexpensive ingredients and simple make of this dish have made it very popular amongst Inazumans.
soba_noodles.effect_desc:
Restores 8–10% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 210–300 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

steak.name: Steak
steak.desc: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.
steak.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 50–150 HP.

stir_fried_filet.name: Stir-Fried Filet
stir_fried_filet.desc: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.
stir_fried_filet.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 50–150 HP.

survival_grilled_fish.name: Survival Grilled Fish
survival_grilled_fish.desc: Keqing's specialty. This dish was not grilled. Instead, it was fried from within through the delicate application of Electro. A gentle bite reveals fragrant fish under the lightly charred skin, its taste perfectly balanced. So, is this how she survives in the wild? You really can't judge a book by its cover.
survival_grilled_fish.effect_desc: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

sweet_shrimp_sushi.name: Sweet Shrimp Sushi
sweet_shrimp_sushi.desc: A fresh and sweet traditional dish. Cleanly bisected shrimp is laid over rice and shaped with your bare hands. The springy shrimp meat and the delicious rice highlight the flavor all the more.
sweet_shrimp_sushi.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 50–150 HP.

teyvat_charred_egg.name: Teyvat Charred Egg
teyvat_charred_egg.desc: Bennett's specialty. For some reason, every single fried egg is a little burnt around the edges. That said, the burnt crisp does lends a whole new flavor to the dish.
teyvat_charred_egg.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

teyvat_fried_egg.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
teyvat_fried_egg.desc: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.
teyvat_fried_egg.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 50–150 HP.

warmth.name: "Warmth"
warmth.desc: Thoma's specialty. The intricate appearance of this dish belies the simple ingredients used. But take a sip, and Thoma's sunshine smile comes straight to mind. Perhaps this is his special ability: warming the hearts of others using the simplest of ingredients.
warmth.effect_desc: Restores 14% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 350 HP every 5s for 30s.

aaru_mixed_rice.name: Aaru Mixed Rice
aaru_mixed_rice.desc: A large serving of filling staple food. In this dish that combines rice, noodles, and beans together, the secret of great taste lies in the sweet and sour flavor imparted by tomatoes. Owing to its common nature and low price, this dish is a great choice for sating one's hunger — which is one of the key reasons why this recipe has spread from Aaru Village to the rest of Sumeru.

all_delicacy_parcels.name: All-Delicacy Parcels
all_delicacy_parcels.desc: Xingqiu's specialty. This dish's almost artisan appearance makes one almost reluctant to tuck in. But once you get a taste, its fresh, light and lovely sweetness will make the dish hard to put down.... Hang on a moment. Did he throw the carrots out, by any chance?
all_delicacy_parcels.effect_desc: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

almond_tofu.name: Almond Tofu
almond_tofu.desc: A dessert made out of almond. It has a silky-smooth texture with a long-lasting aroma of almond. It's named tofu only because of its tofu-like shape.
almond_tofu.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 66–95 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

berry_mizu_manjuu.name: Berry Mizu Manjuu
berry_mizu_manjuu.desc: A crystal-clear snack. The transparent skin wraps the yellow filling. It is said that some vendors will put these snacks into a small clay bowl and immerse it in water to ensure that the cool mouthfeel is retained. This dish is as transparent as water, but it will not be washed away by flowing water — this is probably the origin of the name.
berry_mizu_manjuu.effect_desc:
Restores 18–22% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 300–470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

cloud_shrouded_jade.name: Cloud-Shrouded Jade
cloud_shrouded_jade.desc: Yun Jin's specialty. This sweet and sticky snack will somehow not affect your throat in any negative way, which is why it's Yun Jin's favorite. The aftertaste is most elegant, not something one would get sick of quickly. Come to think of it... This is quite a decent bit more than she would usually make for herself — but who are you to question her kindness?
cloud_shrouded_jade.effect_desc: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

cold_noodles_with_mountain_delicacies.name: Cold Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
cold_noodles_with_mountain_delicacies.desc: Chongyun's specialty. Though these springy noodles would be irresistible in the sweltering summer, Chongyun insists on dining on them even in the chattering cold of winter. What a guy.

crab_roe_kourayaki.name: Crab Roe Kourayaki
crab_roe_kourayaki.desc: A crab meat dish that has been cooked directly over the flames. The meat and roe are mixed evenly, before being garnished with plump crab legs. The happiness that flows forth from that first bite imparts meaning upon your prior forbearance.
crab_roe_kourayaki.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 66–95 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

crab_roe_tofu.name: Crab Roe Tofu
crab_roe_tofu.desc: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Crab roe is stir-fried till the oil within oozes out before being added to boiled tofu and accented with broth. Simple, yes, but gloriously fresh.
crab_roe_tofu.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 250–550 HP.

cream_stew.name: Cream Stew
cream_stew.desc: A meat and vegetable stew. The thick juices taste great with the tender meat and vegetables.
cream_stew.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

crystal_shrimp.name: Crystal Shrimp
crystal_shrimp.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The stuffing is taken from whole fresh shrimp, and the glistening quality of the flour can be guessed at from the translucence of the outer skin. Has a springy, tasty chew.
crystal_shrimp.effect_desc:
Restores 18–22% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 300–470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

curry_shrimp.name: Curry Shrimp
curry_shrimp.desc: A common household dish in Sumeru. The shrimps are first boiled until chewy, then added into the curry broth. The perfect blend of savory curry and flavors from the ocean is enough to make one's stomach growl. Though it's a common household dish, almost every family seems to have made their own variations to the recipe. Perhaps one could say that for every Sumeru household, there'll be a different version of curry shrimp.
curry_shrimp.effect_desc: Restores 20–24% of Max HP and an additional 900-1,500 HP to the selected character.

der_weisheit_letzter_schluss_life.name: Der Weisheit Letzter Schluss (Life)
der_weisheit_letzter_schluss_life.desc: Mona's specialty. A great work from a great astrologer. Its greatest aspect lies with its cost-effectiveness in filling one's stomach.
der_weisheit_letzter_schluss_life.effect_desc: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 16% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

dinner_of_judgment.name: Dinner of Judgment
dinner_of_judgment.desc: Rosaria's specialty. The seemingly dark thorns make it hard to know how to begin tucking in. After some effort, you manage to clear the ornamentation away... and to your surprise, the first taste of the tender chicken unveils a shockingly lovely taste. As Rosaria studies your reaction, she seems pleased.
dinner_of_judgment.effect_desc: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 1,750 HP to the selected character.

dizziness_be_gone_no_jutsu_version_20.name: Dizziness-Be-Gone no Jutsu Version 2.0
dizziness_be_gone_no_jutsu_version_20.desc: Sayu's specialty. The Onigiri has been kneaded by Sayu into a cutesy shape — but remember, it's a mujina, not a tanuki, got it? And now that you mention it, this must be how Sayu can sleep for a whole day after eating, right?
dizziness_be_gone_no_jutsu_version_20.effect_desc: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

extravagant_slumber.name: Extravagant Slumber
extravagant_slumber.desc: Layla's specialty. The scattered nuts are like stars dotted in the deep and quiet night sky. After just one bite, your body and mind after a day's work suddenly felt relaxed and peaceful. When you told Layla about that feeling, she showed a mixed expression of joy and regret — "Th—That's great! Ah, if only it could work for me too."
extravagant_slumber.effect_desc: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

fish_flavored_toast.name: Fish-Flavored Toast
fish_flavored_toast.desc: Klee's specialty. By way of apology for wantonly using her bombs to scare away the fish, Jean instructed Klee to make this toast for the fishermen. It's filling and tasty. Klee will never starve again, even after a whole day of blast fishing.
fish_flavored_toast.effect_desc: Increases all party members' DEF by 151 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

fish_with_cream_sauce.name: Fish With Cream Sauce
fish_with_cream_sauce.desc: A fish served in sauce. Fresh fish filets were dried before pan-fried until crispy, then drizzled with a creamy white dressing and sprinkled with fresh mint. A unique dish that can be made through the simplest methods.
fish_with_cream_sauce.effect_desc:
Restores 18–22% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 300–470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

fishermans_toast.name: Fisherman’s Toast
fishermans_toast.desc: Onion-covered toast. A favorite amongst fishermen, they will stuff a bag with it and sit by the river all day.
fishermans_toast.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' DEF by 88–126 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

flaming_red_bolognese.name: Flaming Red Bolognese
flaming_red_bolognese.desc: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.
flaming_red_bolognese.effect_desc:
Restores 18–22% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 300–470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

forest_watchers_choice.name: Forest Watcher's Choice
forest_watchers_choice.desc: Tighnari's specialty. The Forest Watcher personally picked out these edible mushrooms — not only the common ones but also a few mysterious-looking shrooms that you have never seen before. No condiments were added, for the limelight should go to the ingredients' unmarred freshness. It must have taken him quite some time to prepare this delicious dish.
forest_watchers_choice.effect_desc: Increases all party members' DEF by 151 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

fried_radish_balls.name: Fried Radish Balls
fried_radish_balls.desc: Fried Radish Balls. Fragrant and crispy. Make sure to eat them while they're hot! Said to be a recipe from Liyue.
fried_radish_balls.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 66–95 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

fukuuchi_udon.name: Fukuuchi Udon
fukuuchi_udon.desc: Yae Miko's specialty. The Fried Tofu in here is specially made by the solemn Lady Kitsune. It is said that if you eat it all at one go with sincerity in your heart, you will have the protection of the Great Kitsune — misfortune shall flee and fortune abound!
fukuuchi_udon.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

ghostly_march.name: Ghostly March
ghostly_march.desc: Hu Tao's specialty. The round-faced ghouls seem quite cute, squeezed into a pile as they are. But if you were to fall to temptation and try but one of them, you may yet come to regret it for a long while... After all, this plate is full of top-quality, taste-bud-blasting— Actually, what on earth is this stuff, anyway?
ghostly_march.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

goulash.name: Goulash
goulash.desc: Hot stew made from Chilled Meat and vegetables chopped into small pieces. Slow-boiled tomatoes give this dish a rich and thick texture. Filling one's stomach with this comforting mixture has a warming effect.
goulash.effect_desc:
Decreases the rate of Sheer Cold accumulation for all party members for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

grilled_unagi_fillet.name: Grilled Unagi Fillet
grilled_unagi_fillet.desc: A grilled dish. The sliced unagi has been steamed first to remove the excess fat before being grilled and sauced. There is no consensus in Inazuma as to where the name "unagi" came from, but everyone at least agrees that it will take a whole lifetime to master its making.
grilled_unagi_fillet.effect_desc: Restores 20–24% of Max HP and an additional 900-1,500 HP to the selected character.

jewelry_soup.name: Jewelry Soup
jewelry_soup.desc: A simple vegetable soup. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.
jewelry_soup.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' DEF by 88–126 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

jueyun_chili_chicken.name: Jueyun Chili Chicken
jueyun_chili_chicken.desc: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The way the dish has been prepared captures the succulence of the chicken perfectly. Beneath the glowing gold skin, the meat has a mildly hot flavor.
jueyun_chili_chicken.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6–12% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

katsu_sandwich.name: Katsu Sandwich
katsu_sandwich.desc: A nutritionally-balanced meal. The two bread slices clip a thick-cut katsu slab between them. The fragrant, slightly sweet-and-sour sauce is the key to preventing this meal from being too rich. A brilliant mix of outlander style and local flavor!
katsu_sandwich.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 66–95 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

lighter_than_air_pancake.name: Lighter-Than-Air Pancake
lighter_than_air_pancake.desc: Noelle's specialty. These thick pastries are the special afternoon snacks of the Knights of Favonius. They give people the sense that they have fallen upon a layer of fluffy clouds, and seeing Noelle's smile makes the feeling all the sweeter!
lighter_than_air_pancake.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

lotus_seed_and_bird_egg_soup.name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
lotus_seed_and_bird_egg_soup.desc: A steamed egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.
lotus_seed_and_bird_egg_soup.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

masala_cheese_balls.name: Masala Cheese Balls
masala_cheese_balls.desc: An Aranara-style dish that Paimon has drained her brain juice dry to improve. It is, in fact, a rather traditional recipe in Sumeru. The freshly cooked cheese balls give off a titillating aroma, for a special technique has been used to mix the spices into the dough. A small bite and you will see hot cheese oozing out immediately. Served with potatoes that were simmered until tender. This creamy combination will keep you full for a long time.
masala_cheese_balls.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6–12% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

matsutake_meat_rolls.name: Matsutake Meat Rolls
matsutake_meat_rolls.desc: A pan-fried meat dish. Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.
matsutake_meat_rolls.effect_desc: Restores 20–24% of Max HP and an additional 900-1,500 HP to the selected character.

mint_salad.name: Mint Salad
mint_salad.desc: A fragrant salad dish. Finely chopped Jueyun Chilis blended with a sauce and mixed with Mint leaves. It looks like nothing special, but it has surprisingly potent powers of refreshment and reinvigoration. It is also the perfect palate-cleanser after a greasy, indulgent meal.
mint_salad.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 66–95 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

mixed_yakisoba.name: Mixed Yakisoba
mixed_yakisoba.desc: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. One merely needs to stir-fry the noodles and side dishes evenly before serving, making this an easy-to-make and filling dish. It is no wonder, then, that this dish is so sought after among Inazumans.
mixed_yakisoba.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 250–550 HP.

mushroom_hodgepodge.name: Mushroom Hodgepodge
mushroom_hodgepodge.desc: An Aranara-style dish that Paimon has drained her brain juice dry to improve. But in fact, it only requires a few common mushrooms from Sumeru, along with some extra seasonings. Paimon selected three types of mushrooms, and they were prepared and then cooked in a simple way, but the texture and flavor aren't bad at all.
mushroom_hodgepodge.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' DEF by 88–126 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

my_way.name: "My Way"
my_way.desc: Yanfei's specialty is Crab Roe Tofu done to an incredible degree of regularity. Its dimensions and flavor are all faithfully rendered according to the "Crab Roe Tofu Laws" in the recipe, with not a single letter omitted.
my_way.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

mysterious_bolognese.name: Mysterious Bolognese
mysterious_bolognese.desc: Lisa's specialty. With an inexplicable aura, this bolognese is so exotic that you can never have enough. Did she actually enchant it with some kind of magic?
mysterious_bolognese.effect_desc: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

noodles_with_mountain_delicacies.name: Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
noodles_with_mountain_delicacies.desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.

northern_smoked_chicken.name: Northern Smoked Chicken
northern_smoked_chicken.desc: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A staple for Northerners, often made for honored guests.

onigiri.name: Onigiri
onigiri.desc: A portable dish made with rice. It is simple to make and remains delicious at room temperatures, which has made it very popular with civilians and soldiers alike.
onigiri.effect_desc:
Restores 18–22% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 300–470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

panipuri.name: Panipuri
panipuri.desc: An appetizer served with a green dipping sauce. The crispy balls are first deep-fried, then stuffed with a delicious filling through a hole on the top. The bite-sized snack is a common street food in Sumeru.
panipuri.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 250–550 HP.

radish_and_fish_stew.name: Radish and Fish Stew
radish_and_fish_stew.desc: A meat and vegetable dish. The de-skinned radishes have gone into the pot first to cook before large hunks of fish and seasonings are added in. The whole combination is then stewed on a low flame. The large servings of food — best served with rice — give everyone present a feeling of satisfaction.
radish_and_fish_stew.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6–12% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

rockin_riffin_chicken.name: Rockin' Riffin' Chicken!
rockin_riffin_chicken.desc: Xinyan's specialty. Its demonic appearance hides an absolutely demonic spiciness. Eat it, tear up, eat some more, and don't stop till you drop! Surely only a demon could have invented such a dish!
rockin_riffin_chicken.effect_desc: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 16% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

rose_custard.name: Rose Custard
rose_custard.desc: A dessert made from fermented milk. When mixed together, the dense curd, fragrant petals, and crisp nuts together create a mellow and sweet taste. As that fragrant milky concoction slips down your throat, it is almost as if you can smell the floral scent from a long time ago.
rose_custard.effect_desc: Restores 18–22% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 300–470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

samosa.name: Samosa
samosa.desc: A deep-fried snack. Each golden, crispy pocket is stuffed full with a soft, glutinous filling. You can't help but wolf one down immediately, and then reach out for a second one, taking your time to savor it... Piece by piece, you become lost in the dish's enticing aroma, and before you know it, you are only left with an empty plate.
samosa.effect_desc: Restores 20%-24% of Max HP to the selected character and an additional 900-1,500 HP.

sangayaki.name: Sangayaki
sangayaki.desc: A simple, humble fisherman's side dish. Freshly caught fish is de-skinned and sliced, minced together with Snapdragon, mixed with miso and salt to form a batter, and then finally grilled. The lovely scent enters your nose long before the food enters your mouth. Three servings later, and you're still raring to go for more.
sangayaki.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

satisfying_salad.name: Satisfying Salad
satisfying_salad.desc: A vegetable salad. Not just steamed potatoes and fresh vegetables, but also a hard-boiled egg to top it off. Satisfying to both the eyes and stomach.
satisfying_salad.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6–12% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

selva_salad.name: Selva Salad
selva_salad.desc: An Aranara-style salad that Paimon drained her brain juice dry to improve. It is, in fact, a rather traditional recipe in Sumeru. Fresh and crispy Zaytun Peach slices are mixed with gently-squeezed Sumeru Roses, which adds a touch of distinctive flavor. Mint is used instead of sugar to avoid getting a sickening sweetness. A refreshing dish that pleases both the eyes and the nose.
selva_salad.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

shawarma_wrap.name: Shawarma Wrap
shawarma_wrap.desc: A wrap filled with roasted meat. Meat shaved off a vertical skewer is wrapped in a flatbread together with vegetables and sauces. Plate it up, and a simple yet delicious Sumeru street food is ready.
shawarma_wrap.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 66–95 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

spicy_stew.name: Spicy Stew
spicy_stew.desc: Barbara's specialty. Carrots cut into cute little stars make this dish... Wait, AHH, where did this spiciness come from!?
spicy_stew.effect_desc: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

stir_fried_fish_noodles.name: Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
stir_fried_fish_noodles.desc: A main dish with an intense flavor. Created by stir-frying rice noodles, par-cooked fish, and various side dishes in a wok on high flame. The noodles, having absorbed the flavors of the various ingredients, are springy and smooth to the taste, making this dish a big hit with diners.
stir_fried_fish_noodles.effect_desc:
Restores 18–22% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 300–470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

stone_harbor_delicacies.name: Stone Harbor Delicacies
stone_harbor_delicacies.desc: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.
stone_harbor_delicacies.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6–12% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

sweet_dream.name: "Sweet Dream"
sweet_dream.desc: Xiao's specialty. His dream is very simple, and it is merely a lovely dream.
sweet_dream.effect_desc: Increases all party members' ATK by 114 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

sweet_madame.name: Sweet Madame
sweet_madame.desc: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to complement the tender fowl meat.
sweet_madame.effect_desc: Restores 20–24% of Max HP and an additional 900-1,500 HP to the selected character.

tea_break_pancake.name: Tea Break Pancake
tea_break_pancake.desc: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.
tea_break_pancake.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 250–550 HP.

the_only_truth.name: The Only Truth
the_only_truth.desc: Shikanoin Heizou's specialty. On the tender, moist scrambled eggs lies a juicy katsu fried to golden perfection, its aroma most enticing indeed... Having been tempted to gobble the dish down, you are somehow seized by the urge to let out all that is hidden in your heart — this is not some sort of secret weapon of Heizou... is it?
the_only_truth.effect_desc: Increases all party members' ATK by 114 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

tuna_sushi.name: Tuna Sushi
tuna_sushi.desc: A traditional dish made with one's bare hands. The soft and lightly-vinegared rice is matched with the fresh fish. Locals consider this a slightly luxurious treat.
tuna_sushi.effect_desc: Restores 20–24% of Max HP and an additional 900-1,500 HP to the selected character.

udon_noodles.name: Udon Noodles
udon_noodles.desc: Highly springy noodles. After several rounds of rising and pulling, the result is silky smooth yet springy noodles. Unlike ramen, which prizes dense flavors, udon noodles use light flavors to heal the Inazuman soul.
udon_noodles.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 250–550 HP.

utmost_care.name: Utmost Care
utmost_care.desc: Candace's specialty. The aroma of this dish hits your nose long before it can be plated up. It would seem that Candace's adept guardianship also extends to sustaining appetites... But, uh, this really is an extraordinary amount of Aaru Mixed Rice. How are you supposed to deal with this mountain of "overflowing consideration"?

vegetarian_abalone.name: Vegetarian Abalone
vegetarian_abalone.desc: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The matsutake has been sliced thin and fried till golden before pouring the sauce. The matsutake meat is sumptuous and has flavor to match that of fresh abalone — almost enough to make you think it was the real thing.
vegetarian_abalone.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 250–550 HP.

wakatakeni.name: Wakatakeni
wakatakeni.desc: A light-colored vegetarian dish. Broth is first poured into the pot before the bamboo shoots, and then the seaweed, are added in. The result is an elegant product with a light mouthfeel that agrees well with all palates. Suitable as a pre-meal appetizer or as a side to a main dish.
wakatakeni.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' DEF by 88–126 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

way_of_the_strong.name: Way of the Strong
way_of_the_strong.desc: Arataki Itto's specialty. He insists that this is a "heretofore unmatched dish" hand-made by "Arataki 'Number One Gourmet' Itto." Whether standing, sitting, or lying down, this'll fill your tummy in one shot and send you well on your way to becoming the second-mightiest being in the world. What a swell guy.
way_of_the_strong.effect_desc: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

a_buoyant_breeze.name: A Buoyant Breeze
a_buoyant_breeze.desc: Venti's specialty. Other than the Cecilia flowers used for decoration, the ingredients are no different from normal. But if you taste it carefully, you can taste the flavor of "a wind that brings hope and tiny twists of fate." Perhaps... this is exactly what he wants.
a_buoyant_breeze.effect_desc: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1800s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

a_prize_catch.name: A Prize Catch
a_prize_catch.desc: Tartaglia's specialty. It looks like a trapped beast floundering in an ocean of blood, its death throes an inaudible scream... But Tartaglia smiles and explains that this is something he fished out of the sea, with some products from his homeland on the side.
a_prize_catch.effect_desc: Increases all party members' DEF by 282 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

adventurers_breakfast_sandwich.name: Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
adventurers_breakfast_sandwich.desc: A nutritious egg dish. Luxurious mayonnaise sits atop a lining of ham and poached egg toast. The smooth mouthfeel fills you with energy for the long road ahead, and is one of the Adventurers' Guild's top-rated breakfasts.
adventurers_breakfast_sandwich.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 160–228 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

baklava.name: Baklava
baklava.desc: A traditional Sumeru dessert. This puff pastry contains chopped nuts and has been baked after having butter drizzled atop it — and not forgetting some syrup once it comes out of the oven. Some researchers will specially order this veritable "fortress of sweetness" to replenish their energies before an exam. This is also why this dish has great pride of place as the Akademiya's favorite dessert.
baklava.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10–20% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

bamboo_shoot_soup.name: Bamboo Shoot Soup
bamboo_shoot_soup.desc: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The meat and ham have been diced into small pieces, and the soup has been kept on low heat till it turned milky white. The process has brought out the distinct flavors of both kinds of meat, making for an especially tasty soup.
bamboo_shoot_soup.effect_desc:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

barbatos_ratatouille.name: Barbatos Ratatouille
barbatos_ratatouille.desc: A simple chowder with a long history. The ingredients are similarly traditional and simple. No matter where you are, a piping-hot chowder of this sort can always give you a sense of real and unsurpassed satisfaction.
barbatos_ratatouille.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by gliding and sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

black_back_perch_stew.name: Black-Back Perch Stew
black_back_perch_stew.desc: A poached fish dish. The fresh and tasty fish fillets are tender and juicy. The secret to this recipe is adding powdered Violetgrass into the heated oil to give the dish that aromatic scent. It's spicy, but not too spicy.
black_back_perch_stew.effect_desc:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

braised_meat.name: Braised Meat
braised_meat.desc: A stewed dish. The meat slices were fried first, followed by the vegetable accouterments, after which they were mixed together. The soup was then added and simmered until it thickened. After this patient, slow cooking process, the meat has become soft and tender, bringing those who eat it a down-to-earth satisfaction.
braised_meat.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20–40% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

butter_chicken.name: Butter Chicken
butter_chicken.desc: A flavorful dish. Spice and chopped tomatoes were mixed with warm butter, and then cooked into a creamy sauce. Into it went marinated and pan-fried chicken pieces. People from Sumeru prefer eating the dish with rice or flatbread, which allows them to savor the dish's enticing flavor better.
butter_chicken.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 160–228 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

calla_lily_seafood_soup.name: Calla Lily Seafood Soup
calla_lily_seafood_soup.desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The delicacy of crab and mint make for a clear soup, and the calla lily brings it a refreshing taste.
calla_lily_seafood_soup.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' DEF by 165–235 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

candied_ajilenakh_nut.name: Candied Ajilenakh Nut
candied_ajilenakh_nut.desc: A rich dessert. First, the syrup is boiled till clear, then mixed with fillings and sesame paste from Sumeru. Then at last, the evenly-mixed syrup is poured into a mold and allowed to solidify into this crunchy form. It is said that the cold lands of Snezhnaya are a host to a similar dish, with a slightly different flavor profile. Of course, both sides naturally believe theirs to be the greatest in all Teyvat.
candied_ajilenakh_nut.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' DEF by 165–235 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

charcoal_baked_ajilenakh_cake.name: Charcoal-Baked Ajilenakh Cake
charcoal_baked_ajilenakh_cake.desc: A dark-colored pastry. The pastry is fine, almost lustrous, and the fragrance of the Ajilenakh Nuts is both vivid and full of warmth. The cake is fluffy and delicate as it enters your mouth, exorcising exhaustion and muzzling misery. Ah, just as a book may not be judged by its cover, so too should a cake not be convicted by its crust.
charcoal_baked_ajilenakh_cake.effect_desc: Revives the selected character. Restores 900–1,500 HP.

cold_cut_platter.name: Cold Cut Platter
cold_cut_platter.desc: A plate of cold cut meat. An equal balance of bacon, ham and sausage keeps everyone happy.
cold_cut_platter.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20–40% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

come_and_get_it.name: Come and Get It
come_and_get_it.desc: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. There is no great refinement in the making of this food, and it appears in Liyue often during festival season. Whenever this dish is served up, the person at the head of the table will invite everyone to dig in, saying "Come on, eat, eat," hence the name.
come_and_get_it.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10–20% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

crab_ham_veggie_bake.name: Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
crab_ham_veggie_bake.desc: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!
crab_ham_veggie_bake.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 900–1,500 HP.

crispy_potato_shrimp_platter.name: Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
crispy_potato_shrimp_platter.desc: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. A spread made from potatoes and berries is placed onto crispy potato slices, and a whole shrimp is then added on top. The fragrant and full-bodied flavors serve to whet the appetite, while the addition of Mint adds a whole other dimension to the mix.
crispy_potato_shrimp_platter.effect_desc:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

cured_pork_dry_hotpot.name: Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
cured_pork_dry_hotpot.desc: A dish fried over a great flame. Matsutake and Ham have been sliced up, stir-fried, and garnished with some spicy condiments. The flavor of the Ham is a match for the Matsutake's crispness, and the combination grows ever lovelier and more addictive as you chew. The heat-conducting wok also serves to keep it piping hot for long periods.
cured_pork_dry_hotpot.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10–20% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

dew_dipped_shrimp.name: Dew-Dipped Shrimp
dew_dipped_shrimp.desc: Yelan's specialty. Amongst the ingredients here is the new tea, Dipped Dew, delivered from Qiaoying Village right to the Teahouse, which was then quickly fried together with freshly-caught river shrimp. The look is sightly, the scent of distant tea, and the taste both tender and springy... Wait a moment. Why's she coming over with that plate of chilli?
dew_dipped_shrimp.effect_desc: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

die_heilige_sinfonie.name: Die Heilige Sinfonie
die_heilige_sinfonie.desc: Fischl's specialty. The exquisite presentation doth seem to communicate some incomprehensible enigma. When partaking, if one were to gaze upon Fischl, one might see her expectant gaze peek through the gaps of her fingers, which she is using to cover half her face... Is this also part of the mystery?
die_heilige_sinfonie.effect_desc: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 55% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

dragon_beard_noodles.name: Dragon Beard Noodles
dragon_beard_noodles.desc: Noodles that are as slender as the hairs on a dragon's beard. The green onion is fried in a wok before the soup and condiments are added. Last in are the noodles, after which the lot is ladled out and plated up. The noodles must be skillfully hand-pulled multiple times before they become extremely thin — a technique that makes this dish the most challenging noodle recipe in Liyue.
dragon_beard_noodles.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 160–228 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

duel_soul.name: Duel Soul
duel_soul.desc: Cyno's specialty. The golden grains of rice have been piled up like a most remarkable hill. As you scoop out a chunk and place the fragrant meat into your mouth, an impulse you cannot name rises within your chest — a desire to whip out your Genius Invokation deck and duel!
duel_soul.effect_desc: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

five_pickled_treasures.name: Five Pickled Treasures
five_pickled_treasures.desc: Pickled vegetables. A round of fermentation makes food richer and also allows it to keep for longer. There were originally only four "treasures," but for auspiciousness' sake, the four vegetables were mixed and plated up with one additional "treasure" added in, hence the name "Five Pickled Treasures."

fragrant_mashed_potatoes.name: Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
fragrant_mashed_potatoes.desc: Seasoned mashed potatoes. The potatoes were thoroughly mashed before a sauce was drizzled over them. The mouthfeel is soft and smooth and it has a rich, multi-layered flavor profile. A satisfying choice for a hungry stomach, whether as a side or as a main dish.
fragrant_mashed_potatoes.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 160–228 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

fruits_of_the_festival.name: Fruits of the Festival
fruits_of_the_festival.desc: A brightly colored non-alcoholic beverage. Freshly squeezed Sunsettia and Wolfhook juices have been poured into a cup in a specific order. The cool and refreshing flavor and vibrant color remind people of the beautiful holiday times. Do not mess the order up if you want to get the gradient effect right!
fruits_of_the_festival.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 15–20% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

fullmoon_egg.name: Fullmoon Egg
fullmoon_egg.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The egg has been beaten into the flour to form a dough and the shrimp and fish have been diced, minced, and packaged into the shape of a teacup, before being garnished with whole shrimp and steamed in a pot. The resulting design is like that of clouds embracing the moon, hence the name Fullmoon Egg.
fullmoon_egg.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 900–1,500 HP.

golden_chicken_burger.name: Golden Chicken Burger
golden_chicken_burger.desc: A hamburger in which the fowl meat is the main star. The fluffy bread sandwiches slices of fresh vegetables and a flavorful, crispy fowl fillet. No utensils required here: Just grab it in your hands and bite down on that bundle of rich, satisfying succulence with a hearty "ker-runch!"
golden_chicken_burger.effect_desc: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.

golden_shrimp_balls.name: Golden Shrimp Balls
golden_shrimp_balls.desc: A deep-fried shrimp dish. The aroma assaults your senses, while the crispy potatoes bring out the light sweetness of the shrimp meat. This, in tandem with its cute, small shape, makes it very enticing indeed.
golden_shrimp_balls.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 900–1,500 HP.

halvamazd.name: Halvamazd
halvamazd.desc: Nahida's specialty. It is said that "mazd" means "wisdom" in Sumeru, and such delicate "wisdom" is simply irresistible. There is a gentle smile in Nahida's eyes: "The sea anemone has helped the little fish and witnessed its growth, so it's only natural for the little fish to give something back."
halvamazd.effect_desc: Increases all party members' DEF by 282 for 300s.

heartstring_noodles.name: Heartstring Noodles
heartstring_noodles.desc: Shenhe's specialty. Perhaps this comes from her desire to recreate a flavor that lives only in her memories, but Shenhe has poured much time and effort into both making and plating this dish. The smooth noodles and delectable soup make a great impression indeed, but the most indelible aspects are the dedication and heart put into this dish...
heartstring_noodles.effect_desc: Increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s. In Co-op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

ideal_circumstance.name: Ideal Circumstance
ideal_circumstance.desc: Alhaitham's specialty. A dish created through the fusion of vegetables and meat prepared in a patterned frying pan. Improvements were made to the recipe, making it taste quite different from the original dish. The words on the food mean "contemplation." In the words of the creator: "Ideally, everyone should be capable of contemplation, but practically, it doesn't seem very possible."
ideal_circumstance.effect_desc: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

imported_poultry.name: Imported Poultry
imported_poultry.desc: A meat dish drizzled with sauce. The fowl is marinated before being covered in batter and fried, and a thick sauce is drizzled over it as a finishing touch. The accompanying vegetables are local produce, but the marinating methods and sauce are all imported, hence the name "imported poultry."
imported_poultry.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10–20% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

invigorating_kitty_meal.name: Invigorating Kitty Meal
invigorating_kitty_meal.desc: This main dish looks rather cute. With Kiminami Anna's help, this dish was made with the tastes of provisional head priestess Neko in mind. Although it does not quite match the flavor that Hibiki used to produce, Lady Neko seems rather pleased with your work nonetheless. Due to the lack of spices, humans might find this dish a tad on the plain side.
invigorating_kitty_meal.effect_desc:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

invigorating_pizza.name: Invigorating Pizza
invigorating_pizza.desc: Jean's specialty. This pizza almost seems more art than food. Just one slice is enough to have you raring to go. Is this what keeps Jean working so hard?
invigorating_pizza.effect_desc: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

jueyun_guoba.name: Jueyun Guoba
jueyun_guoba.desc: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Stir-fried ham and Jueyun Chili sprinkled on a crispy crust made from Rice and Horsetail create a refined, meaty snack that transforms humble Rice into a hot delicacy.
jueyun_guoba.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20–40% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

konda_cuisine.name: Konda Cuisine
konda_cuisine.desc: Slowly stewed local cuisine. Everyone in Konda Village knows how to make this dish. It originally had no name but would spread throughout Inazuma on account of its nutritious deliciousness. This eventually caused those from outside the village to give it its name — "Konda Cuisine."
konda_cuisine.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 900–1,500 HP.

lotus_flower_crisp.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
lotus_flower_crisp.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Sweet stuffed lotus wrapped in a crispy, deep-fried crust. Its layers of flower petals unravel perfectly in the palm of your hand.
lotus_flower_crisp.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' DEF by 165–235 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

milky_mushroom_crisp_tower.name: Milky Mushroom Crisp Tower
milky_mushroom_crisp_tower.desc: A crunchy delicacy. The faint creamy notes melt on your tongue as you munch on the succulent mushrooms and crispy bread. This unmatched sense of satisfaction somehow leaves you insatiable — you do not even hesitate to lick the bread crumbs off your fingertips.
milky_mushroom_crisp_tower.effect_desc: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.

minty_meat_rolls.name: Minty Meat Rolls
minty_meat_rolls.desc: A sour-and-spicy dish. The marinated meat has been thinly sliced and rolled into the mint leaves, before being brushed with a sauce blend containing Jueyun Chilis. The unique mint flavor adds the finishing touch to this dish, turning it into an excellent addition to any cold platter.
minty_meat_rolls.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by gliding and sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

mondstadt_hash_brown.name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
mondstadt_hash_brown.desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.
mondstadt_hash_brown.effect_desc: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.

more_and_more.name: More-and-More
more_and_more.desc: A snack grilled on an iron plate. Water is added to flour and stirred into a slurry, vegetables and meat are added, and the mix is grilled well on an iron plate before taking on a splash of sauce and a sprinkle of dried bonito flakes. This tastes delicious no matter how many ingredients one adds, and indeed it makes people feel like "the more ingredients, the merrier," hence the dish's name.
more_and_more.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20–40% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

mushroom_pizza.name: Mushroom Pizza
mushroom_pizza.desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm, the cheese becomes stretchy and gooey, making it extremely satisfying to eat.
mushroom_pizza.effect_desc:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

no_tomorrow.name: No Tomorrow
no_tomorrow.desc: Qiqi's specialty. The neat rows of ingredients seem at once exotic and delicious, and Baizhu says that Qiqi has spent a long time creating this dish. Still, once one considers that Qiqi has no sense of taste, just putting chopsticks to the food is going to take some courage.
no_tomorrow.effect_desc: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s)

northern_apple_stew.name: Northern Apple Stew
northern_apple_stew.desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat goes down smooth, its flavor dense, and when cut open, the meat juice that flows out bears traces of apple flavoring. An eye-popping, refreshing dish indeed.
northern_apple_stew.effect_desc: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.

nutritious_meal_v593.name: Nutritious Meal (V.593)
nutritious_meal_v593.desc: Sucrose's specialty. It looks like some strange alchemical product at first, but Sucrose insists that it is a healthy and nutritious meal, the result of many experiments and painstaking improvements. Its healthy green color comes from a mix of cream and natural vegetable juices... Wait, vegetable juices?
nutritious_meal_v593.effect_desc: Revives the selected character and restores 20% of Max HP, then restores an additional 1500 HP.

omelette_rice.name: Omelette Rice
omelette_rice.desc: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. The evenly beaten egg fluids are fried into half-doneness before being poured out on top of the rice, and tomato ketchup is drizzled over top afterward once it is ready to plate up. They say that this dish was derived from another region, though this version involves a more complicated cooking method.
omelette_rice.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by climbing and sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

omurice_waltz.name: Omurice Waltz
omurice_waltz.desc: Kuki Shinobu's specialty. The soft egg skin almost seems to dance upon a stage made from sauce, with fluffy rice wrapped under its swaying skirt. This would even be a match for the work of Uyuu Restaurant's head chef. Truly, Shinobu's chef license was not earned in vain.
omurice_waltz.effect_desc: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

once_upon_a_time_in_mondstadt.name: "Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt"
once_upon_a_time_in_mondstadt.desc: Diluc's specialty. Feast your eyes and then your stomach upon this delicacy as the soft ribs melt in your mouth. Who knew Diluc was able to cook this well?
once_upon_a_time_in_mondstadt.effect_desc: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s)

oncidium_tofu.name: Oncidium Tofu
oncidium_tofu.desc: A dish that is a test of one's knifework. All the ingredients were sliced into ribbons in a single go, and after being washed, they were placed into the broth and cooked till they floated. The resulting flavor is light and fresh, and would not be out of place as a chef's recommendation in a Liyue restaurant.

padisarah_pudding.name: Padisarah Pudding
padisarah_pudding.desc: A popular dessert in Sumeru. Juices are squeezed from the petals of Padisarahs and Sumeru Roses before being mixed with milk, gelatin, sugar, and other ingredients, and then left to solidify. Cute appearance and sweet flavor make it a common sight at celebratory events in Sumeru.
padisarah_pudding.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by climbing and sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

pile_em_up.name: "Pile 'Em Up"
pile_em_up.desc: A rich, meaty dish. Originally a Mondstadt dish made of steaks, potatoes and cheese, it has since become synonymous with Ludi Harpastum.
pile_em_up.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10–20% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

pita_pocket.name: Pita Pocket
pita_pocket.desc: A bread with varied fillings. The flat dough has risen in the oven, reminding you of a lovely Pufferfish. The bread is usually cut in the middle into two separate "pockets," hence the name, "Pita Pocket." It is said that people of Sumeru used to dip the bread in sauce. But nowadays, people usually stuff the "pockets" with different fillings and then take big mouthfuls.
pita_pocket.effect_desc: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.

potato_boat.name: Potato Boat
potato_boat.desc: A baked appetizer. The potato was washed clean and then baked together with cheese and Rukkhashava Mushrooms. The dish guarantees an unmatched experience when eaten hot. This explains its popularity on the streets of Sumeru. Still, be careful not to burn your tongue.
potato_boat.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 900–1,500 HP.

prosperous_peace.name: Prosperous Peace
prosperous_peace.desc: Ganyu's specialty. The image of a resting qilin is by itself enough to calm a person down. Ganyu has put her well-wishes for all that is lovely in this world into this dish — and she's saved some of her favorite Qingxin Flowers just for you, too.
prosperous_peace.effect_desc: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

puppy_paw_hash_brown.name: Puppy-Paw Hash Brown
puppy_paw_hash_brown.desc: Razor's specialty. Carefully shaped to resemble a wolf's paw. You can really feel the effort he has put into trying human cooking.
puppy_paw_hash_brown.effect_desc: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

qingce_household_dish.name: Qingce Household Dish
qingce_household_dish.desc: Yaoyao's specialty. It looks rather mundane as it is not displayed with the same luxurious aesthetic as dishes prepared by a fancy restaurant. However, as soon as you take a bite, the flavor immediately offers you a fragrant and intimate experience, certain to leave an ever-lasting impression. After a single taste, what's on your tongue will be on your heart for good. As for the reason, maybe the secret ingredient to this recipe is simply "caring."
qingce_household_dish.effect_desc: Increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

qingce_stir_fry.name: Qingce Stir Fry
qingce_stir_fry.desc: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.
qingce_stir_fry.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 160–228 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

quiet_elegance.name: Quiet Elegance
quiet_elegance.desc: Kamisato Ayato's specialty. The arrangement is exquisite and elegant, much like the manner in which Ayato handles all his affairs. Any more, and it would have been excessive. Any less, and it would have proved a sight squandered. As you sample the dish, you find that its flavor is identical to that of Uyuu Restaurant's — amazing. But as you reach your chopsticks for that crystalline camellia, Ayato stops you... "That was something I made during sword practice. It's just a decoration."
quiet_elegance.effect_desc: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

rainbow_aster.name: Rainbow Aster
rainbow_aster.desc: A unique drink. Having featured in the famous light novel "Pretty Please, Kitsune Guuji?", it has since been brought to life by Sailing Breeze in collaboration with Yae Publishing House, along with its fascinating flavor. As this version does not contain any bean products, it is slightly different from the special limited edition that was available during the Irodori Festival, but this also means that there's no risk of triggering any bean allergies.
rainbow_aster.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by gliding and sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

rice_cake_soup.name: Rice Cake Soup
rice_cake_soup.desc: Commonly-seen city cuisine. The ingredients have gorged themselves on the soup, making them most enticing indeed. They say that in the first, this dish only had a scant few ingredients, but more were added as time passed, resulting in its present form.
rice_cake_soup.effect_desc:
