Increases all party members' DEF by 165–235 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

rice_pudding.name: Rice Pudding
rice_pudding.desc: A dessert made from rice. After cooking the rice beforehand, it is placed into a pot together with the other ingredients, stirred evenly, and steamed. The mouthfeel is fragrant and soft, a perfect denouement to any meal.

sabz_meat_stew.name: Sabz Meat Stew
sabz_meat_stew.desc: A meat stew with a unique taste. The fragrant ingredients complement each other perfectly. Large pieces of fresh meat are stewed until tender and coated in dark green, as if inviting all who taste it for a leisurely stroll in the forest.
sabz_meat_stew.effect_desc: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.

sakura_mochi.name: Sakura Mochi
sakura_mochi.desc: A delicate and elegant snack. The dark green leaf adds complexity to the overall warm color palette. Just looking at it gives you a sense of its quiet beauty. 'Tis a shame that its lovely flavor is like a blooming flower in its transience — yet do not let that dissuade you from taking a bite.
sakura_mochi.effect_desc:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 900–1,500 HP.

sakura_shrimp_crackers.name: Sakura Shrimp Crackers
sakura_shrimp_crackers.desc: Crispy, crunchy crackers. Potatoes are ground into flour and added to Shrimp and Sakura Blooms before being baked in an oven. It possesses a lovely flavor profile for a snack and is beloved by people of all ages, traits that have made it a popular choice of gift.
sakura_shrimp_crackers.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Max HP by 20–25% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

sakura_tempura.name: Sakura Tempura
sakura_tempura.desc: A dish deep-fried in oil. Incorporate the marinated sakura blossom petals into the batter before giving the fresh shrimp and vegetables an even coating, frying, and then draining the oil. This all sounds simple enough, but good tempura making is not something achieved in a mere day.
sakura_tempura.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20–30% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

sauteed_matsutake.name: Sautéed Matsutake
sauteed_matsutake.desc: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. Cooked in butter, it's crisp outside yet tender inside. Eat it before someone steals it from you.
sauteed_matsutake.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 160–228 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

scented_meat_balls.name: Scented Meat Balls
scented_meat_balls.desc: A dish with ground meat as its base. The crunchy and chewy coating wraps around the savory filling, giving it a layered texture that's easily a cut above regular meatballs. Try eating one, and its irresistible aroma will leave you brimming with satisfaction.
scented_meat_balls.effect_desc: Has a chance to restore 24%-40% of Max HP to the selected character and an additional 450-2,350 HP.

shimi_chazuke.name: Shimi Chazuke
shimi_chazuke.desc: The Wanderer's specialty. The mildly bitter fragrance of tea and the refreshingly sweet aroma of rice are perfectly blended together, leaving you to wolf it down insatiably. How did he manage to cook something so extraordinary? Ah, your expression must have betrayed this thought to him, for his face suddenly turns grim: "Have you finished yet? Stop gawking and go wash the dishes now."
shimi_chazuke.effect_desc: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

show_me_the_mora.name: Show Me the Mora
show_me_the_mora.desc: Dori's specialty. After paying a large sum of Mora, you finally got a chance to taste the dish cooked by Lord Sangemah Bay herself. Firm chicken is covered in the silky sauce with a smooth texture. With the mind-controlling charm of its great flavor, this dish is spurring an impulse in you to spend another fortune just to get another bite!
show_me_the_mora.effect_desc: Increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s. In Co-op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

slow_cooked_bamboo_shoot_soup.name: Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup
slow_cooked_bamboo_shoot_soup.desc: Zhongli's specialty. The ham is a butt end selected according to Yuehai Pavilion's gourmet standards. The fresh meat is pork belly, freshly hunted in Springvale, while the bamboo shoots are the densest you'll find in Qingce Village. It is then heated, slowly, gently, and with the utmost care and technique... Such a "particular" taste may only be shared with those who know how to appreciate it.
slow_cooked_bamboo_shoot_soup.effect_desc: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

snow_on_the_hearth.name: "Snow on the Hearth"
snow_on_the_hearth.desc: Kamisato Ayaka's specialty. This is almost like a small, lovely, and intricate artwork, with its pale red outer coat covering the feelings that the young maiden began to harbor from that moment on. If one had the honor of enjoy such a treat while having tea with a princess as graceful and noble as a white heron, one would surely yearn to have that moment stretch into eternity.
snow_on_the_hearth.effect_desc: Revives the selected character and restores 20% of Max HP, then restores an additional 1500 HP.

squirrel_fish.name: Squirrel Fish
squirrel_fish.desc: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is first completely deboned before crisscross cuts are made on the skin. The fish is then coated in flour and deep-fried to a golden-brown color, then served with ketchup drizzled on top. It is tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. The dish resembles a squirrel's tail to a certain degree, hence the name.
squirrel_fish.effect_desc: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.

sticky_honey_roast.name: Sticky Honey Roast
sticky_honey_roast.desc: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The carrots take the gamey edge off the meat, and the sauce brings it all together sweetly. The perfect warm dish for a cold winter night.
sticky_honey_roast.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by climbing and sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

stir_fried_shrimp.name: Stir-Fried Shrimp
stir_fried_shrimp.desc: A mild and luscious dish. The shrimp are quickly sautéed and the sauce thickened. This method of cooking is exceedingly simple and brings out the wonderful natural flavor of the shrimp meat, granting it a place in humble home-cooked dinners and lavish banquets alike.
stir_fried_shrimp.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20–30% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

summer_festival_fish.name: Summer Festival Fish
summer_festival_fish.desc: Yoimiya's specialty. Watching the fireworks, your hands full of the snacks Yoimiya's given you, her carefree, child-like laughter in your ear as the pyrotechnics burst overhead... Amid this unique symphony of sounds, the plump goldfish in your hand almost looks like it might start swimming at any moment...
summer_festival_fish.effect_desc: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

sunset_berry_tea.name: Sunset Berry Tea
sunset_berry_tea.desc: A fruity drink with a pleasantly sour taste. This scented tea gives off the pleasant aroma of fresh fruit. Its cold and refreshing taste is sure to dispel the stifling heat with each gulp.
sunset_berry_tea.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 160–228 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

sunshine_sprat.name: Sunshine Sprat
sunshine_sprat.desc: Gently fried fish dish. Cooked with the right heat and duration to maintain freshness for a long time. Tender and flaky, it is delicately browned thanks to the layer of aromatic butter on top, which creates a multi-layered and unique flavor.
sunshine_sprat.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20–30% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

swirling_steps.name: Swirling Steps
swirling_steps.desc: Nilou's specialty. The crystal-clear cup that reminds you of an ornate jewel case contains a soft, melt-in-your-mouth pudding. The reddish coloration, like a fleeting trance, reminds you ever so much of Nilou's radiant, dancing form. Ah, would that this dance might last forever.
swirling_steps.effect_desc: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

tahchin.name: Tahchin
tahchin.desc: A classic staple served in large quantities. Cooked rice is mixed with meat that was marinated in yogurt, then baked until its surface turns crispy. Don't forget to add a handful of Padisarah petals before serving! Both the rice and meat are enough to keep one's stomach full for a long time, making it a very popular dish at the Grand Bazaar.
tahchin.effect_desc:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

taiyaki.name: Taiyaki
taiyaki.desc: A snack shaped like a snapper. The crisp exterior wraps the sweet filling within and is very popular amongst Inazumans. It is said that in the beginning, this was just a cylindrical snack, but constant improvements wound up shaping it into the cutesy image of a fish.
taiyaki.effect_desc:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

tonkotsu_ramen.name: Tonkotsu Ramen
tonkotsu_ramen.desc: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The meat, prepared at low temperature, is laid over the noodles. Salty, fragrant, delicious soup seeps into each strand. A single bowl of these is guaranteed to restore any tired soul.
tonkotsu_ramen.effect_desc: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.

traditionally_made_charcoal_baked_ajilen.name: Traditionally-Made Charcoal-Baked Ajilenakh Cake
traditionally_made_charcoal_baked_ajilen.desc: Faruzan's specialty. The dark and sweet cake, lying as it does atop a minty-green sauce bed, almost looks like some enigmatic mechanism. Your hesitation must have somehow reached Faruzan, for she then straightened up to assertively reassure you that this was a traditional dish in Sumeru and that its flavor is guaranteed. But you can't help wondering... Is it really a 'traditional' dish that catered to the tastes of Sumeru people a hundred year ago?
traditionally_made_charcoal_baked_ajilen.effect_desc: Revives the selected character and restores 20% of Max HP, then restores an additional 1500 HP.

tri_flavored_skewer.name: Tri-Flavored Skewer
tri_flavored_skewer.desc: A pieced-together skewer. Three different cooking processes can be tasted at a go in this dish, which has made it very popular. If you are ever at a loss at to what to pair with some wine, there's no going wrong with one of these.
tri_flavored_skewer.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 160–228 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

tricolor_dango.name: Tricolor Dango
tricolor_dango.desc: A soft, glutinous snack. Glutinous rice has been ground into powder and rolled into a ball before being steamed. The Sakura Bloom and Snapdragon colors lend an extra liveliness to these dango.
tricolor_dango.effect_desc: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.

triple_layered_consomme.name: Triple-Layered Consommé
triple_layered_consomme.desc: A neatly arranged dish. The Ham, Fowl, and Bamboo Shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.
triple_layered_consomme.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20–30% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

unagi_chazuke.name: Unagi Chazuke
unagi_chazuke.desc: A light and tasty main dish. Well-boiled tea is poured over rice with unagi on top and allowed to steep quietly until the rice grains have absorbed the fragrance of the tea. When combined with the lingering sweet aftertaste of the unagi, you can eat half a bowl before Paimon can say "Whoa!"
unagi_chazuke.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 15–20% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

universal_peace.name: Universal Peace
universal_peace.desc: Colorful staple food. Maintains perfect balance between soft and fragrant rice and all kinds of carefully selected sweet ingredients. This dish is mainly known for its meaning as a symbol of prosperity and peace, and less so for its taste. However, with such noble ideals behind it, its flavor should not disappoint.
universal_peace.effect_desc: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.

victorious_legend.name: Victorious Legend
victorious_legend.desc: Gorou's specialty. The side dishes have been piled high to form a sight as moving as Gorou's own motivations. As you finish the noodles and soup all in one go and pat your stomach in satisfaction, you look up and see Gorou... smiling radiantly as his tail wags from side to side (the latter probably unbeknownst to him!).
victorious_legend.effect_desc: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

wanmin_restaurants_boiled_fish.name: Wanmin Restaurant's Boiled Fish
wanmin_restaurants_boiled_fish.desc: Xiangling's specialty. This is the signature dish of the Wanmin Restaurant, combining Xiangling's heartfelt passion for cuisine. Anyone who tastes it will gain a pure appreciation for gourmet food amid the hearty and addictive blend of flavors.
wanmin_restaurants_boiled_fish.effect_desc: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

woodland_dream.name: Woodland Dream
woodland_dream.desc: Albedo's specialty. The fruits and vegetables are laid out like grass, and they stand tall like trees. In this miniature world-in-a-plate, you circle the mottled city wall, follow brown alleys, and enter the light orange castle. A sweet, tender taste then bursts forth like a blooming flower. You open your eyes. There is a smile in the white-haired prince's eyes.
woodland_dream.effect_desc: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

yearning.name: Yearning
yearning.desc: Collei's specialty. Nutrient-rich ingredients have been stuffed inside the soft pastry shell to create a filling dish fit for those on the move. According to Collei, the cutlet in it is named "Forest Rangers' barbecue!" ... You know, this rather reminds you of a certain enthusiastic girl in red. The dish must be the embodiment of Collei's innermost admiration.
yearning.effect_desc: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

zhongyuan_chop_suey.name: Zhongyuan Chop Suey
zhongyuan_chop_suey.desc: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is not actually a swear word in the local language.
zhongyuan_chop_suey.effect_desc:
Decreases Stamina depleted by climbing and sprinting for all party members by 15–25% for 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

biryani.name: Biryani
biryani.desc: An aromatic rice dish. Stir-fry the meat such that it is crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. Then stew it with condiments and long-grain rice. Sprinkle a few Padisarah petals before serving. Every grain is saturated with the aroma of fatty meat and condiments. The dish has an exquisite taste only found in Sumeru.
biryani.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' DEF by 215–308 and healing effectiveness by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

bountiful_year.name: Bountiful Year
bountiful_year.desc: Luxurious and exquisite raw fish. The fish is sliced thinly and arranged in the shape of a flower before a ring of side dishes is set all around it. Normally, the side dishes will be mixed with the raw fish according to one's taste before consumption — this act is said to ensure that things will be smooth sailing in the coming days.
bountiful_year.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 224–320 and CRIT Rate by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

butter_crab.name: Butter Crab
butter_crab.desc: A grilled crab dish. Appropriate heat control has allowed the crab meat to stay moist and fatty. The butter has seeped into the crab meat, producing an aroma that has people salivating even from afar.
butter_crab.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' DEF by 215–308 and healing effectiveness by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

chicken_tofu_pudding.name: Chicken Tofu Pudding
chicken_tofu_pudding.desc: A dish that requires great precision to make. The finely diced chicken breast is stirred vigorously and added into a soup with various other minced meats, before being cooked over a small flame. The result is light and elegant, and it tastes like tofu pudding. The meat is presented in such a form that the experience of consuming it is like tasting the finest chicken one has ever eaten, yet without appearing to have eaten chicken at all. This is part of Liyue's culinary fine arts.
chicken_tofu_pudding.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 224–320 and CRIT Rate by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

chili_mince_cornbread_buns.name: Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
chili_mince_cornbread_buns.desc: A traditional snack from Liyue. The fresh dough is turned out into a round, rested, and then placed inside a cage to steam. The meat and vegetables are then washed and diced, before being fried quickly in an oiled wok. When eaten, the fried condiments must be placed into the empty space in the middle of the buns before they are eaten together. Between the crisp vegetables and the flavorful meat, this is solid, great flavor.
chili_mince_cornbread_buns.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25–35% and DEF by 165–235 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

golden_crab.name: Golden Crab
golden_crab.desc: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The crab has been chopped into pieces and battered with flour, before being stir-fried till golden and rich with flavor. It is worthy of the word "gold," whether in terms of appearance or quality.
golden_crab.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' DEF by 215–308 and healing effectiveness by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

golden_fried_chicken.name: Golden Fried Chicken
golden_fried_chicken.desc: Fowl that has been seasoned and then fried. The seasonings were made into a paste and smeared onto the chicken before it was fried at high temperature. The fragrance alone brings the vivid image of crispy skin and tender meat to mind. One bite and the luscious juices begin to flow. Truly irresistible.
golden_fried_chicken.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 224–320 and CRIT Rate by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

jade_parcels.name: Jade Parcels
jade_parcels.desc: An exquisite-looking dish. The ham's sweetness is locked inside the fresh vegetables, drizzled with a spicy broth. Delicious is an understatement.
jade_parcels.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 224–320 and CRIT Rate by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

meat_lovers_mushroom_pizza.name: Meat Lovers' Mushroom Pizza
meat_lovers_mushroom_pizza.desc: A pizza freshly baked from the oven. The crust is dotted with large chunks of meat and fresh mushroom slices. The sweet, stretchy cheese further adds to the charm. You have no doubt that every slice will be snatched away the moment it is served. Speed, therefore, is a gourmet's best buddy when this pizza is on the table.
meat_lovers_mushroom_pizza.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 224–320 and CRIT Rate by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

moon_pie.name: Moon Pie
moon_pie.desc: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. Not only is the pickled meat within deeply flavorful, but the meringue has also maintained its sweetness and moisture through the baking process. This dish is not to be missed at any festival in Mondstadt.
moon_pie.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25–35% and DEF by 165–235 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

sashimi_platter.name: Sashimi Platter
sashimi_platter.desc: A seafood dish made using fresh ingredients. The fish and shellfish are cut into pieces and arranged neatly. The slices have an elegant and tender taste, providing rich and high-quality nutrition. The lingering sweet aftertaste is derived fully from the ingredients' freshness, and every bite is an enjoyment worth closing one's eyes and savoring.
sashimi_platter.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 224–320 and CRIT Rate by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

stormcrest_pie.name: Stormcrest Pie
stormcrest_pie.desc: Eula's specialty. It's hard to say if the unorthodox, non-full-moon shape is meant to flout tradition or express her "tooth for a tooth" ethos. A rich, savory, and smoky flavor emanates from beneath the golden outer crust, unlikely to be reproducible by anybody else in Mondstadt. Best not to tell her all this, though, lest she add it to her list of personal vendettas.
stormcrest_pie.effect_desc: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 40% and DEF by 282 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

tandoori_roast_chicken.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
tandoori_roast_chicken.desc: A signature chicken dish in Sumeru. The chicken was first marinated with red spices, and then roasted in a tandoor. The process of making this Sumeru classic does not involve any fancy skills, and the use of such a humble clay oven might be surprising to some. In Sumeru, a tandoor to a veteran chef is as important as a trusty sword to an adventurer.
tandoori_roast_chicken.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 224–320 and CRIT Rate by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

tianshu_meat.name: Tianshu Meat
tianshu_meat.desc: A braised meat dish. The cut of meat used is a happy medium between lean and fatty, and has been braised to smoking perfection. The ingredients glisten, and are soft but not greasy. Word has it that the Tianshu of a certain generation of the Liyue Qixing invented this dish after much painstaking development.
tianshu_meat.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 25–45% and increases CRIT Rate by 6–10% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

adeptus_temptation.name: Adeptus' Temptation
adeptus_temptation.desc: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine, in which specially selected ingredients are submerged and slowly boiled in soup stock. The recipe scribbled from memory alone was enough to urge the adepti to once again return to the world of men.
adeptus_temptation.effect_desc:
Increases all party members' ATK by 260–372 and CRIT Rate by 8–12% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

fruit_and_veggie_stall_good_honest_flavo.name: Fruit and Veggie Stall: Good Honest Flavor

inazuman_bambooroofed_home_the_long_peac.name: Inazuman Bamboo-Roofed Home: The Long Peace

inazuman_home_the_work_of_generations.name: Inazuman Home: The Work of Generations

night_of_serenity_in_the_sandy_breeze.name: Night of Serenity in the Sandy Breeze

otogi_wood_rice_cake_soup_stand.name: Otogi Wood Rice Cake Soup Stand

umbrella_shop_drapes_of_differing_dreams.name: Umbrella Shop: Drapes of Differing Dreams

maple_wood_bookcase_trove_of_a_thousand_.name: Maple Wood Bookcase: Trove of a Thousand Tomes

a_farewell_brief_to_bustle_and_bother.name: A Farewell Brief to Bustle and Bother

of_maple_and_tea_scents_entwined.name: Of Maple and Tea Scents Entwined

1.name: Dawn Winery Theme (City of Winds and Idylls)

22.name: Eternal Anamnesis (Genshin Impact Main Theme Var.)

23.name: Journey of Hope (Genshin Impact Main Theme Var.)

26.name: Call It a Day in Liyue

85.name: Ruins of Scorching Might
85.source: Outside The Mausoleum of King Deshret

1.2.name: The Chalk Prince and the Dragon

2.0.name: The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia

2.2.name: Into the Perilous Labyrinth of Fog

3.0.name: The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings

3.1.name: King Deshret and the Three Magi

3.2.name: Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises

3.3.name: All Senses Clear, All Existence Void

apprentices_notes.name: Apprentice's Notes
apprentices_notes.desc: Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and the handwriting is beautiful.

beginners_protector.name: Beginner's Protector
beginners_protector.desc: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations, it has an imposing presence when swung.

dull_blade.name: Dull Blade
dull_blade.desc: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.

hunters_bow.name: Hunter's Bow
hunters_bow.desc: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.

waster_greatsword.name: Waster Greatsword
waster_greatsword.desc: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains if wielded with enough willpower.

iron_point.name: Iron Point
iron_point.desc: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

old_mercs_pal.name: Old Merc's Pal
old_mercs_pal.desc: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

pocket_grimoire.name: Pocket Grimoire
pocket_grimoire.desc: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

seasoned_hunters_bow.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
seasoned_hunters_bow.desc: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

silver_sword.name: Silver Sword
silver_sword.desc: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

black_tassel.name: Black Tassel
black_tassel.desc: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

bloodtainted_greatsword.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
bloodtainted_greatsword.desc: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.

cool_steel.name: Cool Steel
cool_steel.desc: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.

dark_iron_sword.name: Dark Iron Sword
dark_iron_sword.desc: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.

debate_club.name: Debate Club
debate_club.desc: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.

emerald_orb.name: Emerald Orb
emerald_orb.desc: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."

ferrous_shadow.name: Ferrous Shadow
ferrous_shadow.desc: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.

fillet_blade.name: Fillet Blade
fillet_blade.desc: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.

halberd.name: Halberd
halberd.desc: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.

harbinger_of_dawn.name: Harbinger of Dawn
harbinger_of_dawn.desc: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.

magic_guide.name: Magic Guide
magic_guide.desc: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

messenger.name: Messenger
messenger.desc: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.

otherworldly_story.name: Otherworldly Story
otherworldly_story.desc: A cheap fantasy novel with no value whatsoever. Any claim that it possesses the power of catalysis is also pure fantasy.

raven_bow.name: Raven Bow
raven_bow.desc: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

recurve_bow.name: Recurve Bow
recurve_bow.desc: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.

sharpshooters_oath.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
sharpshooters_oath.desc: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.

skyrider_greatsword.name: Skyrider Greatsword
skyrider_greatsword.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.

skyrider_sword.name: Skyrider Sword
skyrider_sword.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...

slingshot.name: Slingshot
slingshot.desc: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.

thrilling_tales_of_dragon_slayers.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
thrilling_tales_of_dragon_slayers.desc: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.

travelers_handy_sword.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
travelers_handy_sword.desc: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.

twin_nephrite.name: Twin Nephrite
twin_nephrite.desc: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.

white_iron_greatsword.name: White Iron Greatsword
white_iron_greatsword.desc: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.

white_tassel.name: White Tassel
white_tassel.desc: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

akuoumaru.name: Akuoumaru
akuoumaru.desc: The beloved sword of the legendary "Akuou." The blade is huge and majestic, but is surprisingly easy to wield.

alley_hunter.name: Alley Hunter
alley_hunter.desc: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.

amenoma_kageuchi.name: Amenoma Kageuchi
amenoma_kageuchi.desc: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.

blackcliff_agate.name: Blackcliff Agate
blackcliff_agate.desc: A mysterious catalyst made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.

blackcliff_longsword.name: Blackcliff Longsword
blackcliff_longsword.desc: A sword made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.

blackcliff_pole.name: Blackcliff Pole
blackcliff_pole.desc: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.

blackcliff_slasher.name: Blackcliff Slasher
blackcliff_slasher.desc: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to pommel.

blackcliff_warbow.name: Blackcliff Warbow
blackcliff_warbow.desc: A bow made of blackcliff that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.

cinnabar_spindle.name: Cinnabar Spindle
cinnabar_spindle.desc: A sword made from materials that do not belong in this world. The power within might even be able to withstand the corruption of a venom that could corrode a mighty dragon.

compound_bow.name: Compound Bow
compound_bow.desc: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.

crescent_pike.name: Crescent Pike
crescent_pike.desc: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.

deathmatch.name: Deathmatch
deathmatch.desc: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

dodoco_tales.name: Dodoco Tales
dodoco_tales.desc:
A children's book filled with childish short stories at which one cannot help but laugh.
Even those readers who have long reached adulthood cannot help but be absorbed by the innocent, naive little adventures portrayed within.

dragons_bane.name: Dragon's Bane
dragons_bane.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

dragonspine_spear.name: Dragonspine Spear
dragonspine_spear.desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

end_of_the_line.name: End of the Line
end_of_the_line.desc: This seems to be a now-extinct fish. Its body is sufficiently elastic that a string may be attached to it to let it serve as a bow.

eye_of_perception.name: Eye of Perception
eye_of_perception.desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

fading_twilight.name: Fading Twilight
fading_twilight.desc: A precious bow made of platinum, inlaid with an orb that shimmers with the light of eventide.

favonius_codex.name: Favonius Codex
favonius_codex.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

favonius_greatsword.name: Favonius Greatsword
favonius_greatsword.desc: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.

favonius_lance.name: Favonius Lance
favonius_lance.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

favonius_sword.name: Favonius Sword
favonius_sword.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

favonius_warbow.name: Favonius Warbow
favonius_warbow.desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

festering_desire.name: Festering Desire
festering_desire.desc: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.

forest_regalia.name: Forest Regalia
forest_regalia.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a greatsword that shall cut down the foes of the forest.

frostbearer.name: Frostbearer
frostbearer.desc: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.

fruit_of_fulfillment.name: Fruit of Fulfillment
fruit_of_fulfillment.desc: A fruit you obtained from an Aranara tale. It holds the potential to conquer any crisis.

hakushin_ring.name: Hakushin Ring
hakushin_ring.desc: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.

hamayumi.name: Hamayumi
hamayumi.desc: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.

iron_sting.name: Iron Sting
iron_sting.desc: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.

kagotsurube_isshin.name: Kagotsurube Isshin
kagotsurube_isshin.desc: This famed blade was born in a nation to the far north. But in the name of "Isshin," it was stained with many a dark deed on its home-bound journey.

katsuragikiri_nagamasa.name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
katsuragikiri_nagamasa.desc: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.

kings_squire.name: King's Squire
kings_squire.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a bow that can shoot the enemies of the forest down.

kitain_cross_spear.name: Kitain Cross Spear
kitain_cross_spear.desc: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.

lions_roar.name: Lion's Roar
lions_roar.desc: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

lithic_blade.name: Lithic Blade
lithic_blade.desc: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.

lithic_spear.name: Lithic Spear
lithic_spear.desc: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.

luxurious_sea_lord.name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
luxurious_sea_lord.desc: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.

makhaira_aquamarine.name: Makhaira Aquamarine
makhaira_aquamarine.desc: An ancient greatsword that gleams like the waters themselves. A thousand years of sand erosion has not dulled its unnaturally sharp edge one bit.

mappa_mare.name: Mappa Mare
mappa_mare.desc: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.

missive_windspear.name: Missive Windspear
missive_windspear.desc: A beacon that shows the direction of the wind. Not every idyll carried on the breeze remains a gentle thing...

mitternachts_waltz.name: Mitternachts Waltz
mitternachts_waltz.desc: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.

moonpiercer.name: Moonpiercer
moonpiercer.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It is shaped like a giant arrow and can be used as a spear.

mouuns_moon.name: Mouun's Moon
mouuns_moon.desc: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.

oathsworn_eye.name: Oathsworn Eye
oathsworn_eye.desc: A national treasure of Byakuyakoku stored in the Dainichi Mikoshi. With the coming of the Serpent God, this item was used to notarize great oaths and wishes.

predator.name: Predator
predator.desc: A uniquely-designed bow. This should not belong in this world.

prototype_amber.name: Prototype Amber
prototype_amber.desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

prototype_archaic.name: Prototype Archaic
prototype_archaic.desc: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.

prototype_crescent.name: Prototype Crescent
prototype_crescent.desc: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

prototype_rancour.name: Prototype Rancour
prototype_rancour.desc: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.

prototype_starglitter.name: Prototype Starglitter
prototype_starglitter.desc: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

rainslasher.name: Rainslasher
rainslasher.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

royal_bow.name: Royal Bow
royal_bow.desc: An old longbow that belonged to the erstwhile aristocratic rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.

royal_greatsword.name: Royal Greatsword
royal_greatsword.desc: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by the nobility only.

royal_grimoire.name: Royal Grimoire
royal_grimoire.desc: A book that once belonged to a court mage of Mondstadt who served the nobility. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.

royal_longsword.name: Royal Longsword
royal_longsword.desc: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.

royal_spear.name: Royal Spear
royal_spear.desc: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.

rust.name: Rust
rust.desc: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

sacrificial_bow.name: Sacrificial Bow
sacrificial_bow.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

sacrificial_fragments.name: Sacrificial Fragments
sacrificial_fragments.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

sacrificial_greatsword.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
sacrificial_greatsword.desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

sacrificial_sword.name: Sacrificial Sword
sacrificial_sword.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

sapwood_blade.name: Sapwood Blade
sapwood_blade.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a blade that can cut down the foes of the forest.

serpent_spine.name: Serpent Spine
serpent_spine.desc: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.

snow_tombed_starsilver.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
snow_tombed_starsilver.desc: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.

solar_pearl.name: Solar Pearl
solar_pearl.desc: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.

sword_of_descension.name: Sword of Descension
sword_of_descension.desc: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.

the_alley_flash.name: The Alley Flash
the_alley_flash.desc: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.

the_bell.name: The Bell
the_bell.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

the_black_sword.name: The Black Sword
the_black_sword.desc: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.

the_catch.name: "The Catch"
the_catch.desc: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

the_flute.name: The Flute
the_flute.desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

the_stringless.name: The Stringless
the_stringless.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

the_viridescent_hunt.name: The Viridescent Hunt
the_viridescent_hunt.desc: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.

the_widsith.name: The Widsith
the_widsith.desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

toukabou_shigure.name: Toukabou Shigure
toukabou_shigure.desc: A rather special oil-paper umbrella. While long wanderings may make one used to the wind and the rain, there might be some fun in admiring a rainy scene beneath this parasol.

wandering_evenstar.name: Wandering Evenstar
wandering_evenstar.desc: This was originally a device used by researchers to observe and perform calculations on celestial phenomena. It serves as a conduit and catalyst.

wavebreakers_fin.name: Wavebreaker's Fin
wavebreakers_fin.desc: A naginata forged from luminescent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.

whiteblind.name: Whiteblind
whiteblind.desc: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.

windblume_ode.name: Windblume Ode
windblume_ode.desc: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.

wine_and_song.name: Wine and Song
wine_and_song.desc: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.

xiphos_moonlight.name: Xiphos' Moonlight
xiphos_moonlight.desc: This ancient double-edged sword glimmers with moonlight. It is said that a now-silent Jinni dwells within it.

a_thousand_floating_dreams.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
a_thousand_floating_dreams.desc: This lamp illuminates the dreams that float up over a thousand nights, and in its emerald-green light flows a song of ancient days.

amos_bow.name: Amos' Bow
amos_bow.desc: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.

aqua_simulacra.name: Aqua Simulacra
aqua_simulacra.desc: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on a lustrous, watery blue.

aquila_favonia.name: Aquila Favonia
aquila_favonia.desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.

calamity_queller.name: Calamity Queller
calamity_queller.desc: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.

elegy_for_the_end.name: Elegy for the End
elegy_for_the_end.desc: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.

engulfing_lightning.name: Engulfing Lightning
engulfing_lightning.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

everlasting_moonglow.name: Everlasting Moonglow
everlasting_moonglow.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

freedom_sworn.name: Freedom-Sworn
freedom_sworn.desc: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.

haran_geppaku_futsu.name: Haran Geppaku Futsu
haran_geppaku_futsu.desc: A famed work by the Futsu line of smiths. The name "Haran" comes from the manner in which it resembles the violent, roiling waves.

hunters_path.name: Hunter's Path
hunters_path.desc: This gilded bow was made using precious white branches. It has felled countless wicked beasts attempting to infiltrate the woods.

kaguras_verity.name: Kagura's Verity
kaguras_verity.desc: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself. The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.

key_of_khajnisut.name: Key of Khaj-Nisut
key_of_khajnisut.desc: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. They say that this can be used as a key to open the gate to a paradise that lies at the end of the ocean of sand.

light_of_foliar_incision.name: Light of Foliar Incision
light_of_foliar_incision.desc: This gilded blade was made using precious white branches. It was once used to destroy countless poisons that infested the forest.

lost_prayer_to_the_sacred_winds.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
lost_prayer_to_the_sacred_winds.desc: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.

memory_of_dust.name: Memory of Dust
memory_of_dust.desc: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.

mistsplitter_reforged.name: Mistsplitter Reforged
mistsplitter_reforged.desc: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name "Reforged" comes from it having been broken once before.

polar_star.name: Polar Star
polar_star.desc: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.

primordial_jade_cutter.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
primordial_jade_cutter.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

primordial_jade_winged_spear.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
primordial_jade_winged_spear.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

redhorn_stonethresher.name: Redhorn Stonethresher
redhorn_stonethresher.desc: According to its previous owner, this weapon is the "Mighty Redhorn Stoic Stonethreshing Gilded Goldcrushing Lion Lord" that can send any monster packing with its tail between its legs.

skyward_atlas.name: Skyward Atlas
skyward_atlas.desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

skyward_blade.name: Skyward Blade
skyward_blade.desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

skyward_harp.name: Skyward Harp
skyward_harp.desc: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.

skyward_pride.name: Skyward Pride
skyward_pride.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

skyward_spine.name: Skyward Spine
skyward_spine.desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

song_of_broken_pines.name: Song of Broken Pines
song_of_broken_pines.desc: A greatsword as light as the sigh of grass in the breeze, yet as merciless to the corrupt as a typhoon.

staff_of_homa.name: Staff of Homa
staff_of_homa.desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

staff_of_the_scarlet_sands.name: Staff of the Scarlet Sands
staff_of_the_scarlet_sands.desc: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. Legend has it that these staves grant the right to lead the people of the desert, but no retainer now lives who can verify the proper appearance of these regalia.

summit_shaper.name: Summit Shaper
summit_shaper.desc: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.

the_unforged.name: The Unforged
the_unforged.desc: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.

thundering_pulse.name: Thundering Pulse
thundering_pulse.desc: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.

tulaytullahs_remembrance.name: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
tulaytullahs_remembrance.desc: A bell crafted of deep sapphire and sterling silver. Its echoes are as crisp as they are distant.

vortex_vanquisher.name: Vortex Vanquisher
vortex_vanquisher.desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

wolfs_gravestone.name: Wolf's Gravestone
wolfs_gravestone.desc: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

bloodtainted_greatsword.effect_desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%}.

cool_steel.effect_desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%}.

dark_iron_sword.effect_desc: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%} for 12s.

debate_club.effect_desc: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to {60%,75%,90%,105%,120%} of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

emerald_orb.effect_desc: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%} for 12s.

ferrous_shadow.effect_desc: When HP falls below {70%,75%,80%,85%,90%}, increases Charged Attack DMG by {30%,35%,40%,45%,50%} and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

fillet_blade.effect_desc: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal {240%,280%,320%,360%,400%} ATK DMG to a single target. Can only occur once every {15s,14s,13s,12s,11s}.

halberd.effect_desc: Normal Attacks deal an additional {160%,200%,240%,280%,320%} ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

harbinger_of_dawn.effect_desc: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by {14%,17.5%,21%,24.5%,28%}.

magic_guide.effect_desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%}.

messenger.effect_desc: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional {100%,125%,150%,175%,200%} ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

otherworldly_story.effect_desc: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores {1%,1.25%,1.5%,1.75%,2%} HP.

raven_bow.effect_desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%}.

sharpshooters_oath.effect_desc: Increases DMG against weak spots by {24%,30%,36%,42%,48%}.

skyrider_greatsword.effect_desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by {6%,7%,8%,9%,10%} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

skyrider_sword.effect_desc: Using an Elemental Burst grants a {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%} increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

slingshot.effect_desc: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by {36%,42%,48%,54%,60%}. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

thrilling_tales_of_dragon_slayers.effect_desc: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by {24%,30%,36%,42%,48%} for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

travelers_handy_sword.effect_desc: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores {1%,1.25%,1.5%,1.75%,2%} HP.

twin_nephrite.effect_desc: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by {12%,14%,16%,18%,20%} for 15s.

akuoumaru.effect_desc: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by {0.12%,0.15%,0.18%,0.21%,0.24%}. A maximum of {40%,50%,60%,70%,80%} increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

alley_hunter.effect_desc: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by {2%,2.5%,3%,3.5%,4%} every second up to a max of {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%}. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by {4%,5%,6%,7%,8%} per second until it reaches 0%.

amenoma_kageuchi.effect_desc: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates {6,7.5,9,10.5,12} Energy for each seed consumed.

blackcliff_agate.effect_desc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

blackcliff_longsword.effect_desc: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

blackcliff_pole.effect_desc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

blackcliff_slasher.effect_desc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

blackcliff_warbow.effect_desc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

cinnabar_spindle.effect_desc: Elemental Skill DMG is increased by {40%,50%,60%,70%,80%} of DEF. The effect will be triggered no more than once every 1.5s and will be cleared 0.1s after the Elemental Skill deals DMG.

compound_bow.effect_desc: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by {4%,5%,6%,7%,8%} and Normal ATK SPD by {1.2%,1.5%,1.8%,2.1%,2.4%} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

crescent_pike.effect_desc: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%} of ATK for 5s.

deathmatch.effect_desc: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by {16%,20%,24%,28%,32%} and DEF is increased by {16%,20%,24%,28%,32%}. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by {24%,30%,36%,42%,48%}.

dodoco_tales.effect_desc: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Charged Attack DMG by {16%,20%,24%,28%,32%} for 6s. Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by {8%,10%,12%,14%,16%} for 6s.

dragons_bane.effect_desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by {20%,24%,28%,32%,36%}.

dragonspine_spear.effect_desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {60%,70%,80%,90%,100%} chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to {80%,95%,110%,125%,140%} of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to {200%,240%,280%,320%,360%} of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

end_of_the_line.effect_desc: Triggers the Flowrider effect after using an Elemental Skill, dealing {80%,100%,120%,140%,160%} ATK as AoE DMG upon hitting an opponent with an attack. Flowrider will be removed after 15s or after causing 3 instances of AoE DMG. Only 1 instance of AoE DMG can be caused every 2s in this way. Flowrider can be triggered once every 12s.

eye_of_perception.effect_desc: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing {240%,270%,300%,330%,360%} ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every {12s,11s,10s,9s,8s}.

fading_twilight.effect_desc: Has three states, Evengleam, Afterglow, and Dawnblaze, which increase DMG dealt by {6%/10%/14%,7.5%/12.5%/17.5%,9%/15%/21%,10.5%/17.5%/24.5%,12%/20%/28%} respectively. When attacks hit opponents, this weapon will switch to the next state. This weapon can change states once every 7s. The character equipping this weapon can still trigger the state switch while not on the field.

favonius_codex.effect_desc: CRIT Hits have a {60%,70%,80%,90%,100%} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {12s,10.5s,9s,7.5s,6s}.

favonius_greatsword.effect_desc: CRIT Hits have a {60%,70%,80%,90%,100%} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {12s,10.5s,9s,7.5s,6s}.

favonius_lance.effect_desc: CRIT Hits have a {60%,70%,80%,90%,100%} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {12s,10.5s,9s,7.5s,6s}.

favonius_sword.effect_desc: CRIT Hits have a {60%,70%,80%,90%,100%} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {12s,10.5s,9s,7.5s,6s}.

favonius_warbow.effect_desc: CRIT Hits have a {60%,70%,80%,90%,100%} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {12s,10.5s,9s,7.5s,6s}.

festering_desire.effect_desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {16%,20%,24%,28%,32%} and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by {6%,7.5%,9%,10.5%,12%}.

forest_regalia.effect_desc: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Consciousness will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character {60,75,90,105,120} Elemental Mastery for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field. The Leaf of Consciousness' effect cannot stack.

frostbearer.effect_desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {60%,70%,80%,90%,100%} chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to {80%,95%,110%,125%,140%} of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to {200%,240%,280%,320%,360%} of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

fruit_of_fulfillment.effect_desc: Obtain the "Wax and Wane" effect after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, gaining {24,27,30,33,36} Elemental Mastery while losing 5% ATK. For every 0.3s, 1 stack of Wax and Wane can be gained. Max 5 stacks. For every 6s that go by without an Elemental Reaction being triggered, 1 stack will be lost. This effect can be triggered even when the character is off-field.

hakushin_ring.effect_desc: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a {10%,12.5%,15%,17.5%,20%} Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.

hamayumi.effect_desc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by {16%,20%,24%,28%,32%} and Charged Attack DMG by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%}. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

iron_sting.effect_desc: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by {6%,7.5%,9%,10.5%,12%} for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

kagotsurube_isshin.effect_desc: When a Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attack hits an opponent, it will whip up a Hewing Gale, dealing AoE DMG equal to 180% of ATK and increasing ATK by 15% for 8s. This effect can be triggered once every 8s.

katsuragikiri_nagamasa.effect_desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {6%,7.5%,9%,10.5%,12%}. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates {3,3.5,4,4.5,5} Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

kings_squire.effect_desc: Obtain the Teachings of the Forest effect when unleashing Elemental Skills and Bursts, increasing Elemental Mastery by {60,80,100,120,140} for 12s. This effect will be removed when switching characters. When the Teachings of the Forest effect ends or is removed, it will deal {100%,120%,140%,160%,180%} of ATK as DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The Teachings of the Forest effect can be triggered once every 20s.

kitain_cross_spear.effect_desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {6%,7.5%,9%,10.5%,12%}. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates {3,3.5,4,4.5,5} Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

lions_roar.effect_desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by {20%,24%,28%,32%,36%}.

lithic_blade.effect_desc: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a {7%,8%,9%,10%,11%} ATK increase and a {3%,4%,5%,6%,7%} CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

lithic_spear.effect_desc: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a {7%,8%,9%,10%,11%} ATK increase and a {3%,4%,5%,6%,7%} CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

luxurious_sea_lord.effect_desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%}. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals {100%,125%,150%,175%,200%} ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

makhaira_aquamarine.effect_desc: The following effect will trigger every 10s: The equipping character will gain {24%,30%,36%,42%,48%} of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK for 12s, with nearby party members gaining 30% of this buff for the same duration. Multiple instances of this weapon can allow this buff to stack. This effect will still trigger even if the character is not on the field.

mappa_mare.effect_desc: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a {8%,10%,12%,14%,16%} Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

missive_windspear.effect_desc: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%} and Elemental Mastery is increased by {48,60,72,84,96}.

mitternachts_waltz.effect_desc: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%} for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%} for 5s.

moonpiercer.effect_desc: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Revival will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character {16%,20%,24%,28%,32%} ATK for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field.

mouuns_moon.effect_desc: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by {0.12%,0.15%,0.18%,0.21%,0.24%}. A maximum of {40%,50%,60%,70%,80%} increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

oathsworn_eye.effect_desc: Increases Energy Recharge by {24%,30%,36%,42%,48%} for 10s after using an Elemental Skill.

predator.effect_desc:
Effective only on the following platform: 
"PlayStation Network"
Dealing Cryo DMG to opponents increases this character's Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 6s. This effect can have a maximum of 2 stacks. Additionally, when Aloy equips Predator, ATK is increased by 66.

prototype_amber.effect_desc: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates {4,4.5,5,5.5,6} Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate {4%,4.5%,5%,5.5%,6%} HP every 2s for this duration.

prototype_archaic.effect_desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional {240%,300%,360%,420%,480%} ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

prototype_crescent.effect_desc: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by {36%,45%,54%,63%,72%} for 10s.

prototype_rancour.effect_desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by {4%,5%,6%,7%,8%} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

prototype_starglitter.effect_desc: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by {8%,10%,12%,14%,16%} for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

rainslasher.effect_desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by {20%,24%,28%,32%,36%}.

royal_bow.effect_desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {8%,10%,12%,14%,16%}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royal_greatsword.effect_desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {8%,10%,12%,14%,16%}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royal_grimoire.effect_desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {8%,10%,12%,14%,16%}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royal_longsword.effect_desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {8%,10%,12%,14%,16%}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royal_spear.effect_desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {8%,10%,12%,14%,16%}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

rust.effect_desc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by {40%,50%,60%,70%,80%} but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

sacrificial_bow.effect_desc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {40%,50%,60%,70%,80%} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {30s,26s,22s,19s,16s}.

sacrificial_fragments.effect_desc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {40%,50%,60%,70%,80%} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {30s,26s,22s,19s,16s}.

sacrificial_greatsword.effect_desc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {40%,50%,60%,70%,80%} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {30s,26s,22s,19s,16s}.

sacrificial_sword.effect_desc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {40%,50%,60%,70%,80%} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {30s,26s,22s,19s,16s}.

sapwood_blade.effect_desc: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Consciousness will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character {60,75,90,105,120} Elemental Mastery for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field. The Leaf of Consciousness' effect cannot stack.

serpent_spine.effect_desc: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal {6%,7%,8%,9%,10%} more DMG and take {3%,2.7%,2.4%,2.2%,2%} more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

snow_tombed_starsilver.effect_desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {60%,70%,80%,90%,100%} chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to {80%,95%,110%,125%,140%} of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to {200%,240%,280%,320%,360%} of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

solar_pearl.effect_desc: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%} for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%} for 6s.

sword_of_descension.effect_desc:
Effective only on the following platform: 
"PlayStation Network"
Hitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a {50%} chance to deal {200%} ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by {66}.

the_alley_flash.effect_desc: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%}. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

the_bell.effect_desc: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to {20%,23%,26%,29%,32%} of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every {45s,45s,45s,45s,45s}. While protected by a shield, the character gains {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%} increased DMG.

the_black_sword.effect_desc: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%}. Additionally, regenerates {60%,70%,80%,90%,100%} of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

the_catch.effect_desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by {16%,20%,24%,28%,32%} and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by {6%,7.5%,9%,10.5%,12%}.

the_flute.effect_desc: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals {100%,125%,150%,175%,200%} ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

the_stringless.effect_desc: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {24%,30%,36%,42%,48%}.

the_viridescent_hunt.effect_desc: Upon hit, Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing {40%,50%,60%,70%,80%} of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every {14s,13s,12s,11s,10s}.

the_widsith.effect_desc: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by {60%,75%,90%,105%,120%}. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by {48%,60%,72%,84%,96%}. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by {240,300,360,420,480}.

toukabou_shigure.effect_desc: After an attack hits opponents, it will inflict an instance of Cursed Parasol upon one of them for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 15s. If this opponent is taken out during Cursed Parasol's duration, Cursed Parasol's CD will be refreshed immediately. The character wielding this weapon will deal {16%,16%,16%,16%,16%} more DMG to the opponent affected by Cursed Parasol.

wandering_evenstar.effect_desc: The following effect will trigger every 10s: The equipping character will gain {24%,30%,36%,42%,48%} of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK for 12s, with nearby party members gaining 30% of this buff for the same duration. Multiple instances of this weapon can allow this buff to stack. This effect will still trigger even if the character is not on the field.

wavebreakers_fin.effect_desc: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by {0.12%,0.15%,0.18%,0.21%,0.24%}. A maximum of {40%,50%,60%,70%,80%} increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

whiteblind.effect_desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by {6%,7.5%,9%,10.5%,12%} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

windblume_ode.effect_desc: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by {16%,20%,24%,28%,32%} for 6s.

wine_and_song.effect_desc: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate Sprint by {14%,16%,18%,20%,22%} for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%} for 5s.

xiphos_moonlight.effect_desc: The following effect will trigger every 10s: the equipping character will gain {0.036%,0.045%,0.054%,0.063%,0.072%} Energy Recharge for each point of Elemental Mastery they possess for 12s, with nearby party members gaining 30% of this buff for the same duration. Multiple instances of this weapon can allow this buff to stack. This effect will still trigger even if the character is not on the field.

a_thousand_floating_dreams.effect_desc: Party members other than the equipping character will provide the equipping character with buffs based on whether their Elemental Type is the same as the latter or not. If their Elemental Types are the same, increase Elemental Mastery by {32,40,48,56,64}. If not, increase the equipping character's DMG Bonus from their Elemental Type by {10%,14%,18%,22%,26%}. Each of the aforementioned effects can have up to 3 stacks. Additionally, all nearby party members other than the equipping character will have their Elemental Mastery increased by {40,42,44,46,48}. Multiple such effects from multiple such weapons can stack.

amos_bow.effect_desc: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%}. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further {8%,10%,12%,14%,16%} every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

aqua_simulacra.effect_desc: HP is increased by {16%,20%,24%,28%,32%}. When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%}. This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.

aquila_favonia.effect_desc: ATK is increased by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%}. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to {100%,115%,130%,145%,160%} of ATK and dealing {200%,230%,260%,290%,320%} of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

calamity_queller.effect_desc: Gain {12%,15%,18%,21%,24%} All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain Consummation for 20s after using an Elemental Skill, causing ATK to increase by {3.2%,4%,4.8%,5.6%,6.4%} per second. This ATK increase has a maximum of 6 stacks. When the character equipped with this weapon is not on the field, Consummation's ATK increase is doubled.

elegy_for_the_end.effect_desc: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by {60,75,90,105,120}. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by {100,125,150,175,200} and increases ATK by {20%,25%,30%,35%,40%}. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

engulfing_lightning.effect_desc: ATK increased by {28%,35%,42%,49%,56%} of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of {80%,90%,100%,110%,120%} ATK. Gain {30%,35%,40%,45%,50%} Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.
